00607 
00608       // load personnel
00609       LoadPersonnelScreenBackgroundGraphics( );
00610 
00611

00614

00616       if( GetNumberOfMercsDeadOrAliveOnPlayersTeam() > 0 )
00617       {
00618         iCurrentPersonSelectedId = GetIdOfFirstDisplayedMerc( );
00619       }
00620

00622

00625       //SetPersonnelButtonStates( );

00636       
00637   return;

00839 
00840 BOOLEAN RenderPersonnelPictures( void )
00841 {
00842       // will render portraits of personnel onscreen
00843       // find person with iStartPersonId, unless it is -1, then find first bActive Merc on Staff
00844       SOLDIERTYPE *pTeamSoldier, *pSoldier;
00845       BOOLEAN fFound=FALSE;
00846       INT32 iCounter=0;
00847       INT32 iSlot=0;
00848       INT32 cnt=0;
00849       INT32 iCurrentId = 0;
00850 
00851 
00852       pSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ];
00853       pTeamSoldier = pSoldier;
00854 
00855 
00856       if(iStartPersonId==-1)
00857       {
00858    cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ pSoldier->bTeam ].bFirstID;
00859    for ( pSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ pSoldier->bTeam ].bLastID; cnt++, pSoldier++ )
00860        {    
00861              if ( pSoldier->bLife >= OKLIFE && pSoldier->bActive )
00862              {
00863                    fFound = TRUE;
00864                    iStartPersonId=cnt;
00865                    break;
00866              }
00867        }
00868    if(!fFound)
00869             return (FALSE);
00870       }
00871       else
00872       {
00873    iCurrentId=iStartPersonId;
00874        fFound=TRUE;
00875        cnt=iCurrentId;
00876       }
00877 
00878 
00879 
00880       while(fFound)
00881       {
00882         // the soldier's ID is found
00883         // render Face
00884         fFound=FALSE;
00885             RenderPersonnelFace(iCurrentId, iSlot, FALSE, FALSE, FALSE );
00886             // draw stats
00887     RenderPersonnelStats(iCurrentId, iSlot);
00888             DisplayCharName( iCurrentId, iSlot);
00889             //find next guy
00890             pSoldier=MercPtrs[iCurrentId];
00891             cnt++;            
00892     for ( pTeamSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ pSoldier->bTeam ].bLastID; cnt++,pTeamSoldier++)
00893             {     
00894               if ( pTeamSoldier->bLife >= OKLIFE && pTeamSoldier->bActive )
00895                   {
00896                         if( pTeamSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE )
00897                         {
00898                               return( FALSE );
00899                         }
00900 
00901                     fFound = TRUE;
00902                         iSlot++;
00903                     break;
00904                   }
00905             }
00906             if(iSlot>=MAX_SLOTS)
00907                   fFound=FALSE;
00908     iCurrentId=cnt;
00909       }
00910   
00911       return(TRUE);
00912 }
00913 
00914 void RenderPersonnelStats( INT32 iId, INT32 iSlot )
00915 {
00916 
00917       INT32 iCounter=0;
00918       // will render the stats of person iId in slot iSlot
00919       SetFont(PERS_FONT);
00920       SetFontForeground(PERS_TEXT_FONT_COLOR);
00921       SetFontBackground(FONT_BLACK);
00922 
00923       //for(iCounter=0; iCounter <PERS_COUNT; iCounter++)
00924       // mprintf((INT16)(pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter].x+(iSlot*IMAGE_BOX_WIDTH)),pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter].y,pPersonnelScreenStrings[iCounter]);
00925 
00926 
00927       if( gubPersonnelInfoState == PERSONNEL_STAT_BTN )
00928       {
00929             DisplayCharStats(iId, iSlot);
00930       }
00931       else if( gubPersonnelInfoState == PERSONNEL_EMPLOYMENT_BTN )
00932       {
00933             DisplayEmploymentinformation( iId, iSlot );             
00934       }
00935 } 
00936 
00937 BOOLEAN RenderPersonnelFace(INT32 iId, INT32 iSlot, BOOLEAN fDead, BOOLEAN fFired, BOOLEAN fOther )
00938 {
00939       char sTemp[100];
00940       HVOBJECT hFaceHandle;
00941   VOBJECT_DESC    VObjectDesc;
00942       INT32 iCounter = 7;
00943 
00944       // draw face to soldier iId in slot iSlot
00945       
00946       // special case?..player generated merc
00947       if( fCurrentTeamMode == TRUE )
00948       {
00949       
00950             if( ( 50 <  MercPtrs[iId] -> ubProfile )&&( 57 >      MercPtrs[iId] -> ubProfile ) )
00951             {
00952                   sprintf( sTemp, "%s%03d.sti", FACES_DIR,  gMercProfiles[ MercPtrs[iId] -> ubProfile  ].ubFaceIndex ); 
00953             }
00954             else
00955             {
00956                   sprintf(sTemp, "%s%02d.sti", FACES_DIR,   Menptr[ iId ].ubProfile);
00957             }
00958       }
00959       else
00960       {
00961             //if this is not a valid merc
00962             if( !fDead && !fFired && !fOther )
00963             {
00964                   return( TRUE );
00965             }
00966 
00967             if( ( 50 <  iId )&&( 57 >     iId ) )
00968             {
00969                   sprintf( sTemp, "%s%03d.sti", FACES_DIR,  gMercProfiles[ iId  ].ubFaceIndex );      
00970             }
00971             else
00972             {
00973                   sprintf(sTemp, "%s%02d.sti", FACES_DIR,    iId );
00974             }
00975       }
00976 
00977       if( fCurrentTeamMode == TRUE )
00978       {
00979             if( MercPtrs[iId]->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE )
00980             {
00981                   return( TRUE );
00982             }
00983       }
00984 
00985       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00986       FilenameForBPP(sTemp, VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00987       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiFACE));
00988 
00989       //Blt face to screen to 
00990       GetVideoObject(&hFaceHandle, guiFACE);
00991 
00992       if( fCurrentTeamMode == TRUE )
00993       {
00994             if( MercPtrs[iId]->bLife <= 0 )
00995             {
00996                   hFaceHandle->pShades[ 0 ]           = Create16BPPPaletteShaded( hFaceHandle->pPaletteEntry, DEAD_MERC_COLOR_RED, DEAD_MERC_COLOR_GREEN, DEAD_MERC_COLOR_BLUE, TRUE );
00997                   
00998                   //set the red pallete to the face
00999                   SetObjectHandleShade( guiFACE, 0 );
01000             }
01001       }
01002       else
01003       {
01004             if( fDead == TRUE )
01005             {
01006                   hFaceHandle->pShades[ 0 ]           = Create16BPPPaletteShaded( hFaceHandle->pPaletteEntry, DEAD_MERC_COLOR_RED, DEAD_MERC_COLOR_GREEN, DEAD_MERC_COLOR_BLUE, TRUE );
01007                   
01008                   //set the red pallete to the face
01009                   SetObjectHandleShade( guiFACE, 0 );
01010             }
01011       }
01012       
01013 
01014   BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hFaceHandle, 0,IMAGE_BOX_X+(iSlot*IMAGE_BOX_WIDTH), IMAGE_BOX_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
01015   
01016 
01017       //if the merc is dead, display it
01018       if( !fCurrentTeamMode )
01019       {
01020             INT32 iHeightOfText;
01021 
01022             iHeightOfText = DisplayWrappedString(IMAGE_BOX_X, (UINT16)(IMAGE_BOX_Y+IMAGE_FULL_NAME_OFFSET_Y), IMAGE_NAME_WIDTH, 1, PERS_FONT, PERS_FONT_COLOR, gMercProfiles[ iId  ].zName, 0, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED | DONT_DISPLAY_TEXT );
01023 
01024             //if the string will rap
01025             if( ( iHeightOfText - 2 ) > GetFontHeight( PERS_FONT ) )
01026             {
01027                   //raise where we display it, and rap it
01028                   DisplayWrappedString(IMAGE_BOX_X, (UINT16)(IMAGE_BOX_Y+IMAGE_FULL_NAME_OFFSET_Y - GetFontHeight( PERS_FONT )), IMAGE_NAME_WIDTH, 1, PERS_FONT, PERS_FONT_COLOR, gMercProfiles[ iId  ].zName, 0, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED);
01029             }
01030             else
01031             {
01032                   DrawTextToScreen( gMercProfiles[ iId  ].zName, IMAGE_BOX_X, (UINT16)(IMAGE_BOX_Y+IMAGE_FULL_NAME_OFFSET_Y), IMAGE_NAME_WIDTH, PERS_FONT, PERS_FONT_COLOR, 0, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED );
01033             }
01034 //          DrawTextToScreen(gMercProfiles[ iId  ].zName, ( INT16 ) ( IMAGE_BOX_X+(iSlot*IMAGE_BOX_WIDTH) ), ( INT16 ) ( IMAGE_BOX_Y + 107 ), IMAGE_BOX_WITH_NO_BORDERS, PERS_FONT, PERS_FONT_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED );
01035       }
01036 
01037 /*
01038 removed cause we already show this under the picture, instead display the mercs FULL name ( above )
01039       if( fCurrentTeamMode == TRUE )
01040       {
01041             if( Menptr[ iId ].bLife <= 0 )
01042             {

01074 
01075 
01076 BOOLEAN NextPersonnelFace( void )
01077 {
01078 
01079       if( iCurrentPersonSelectedId == -1 )
01080       {
01081             return ( TRUE );
01082       }
01083 
01084       if( fCurrentTeamMode == TRUE )
01085       {
01086             // wrap around?
01087             if( iCurrentPersonSelectedId == GetNumberOfMercsDeadOrAliveOnPlayersTeam( ) - 1 )
01088             {
01089                   iCurrentPersonSelectedId = 0;
01090                   return( FALSE );  //def added 3/14/99 to enable disable buttons properly
01091             }
01092             else
01093             {
01094                   iCurrentPersonSelectedId++;
01095             }
01096       }
01097       else
01098       {
01099             if ( ( ( iCurPortraitId + 1) == ( GetNumberOfDeadOnPastTeam( ) + GetNumberOfLeftOnPastTeam( ) + GetNumberOfOtherOnPastTeam( ) ) - giCurrentUpperLeftPortraitNumber ) )
01100             {
01101                   // about to go off the end
01102                   giCurrentUpperLeftPortraitNumber = 0;
01103                   iCurPortraitId = 0;
01104 
01105             }
01106             else if(  iCurPortraitId == 19 ) 
01107             {
01108                   giCurrentUpperLeftPortraitNumber += 20;
01109                   iCurPortraitId = 0;
01110             }
01111             else
01112             {
01113                   iCurPortraitId++;
01114             }
01115             // get of this merc in this slot
01116 
01117             iCurrentPersonSelectedId =  iCurPortraitId;
01118             fReDrawScreenFlag = TRUE;
01119       }
01120 
01121             return ( TRUE );
01122 }
01123 
01124 BOOLEAN PrevPersonnelFace( void )
01125 {
01126       
01127       if( iCurrentPersonSelectedId == -1 )
01128       {
01129             return ( TRUE );
01130       }
01131 
01132   if( fCurrentTeamMode == TRUE )
01133       {
01134             // wrap around?
01135             if( iCurrentPersonSelectedId == 0  )
01136             {
01137                   iCurrentPersonSelectedId = GetNumberOfMercsDeadOrAliveOnPlayersTeam( ) - 1;
01138 
01139                   if( iCurrentPersonSelectedId == 0 )
01140                   {
01141                         return( FALSE );  //def added 3/14/99 to enable disable buttons properly
01142                   }
01143             }
01144             else
01145             {
01146                   iCurrentPersonSelectedId--;
01147             }
01148       }
01149       else
01150       {
01151             if  ( ( iCurPortraitId == 0 ) && ( giCurrentUpperLeftPortraitNumber == 0 ) )
01152             {
01153                   // about to go off the end
01154                   giCurrentUpperLeftPortraitNumber = ( GetNumberOfDeadOnPastTeam( ) + GetNumberOfLeftOnPastTeam( ) + GetNumberOfOtherOnPastTeam( ) ) - ( GetNumberOfDeadOnPastTeam( ) + GetNumberOfLeftOnPastTeam( ) + GetNumberOfOtherOnPastTeam( ) ) % 20;
01155                   iCurPortraitId = ( GetNumberOfDeadOnPastTeam( ) + GetNumberOfLeftOnPastTeam( ) + GetNumberOfOtherOnPastTeam( ) ) % 20 ;
01156                   iCurPortraitId--;
01157 
01158             }
01159             else if(  iCurPortraitId == 0 ) 
01160             {
01161                   giCurrentUpperLeftPortraitNumber -= 20;
01162                   iCurPortraitId = 19;
01163             }
01164             else
01165             {
01166                   iCurPortraitId--;
01167             }
01168             // get of this merc in this slot
01169 
01170             iCurrentPersonSelectedId =  iCurPortraitId;
01171             fReDrawScreenFlag = TRUE;
01172       }
01173 
01174       return ( TRUE );
01175 }

01244 
01245 
01246 void LeftButtonCallBack(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
01247 {
01248       if (!(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_ENABLED))
01249             return;
01250 
01251       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
01252       {
01253             if(!(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON))
01254             {
01255                   fReDrawScreenFlag=TRUE;
01256             }
01257     btn->uiFlags|=(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);   
01258       }
01259       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
01260       {
01261             if(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
01262             {
01263              btn->uiFlags&=~(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
01264              fReDrawScreenFlag=TRUE;
01265              PrevPersonnelFace( );
01266              uiCurrentInventoryIndex = 0;
01267              guiSliderPosition = 0;
01268              
01269             }
01270       }
01271 }
01272 
01273 void LeftFFButtonCallBack(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
01274 {
01275       if (!(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_ENABLED))
01276             return;
01277 
01278       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
01279       {
01280             if(!(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON))
01281             {
01282                   fReDrawScreenFlag=TRUE;
01283             }
01284     btn->uiFlags|=(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);   
01285       }
01286       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
01287       {
01288             if(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
01289             {
01290              btn->uiFlags&=~(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
01291              fReDrawScreenFlag=TRUE;
01292              PrevPersonnelFace( );
01293      PrevPersonnelFace( );
01294      PrevPersonnelFace( );
01295              PrevPersonnelFace( );
01296              
01297              // set states
01298              SetPersonnelButtonStates( );
01299             }
01300       }
01301 }

01372 
01373 void DisplayCharName( INT32 iId, INT32 iSlot )
01374 {
01375   // get merc's nickName, assignment, and sector location info
01376       INT16 sX, sY;
01377   SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
01378       CHAR16 sString[ 64 ];
01379       CHAR16 sTownName[ 256 ];
01380       INT8 bTownId =  -1;
01381       INT32 iHeightOfText;
01382 
01383       sTownName[0] = L'\0';
01384 
01385       pSoldier=MercPtrs[iId];
01386 
01387   SetFont(CHAR_NAME_FONT);
01388       SetFontForeground(PERS_TEXT_FONT_COLOR);
01389       SetFontBackground(FONT_BLACK);
01390       
01391       if( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE )
01392       {
01393             return;
01394       }
01395 
01396       if( Menptr[iId].bAssignment == ASSIGNMENT_POW )
01397       {
01398       }
01399       else if( Menptr[iId].bAssignment == IN_TRANSIT )
01400       {
01401       }
01402       else
01403   {
01404             // name of town, if any
01405             bTownId = GetTownIdForSector( Menptr[iId].sSectorX, Menptr[iId].sSectorY );
01406 
01407             if( bTownId != BLANK_SECTOR )
01408             {
01409                   swprintf( sTownName, L"%s", pTownNames[ bTownId ] );
01410             }
01411       }
01412 
01413 
01414 
01415       if( sTownName[0] != L'\0' )
01416       {
01417             //nick name - town name
01418             swprintf( sString, L"%s - %s", gMercProfiles[Menptr[iId].ubProfile].zNickname, sTownName );
01419       }
01420       else
01421       {
01422             //nick name
01423             swprintf( sString, L"%s", gMercProfiles[Menptr[iId].ubProfile].zNickname );
01424       }
01425 
01426 
01427       // nick name - assignment
01428       FindFontCenterCoordinates(IMAGE_BOX_X-5,0,IMAGE_BOX_WIDTH + 90 , 0,sString,CHAR_NAME_FONT, &sX, &sY );
01429 
01430       // check to see if we are going to go off the left edge
01431       if( sX < pPersonnelScreenPoints[ 0 ].x )
01432       {
01433             sX = ( INT16 )pPersonnelScreenPoints[ 0 ].x;
01434       }
01435       
01436       //Display the mercs name
01437       mprintf(sX+iSlot*IMAGE_BOX_WIDTH, CHAR_NAME_Y, sString );
01438 
01439       swprintf( sString, L"%s", pPersonnelAssignmentStrings[Menptr[iId].bAssignment]);
01440 
01441       // nick name - assignment
01442       FindFontCenterCoordinates(IMAGE_BOX_X-5,0,IMAGE_BOX_WIDTH + 90 , 0,sString,CHAR_NAME_FONT, &sX, &sY );
01443 
01444       // check to see if we are going to go off the left edge
01445       if( sX < pPersonnelScreenPoints[ 0 ].x )
01446       {
01447             sX = ( INT16 )pPersonnelScreenPoints[ 0 ].x;
01448       }
01449       
01450       mprintf(sX+iSlot*IMAGE_BOX_WIDTH, CHAR_LOC_Y, sString );
01451 
01452 
01453       //
01454       // Display the mercs FULL name over top of their portrait
01455       //
01456 
01457       //first get height of text to be displayed
01458       iHeightOfText = DisplayWrappedString(IMAGE_BOX_X, (UINT16)(IMAGE_BOX_Y+IMAGE_FULL_NAME_OFFSET_Y), IMAGE_NAME_WIDTH, 1, PERS_FONT, PERS_FONT_COLOR, gMercProfiles[Menptr[iId].ubProfile].zName, 0, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED | DONT_DISPLAY_TEXT );
01459 
01460       //if the string will rap
01461       if( ( iHeightOfText - 2 ) > GetFontHeight( PERS_FONT ) )
01462       {
01463             //raise where we display it, and rap it
01464             DisplayWrappedString(IMAGE_BOX_X, (UINT16)(IMAGE_BOX_Y+IMAGE_FULL_NAME_OFFSET_Y - GetFontHeight( PERS_FONT )), IMAGE_NAME_WIDTH, 1, PERS_FONT, PERS_FONT_COLOR, gMercProfiles[Menptr[iId].ubProfile].zName, 0, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED);
01465       }
01466       else
01467       {
01468             DrawTextToScreen( gMercProfiles[Menptr[iId].ubProfile].zName, IMAGE_BOX_X, (UINT16)(IMAGE_BOX_Y+IMAGE_FULL_NAME_OFFSET_Y), IMAGE_NAME_WIDTH, PERS_FONT, PERS_FONT_COLOR, 0, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED );
01469       }
01470 
01471 /*
01472 Moved so the name of the town will be in the same line as the name
01473 
01474 
01475       if( Menptr[iId].bAssignment == ASSIGNMENT_POW )
01476       {
01477 //          FindFontCenterCoordinates(IMAGE_BOX_X-5,0,IMAGE_BOX_WIDTH, 0,pPOWStrings[ 1 ],CHAR_NAME_FONT, &sX, &sY );
01478 //      mprintf(sX+iSlot*IMAGE_BOX_WIDTH, CHAR_NAME_Y+20,pPOWStrings[ 1 ] );
01479       }
01480       else if( Menptr[iId].bAssignment == IN_TRANSIT )
01481       {
01482             return;
01483       }
01484       else
01485   {
01486             // name of town, if any
01487             bTownId = GetTownIdForSector( Menptr[iId].sSectorX, Menptr[iId].sSectorY );
01488 
01489             if( bTownId != BLANK_SECTOR )
01490             {
01491                   FindFontCenterCoordinates( IMAGE_BOX_X - 5, 0, IMAGE_BOX_WIDTH, 0, pTownNames[ bTownId ], CHAR_NAME_FONT, &sX, &sY );
01492                   mprintf( sX + ( iSlot * IMAGE_BOX_WIDTH ), CHAR_NAME_Y + 20, pTownNames[ bTownId ]);
01493             }
01494       }
01495 */
01496   
01497       return;
01498 }
01499 
01500 
01501 void DisplayCharStats(INT32 iId, INT32 iSlot)
01502 {
01503       INT32 iCounter=0;
01504       wchar_t sString[50];
01505 //    wchar_t sStringA[ 50 ];
01506       INT16 sX, sY;
01507       UINT32 uiHits = 0;
01508       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier = &Menptr[iId];
01509       BOOLEAN     fAmIaRobot = AM_A_ROBOT( pSoldier );
01510       
01511       
01512       if( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE )
01513       {
01514             return;
01515       }
01516 
01517       // display the stats for a char
01518       for(iCounter=0;iCounter <MAX_STATS; iCounter++)
01519       {
01520             switch(iCounter)
01521             {
01522              case 0:
01523                    // health
01524                    if( Menptr[iId].bAssignment != ASSIGNMENT_POW )
01525                    {
01526                         if( gMercProfiles[Menptr[iId].ubProfile].bLifeDelta > 0 )
01527                         {
01528                               swprintf(sString, L"( %+d )", gMercProfiles[Menptr[iId].ubProfile].bLifeDelta);
01529                           FindFontRightCoordinates((INT16)(pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter].x+(iSlot*TEXT_BOX_WIDTH) + TEXT_BOX_WIDTH-20+TEXT_DELTA_OFFSET ),0,30,0,sString, PERS_FONT,  &sX, &sY);
01530                           mprintf(sX,pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter].y,sString);               
01531                         }
01532 
01533                    //else
01534                    //{
01535                          swprintf(sString, L"%d/%d",Menptr[iId].bLife,Menptr[iId].bLifeMax);
01536                    //}
01537                    }
01538                    else
01539                    {
01540                          swprintf( sString, pPOWStrings[ 1 ] );
01541                    }
01542 
01543        mprintf((INT16)(pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter].x+(iSlot*TEXT_BOX_WIDTH)),pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter].y,pPersonnelScreenStrings[PRSNL_TXT_HEALTH]);          
01544                FindFontRightCoordinates((INT16)(pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter].x+(iSlot*TEXT_BOX_WIDTH)),0,TEXT_BOX_WIDTH-20,0,sString, PERS_FONT,  &sX, &sY);
01545        mprintf(sX,pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter].y,sString);           
01546                    break;
01547              case 1:
01548                    // agility
01549                    if( !fAmIaRobot )
01550                    {
01551                          if( gMercProfiles[Menptr[iId].ubProfile].bAgilityDelta > 0 )
01552                          {
01553                                swprintf(sString, L"( %+d )", gMercProfiles[Menptr[iId].ubProfile].bAgilityDelta);
01554                                FindFontRightCoordinates((INT16)(pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter].x+(iSlot*TEXT_BOX_WIDTH) + TEXT_BOX_WIDTH-20+TEXT_DELTA_OFFSET ),0,30,0,sString, PERS_FONT,  &sX, &sY);
01555                                mprintf(sX,pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter].y,sString);                 }
01556                          //else
01557                          //{
01558                                swprintf(sString, L"%d",Menptr[iId].bAgility);
01559                          //}
01560                    }
01561                    else
01562                    {
01563                          swprintf( sString, L"%s", gpStrategicString[ STR_PB_NOTAPPLICABLE_ABBREVIATION ] );
01564                    }
01565 
01566        mprintf((INT16)(pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter].x+(iSlot*TEXT_BOX_WIDTH)),pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter].y,pPersonnelScreenStrings[iCounter]);           
01567                FindFontRightCoordinates((INT16)(pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter].x+(iSlot*TEXT_BOX_WIDTH)),0,TEXT_BOX_WIDTH-20,0,sString, PERS_FONT,  &sX, &sY);
01568        mprintf(sX,pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter].y,sString);           
01569                    break;
01570              case 2:
01571               // dexterity
01572                    if( !fAmIaRobot )
01573                    {
01574                          if( gMercProfiles[Menptr[iId].ubProfile].bDexterityDelta > 0 )
01575                          {
01576                                     swprintf(sString, L"( %+d )", gMercProfiles[Menptr[iId].ubProfile].bDexterityDelta);
01577                                     FindFontRightCoordinates((INT16)(pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter].x+(iSlot*TEXT_BOX_WIDTH) + TEXT_BOX_WIDTH-20+TEXT_DELTA_OFFSET ),0,30,0,sString, PERS_FONT,  &sX, &sY);
01578                                     mprintf(sX,pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter].y,sString);                  }
01579                          //else
01580                          //{
01581                                     swprintf(sString, L"%d",Menptr[iId].bDexterity);
01582                          //}
01583                    }
01584                    else
01585                    {
01586                          swprintf( sString, L"%s", gpStrategicString[ STR_PB_NOTAPPLICABLE_ABBREVIATION ] );
01587                    }
01588 
01589        mprintf((INT16)(pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter].x+(iSlot*TEXT_BOX_WIDTH)),pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter].y,pPersonnelScreenStrings[iCounter]);          
01590                FindFontRightCoordinates((INT16)(pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter].x+(iSlot*TEXT_BOX_WIDTH)),0,TEXT_BOX_WIDTH-20,0,sString, PERS_FONT,  &sX, &sY);
01591        mprintf(sX,pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter].y,sString);           
01592                   break;
01593              case 3:
01594              // strength
01595                    if( !fAmIaRobot )
01596                    {
01597                          if( gMercProfiles[Menptr[iId].ubProfile].bStrengthDelta > 0 )
01598                          {
01599                                     swprintf(sString, L"( %+d )", gMercProfiles[Menptr[iId].ubProfile].bStrengthDelta);
01600                                     FindFontRightCoordinates((INT16)(pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter].x+(iSlot*TEXT_BOX_WIDTH) + TEXT_BOX_WIDTH-20+TEXT_DELTA_OFFSET ),0,30,0,sString, PERS_FONT,  &sX, &sY);
01601                                     mprintf(sX,pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter].y,sString);                  }
01602                          //else
01603                          //{
01604                                     swprintf(sString, L"%d",Menptr[iId].bStrength );
01605                          //}
01606                    }
01607                    else
01608                    {
01609                          swprintf( sString, L"%s", gpStrategicString[ STR_PB_NOTAPPLICABLE_ABBREVIATION ] );
01610                    }
01611 
01612        mprintf((INT16)(pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter].x+(iSlot*TEXT_BOX_WIDTH)),pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter].y,pPersonnelScreenStrings[iCounter]);          
01613                FindFontRightCoordinates((INT16)(pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter].x+(iSlot*TEXT_BOX_WIDTH)),0,TEXT_BOX_WIDTH-20,0,sString, PERS_FONT,  &sX, &sY);
01614        mprintf(sX,pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter].y,sString);           
01615              break;
01616              case 4:
01617               // leadership
01618                    if( !fAmIaRobot )
01619                    {
01620                          if( gMercProfiles[Menptr[iId].ubProfile].bLeadershipDelta > 0 )
01621                          {
01622                                     swprintf(sString, L"( %+d )", gMercProfiles[Menptr[iId].ubProfile].bLeadershipDelta);
01623                                     FindFontRightCoordinates((INT16)(pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter].x+(iSlot*TEXT_BOX_WIDTH) + TEXT_BOX_WIDTH-20 +TEXT_DELTA_OFFSET),0,30,0,sString, PERS_FONT,  &sX, &sY);
01624                                     mprintf(sX,pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter].y,sString);                  }
01625                          //else
01626                          //{
01627                                     swprintf(sString, L"%d",Menptr[iId].bLeadership );
01628                          //}
01629                    }
01630                    else
01631                    {
01632                          swprintf( sString, L"%s", gpStrategicString[ STR_PB_NOTAPPLICABLE_ABBREVIATION ] );
01633                    }
01634 
01635        mprintf((INT16)(pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter].x+(iSlot*TEXT_BOX_WIDTH)),pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter].y,pPersonnelScreenStrings[iCounter]);          
01636                FindFontRightCoordinates((INT16)(pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter].x+(iSlot*TEXT_BOX_WIDTH)),0,TEXT_BOX_WIDTH-20,0,sString, PERS_FONT,  &sX, &sY);
01637        mprintf(sX,pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter].y,sString);           
01638              break;
01639              case 5:
01640               // wisdom
01641                    if( !fAmIaRobot )
01642                    {
01643                          if( gMercProfiles[Menptr[iId].ubProfile].bWisdomDelta > 0 )
01644                          {
01645                                     swprintf(sString, L"( %+d )", gMercProfiles[Menptr[iId].ubProfile].bWisdomDelta);
01646                                     FindFontRightCoordinates((INT16)(pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter].x+(iSlot*TEXT_BOX_WIDTH) + TEXT_BOX_WIDTH-20+TEXT_DELTA_OFFSET ),0,30,0,sString, PERS_FONT,  &sX, &sY);
01647                                     mprintf(sX,pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter].y,sString);                  
01648                          }
01649                          //else
01650                          //{
01651                                     swprintf(sString, L"%d",Menptr[iId].bWisdom );
01652                          //}
01653                    }
01654                    else
01655                    {
01656                          swprintf( sString, L"%s", gpStrategicString[ STR_PB_NOTAPPLICABLE_ABBREVIATION ] );
01657                    }
01658 
01659        mprintf((INT16)(pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter].x+(iSlot*TEXT_BOX_WIDTH)),pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter].y,pPersonnelScreenStrings[iCounter]);          
01660                FindFontRightCoordinates((INT16)(pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter].x+(iSlot*TEXT_BOX_WIDTH)),0,TEXT_BOX_WIDTH-20,0,sString, PERS_FONT,  &sX, &sY);
01661        mprintf(sX,pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter].y,sString);           
01662              break;
01663              case 6:
01664               // exper
01665                    if( !fAmIaRobot )
01666                    {
01667 
01668                          if( gMercProfiles[Menptr[iId].ubProfile].bExpLevelDelta > 0 )
01669                          {

01836              break;
01837 
01838                   // The Mercs Skills
01839                   case 19:
01840                   {
01841                         INT32 iWidth;
01842                         INT32 iMinimumX;
01843                         INT8  bScreenLocIndex = 19;   //if you change the '19', change it below in the if statement
01844 
01845                         //Display the 'Skills' text
01846                         mprintf( (INT16)( pPersonnelScreenPoints[bScreenLocIndex].x+(iSlot*TEXT_BOX_WIDTH)),pPersonnelScreenPoints[bScreenLocIndex].y,pPersonnelScreenStrings[ PRSNL_TXT_SKILLS ] );
01847

01849                         //Added support for the German version, which has potential string overrun problems.  For example, the text "Skills:" can
01850                         //overlap "NightOps (Expert)" because the German strings are much longer.  In these cases, I ensure that the right 
01851                         //justification of the traits don't overlap.  If it would, I move it over to the right.
01852                         iWidth = StringPixLength( pPersonnelScreenStrings[ PRSNL_TXT_SKILLS ], PERS_FONT );
01853                         iMinimumX = iWidth + pPersonnelScreenPoints[bScreenLocIndex].x + iSlot * TEXT_BOX_WIDTH + 2;
01854

01856                         {
01857                               INT8  bSkill1 = gMercProfiles[ Menptr[iId].ubProfile ].bSkillTrait;
01858                               INT8  bSkill2 = gMercProfiles[ Menptr[iId].ubProfile ].bSkillTrait2;
01859 
01860                               //if the 2 skills are the same, add the '(expert)' at the end
01861                               if( bSkill1 == bSkill2 && bSkill1 != NO_SKILLTRAIT )
01862                               {
01863                                     swprintf( sString, L"%s %s", gzMercSkillText[bSkill1], gzMercSkillText[NUM_SKILLTRAITS] );
01864 
01865                                     FindFontRightCoordinates((INT16)(pPersonnelScreenPoints[bScreenLocIndex].x+(iSlot*TEXT_BOX_WIDTH)),0,TEXT_BOX_WIDTH-20,0,sString, PERS_FONT,  &sX, &sY);
01866 
01867                                     //KM: April 16, 1999
01868                                     //Perform the potential overrun check
01869                                     if( sX <= iMinimumX )
01870                                     {
01871                                           FindFontRightCoordinates((INT16)(pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter].x+(iSlot*TEXT_BOX_WIDTH) + TEXT_BOX_WIDTH-20 +TEXT_DELTA_OFFSET),0,30,0,sString, PERS_FONT,  &sX, &sY);
01872                                           sX = (INT16)max( sX, iMinimumX );
01873                                     }
01874                                     
01875                                     mprintf(sX,pPersonnelScreenPoints[bScreenLocIndex].y,sString);
01876                               }
01877                               else
01878                               {
01879                                     //Display the first skill
01880                                     if( bSkill1 != NO_SKILLTRAIT )

01883 
01884                                           FindFontRightCoordinates((INT16)(pPersonnelScreenPoints[bScreenLocIndex].x+(iSlot*TEXT_BOX_WIDTH)),0,TEXT_BOX_WIDTH-20,0,sString, PERS_FONT,  &sX, &sY);
01885 
01886                                           //KM: April 16, 1999
01887                                           //Perform the potential overrun check
01888                                           sX = (INT16)max( sX, iMinimumX );
01889                                           
01890                                           mprintf(sX,pPersonnelScreenPoints[bScreenLocIndex].y,sString);
01891 
01892                                           bScreenLocIndex++;
01893                                     }
01894

01896                                     if( bSkill2 != NO_SKILLTRAIT )
01897                                     {

01899 
01900                                           FindFontRightCoordinates((INT16)(pPersonnelScreenPoints[bScreenLocIndex].x+(iSlot*TEXT_BOX_WIDTH)),0,TEXT_BOX_WIDTH-20,0,sString, PERS_FONT,  &sX, &sY);

01902                                           //KM: April 16, 1999

01904                                           sX = (INT16)max( sX, iMinimumX );
01905 
01906                                           mprintf(sX,pPersonnelScreenPoints[bScreenLocIndex].y,sString);
01907 
01908                                           bScreenLocIndex++;
01909                                     }
01910

01912                                     if( bScreenLocIndex == 19 )

01917                                           mprintf(sX,pPersonnelScreenPoints[bScreenLocIndex].y,sString);
01918                                     }
01919                               }
01920                         }
01921                    else
01922                    {
01923                          swprintf( sString, L"%s", gpStrategicString[ STR_PB_NOTAPPLICABLE_ABBREVIATION ] );
01924                    }
01925                   }
01926                   break;
01927 /*
01928              case 19:
01929                    // total contract time served
01930                   mprintf((INT16)(pPersonnelScreenPoints[24].x+(iSlot*TEXT_BOX_WIDTH)),pPersonnelScreenPoints[24].y,pPersonnelScreenStrings[18]);

01943             }

01947 
01948 
01949 INT32 GetLastMercId( void )
01950 {
01951       // rolls through list of mercs and returns how many on team
01952   SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, *pTeamSoldier;
01953   INT32 cnt=0;
01954       INT32 iCounter=0;
01955       pSoldier = MercPtrs[0]; 
01956       
01957       for ( pTeamSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ pSoldier->bTeam ].bLastID; cnt++,pTeamSoldier++)
01958             {
01959              if( ( pTeamSoldier->bActive ) && ( pTeamSoldier->bLife > 0 ) )
01960                    iCounter++;
01961             }
01962       return iCounter;
01963 }
01964 
01965 
01966 void DrawPageNumber( void )
01967 {
01968       // draws the page number
01969       
01970       wchar_t sString[10];
01971       INT16 sX, sY;
01972   INT32 iPageNumber, iLastPage;
01973   
01974       return;
01975 
01976       // get last page number, and current page too
01977       iLastPage=GetLastMercId()/MAX_SLOTS;
01978       iPageNumber=iStartPersonId/MAX_SLOTS;
01979   iPageNumber++;
01980       if(iLastPage==0)
01981        iLastPage++;
01982 
01983       // get current and last pages
01984       swprintf(sString, L"%d/%d", iPageNumber, iLastPage);
01985   
01986       // set up font
01987       SetFont(PERS_FONT);
01988       SetFontForeground(FONT_BLACK);
01989       SetFontBackground(FONT_BLACK);
01990       SetFontShadow(NO_SHADOW);
01991       
01992       // center
01993       FindFontCenterCoordinates(PAGE_X, PAGE_Y,PAGE_BOX_WIDTH, PAGE_BOX_HEIGHT, sString, PERS_FONT, &sX, &sY);
01994       
01995       // print page number
01996       mprintf(sX, sY, sString);
01997   
01998       // reset shadow
01999       SetFontShadow(DEFAULT_SHADOW);
02000 
02001       return;
02002 }
02003 
02004 
02005 void SetPersonnelButtonStates( void )
02006 {
02007       // this function will look at what page we are viewing, enable and disable buttons as needed
02008   
02009       if( ! PrevPersonnelFace( ) )
02010       {
02011             // first page, disable left buttons
02012     
02013 //          DisableButton(    giPersonnelButton[ 2 ] );
02014             DisableButton(    giPersonnelButton[ 0 ] );
02015       }
02016       else
02017       {
02018             // enable buttons
02019     NextPersonnelFace( );
02020 
02021             // enable buttons
02022 //          EnableButton( giPersonnelButton[ 2 ] );
02023             EnableButton( giPersonnelButton[ 0 ] );
02024       }
02025 
02026       if( ! NextPersonnelFace( ) )
02027       {
02028        
02029 //          DisableButton(    giPersonnelButton[ 3 ] );
02030             DisableButton(    giPersonnelButton[ 1 ] );
02031       }
02032       else
02033       {
02034     // decrement page
02035     PrevPersonnelFace( );
02036                   // enable buttons
02037 //          EnableButton( giPersonnelButton[ 3 ] );
02038             EnableButton( giPersonnelButton[ 1 ] );
02039       }
02040 
02041       return;
02042 }
02043 
02044 
02045 void RenderPersonnelScreenBackground( void )
02046 {
02047 
02048       HVOBJECT hHandle;
02049 
02050       // this fucntion will render the background for the personnel screen
02051       if( fCurrentTeamMode == TRUE )
02052       {
02053             // blit title
02054     GetVideoObject(&hHandle, guiCURRENTTEAM);
02055   
02056       }
02057       else
02058       {
02059                   // blit title
02060     GetVideoObject(&hHandle, guiDEPARTEDTEAM);
02061       }
02062 
02063       BltVideoObject( FRAME_BUFFER, hHandle, 0,DEPARTED_X, DEPARTED_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL );
02064 
02065       return;
02066 }
02067 
02068 
02069 BOOLEAN LoadPersonnelScreenBackgroundGraphics( void )
02070 {
02071       // will load the graphics for the personeel screen background
02072       VOBJECT_DESC    VObjectDesc;
02073       
02074       // departed bar
02075   VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
02076       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\departed.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
02077       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiDEPARTEDTEAM));
02078 
02079       // current bar
02080   VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
02081       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\CurrentTeam.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
02082       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiCURRENTTEAM));
02083       
02084 
02085       return ( TRUE );
02086 }
02087 
02088 void DeletePersonnelScreenBackgroundGraphics( void )
02089 {
02090       // delete background V/O's
02091 
02092       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( guiCURRENTTEAM );
02093       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( guiDEPARTEDTEAM );
02094 
02095 }
02096 
02097 void CreateDestroyButtonsForPersonnelDepartures( void )
02098 {
02099       static BOOLEAN fCreated = FALSE;
02100 
02101       // create/ destroy personnel departures buttons as needed
02102 
02103       // create button?..if not created
02104       if( ( fCreatePeronnelDepartureButton == TRUE)&&( fCreated == FALSE ) )
02105       {
02106             fCreated = TRUE;
02107       }
02108       else if( ( fCreatePeronnelDepartureButton == FALSE ) && ( fCreated == TRUE ) )
02109       {
02110             fCreated = FALSE;
02111       }
02112 
02113 
02114       return;
02115 }

02117 
02118 INT32 GetNumberOfMercsOnPlayersTeam( void )
02119 {
02120 
02121       SOLDIERTYPE *pTeamSoldier, *pSoldier;     
02122       INT32 cnt=0;
02123       INT32 iCounter = 0;
02124 
02125       
02126       
02127  
02128   // grab number on team
02129       pSoldier = MercPtrs[0]; 
02130       
02131       // no soldiers
02132       
02133       for ( pTeamSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ pSoldier->bTeam ].bLastID; cnt++, pTeamSoldier++)
02134       {
02135             if( ( pTeamSoldier->bActive) && !( pTeamSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE ) && ( pTeamSoldier->bLife > 0 ) )
02136                   iCounter++;
02137       }
02138 
02139       return ( iCounter );
02140 }
02141 
02142 
02143 INT32 GetNumberOfMercsDeadOrAliveOnPlayersTeam( void )
02144 {
02145 
02146       SOLDIERTYPE *pTeamSoldier, *pSoldier;     
02147       INT32 cnt=0;
02148       INT32 iCounter = 0;
02149 
02150       
02151       
02152  
02153   // grab number on team
02154       pSoldier = MercPtrs[0]; 
02155       
02156       // no soldiers
02157       
02158       for ( pTeamSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ pSoldier->bTeam ].bLastID; cnt++, pTeamSoldier++)
02159       {
02160             if( ( pTeamSoldier->bActive) && !( pTeamSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE ) )
02161                   iCounter++;
02162       }
02163 
02164       return ( iCounter );
02165 }
02166 
02167 void  CreateDestroyMouseRegionsForPersonnelPortraits( void )
02168 {
02169       // creates/ destroys mouse regions for portraits
02170 
02171       static BOOLEAN fCreated = FALSE;
02172       INT16 sCounter = 0;
02173 
02174       if( ( fCreated == FALSE )&&( fCreatePersonnelPortraitMouseRegions == TRUE ) )
02175       {
02176             // create regions
02177             for( sCounter = 0; sCounter < PERSONNEL_PORTRAIT_NUMBER; sCounter++ )
02178             {
02179                   MSYS_DefineRegion(&gPortraitMouseRegions[ sCounter ], ( INT16 ) ( SMALL_PORTRAIT_START_X + ( sCounter % PERSONNEL_PORTRAIT_NUMBER_WIDTH ) * SMALL_PORT_WIDTH ), ( INT16 ) ( SMALL_PORTRAIT_START_Y +  ( sCounter / PERSONNEL_PORTRAIT_NUMBER_WIDTH ) * SMALL_PORT_HEIGHT ) , ( INT16 ) ( ( SMALL_PORTRAIT_START_X ) + ( ( sCounter % PERSONNEL_PORTRAIT_NUMBER_WIDTH ) * SMALL_PORT_WIDTH )  +  SMALL_PORTRAIT_WIDTH ) , ( INT16 )( SMALL_PORTRAIT_START_Y + ( sCounter / PERSONNEL_PORTRAIT_NUMBER_WIDTH ) * SMALL_PORT_HEIGHT + SMALL_PORTRAIT_HEIGHT ),
02180                 MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST,CURSOR_LAPTOP_SCREEN, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, PersonnelPortraitCallback);
02181                   MSYS_SetRegionUserData( &gPortraitMouseRegions[ sCounter ] ,0 , sCounter );
02182                   MSYS_AddRegion( &gPortraitMouseRegions[ sCounter ] );
02183             }
02184 
02185             fCreated = TRUE;
02186 
02187       }
02188       else if( ( fCreated == TRUE ) && ( fCreatePersonnelPortraitMouseRegions == FALSE ) )
02189       {
02190             // destroy regions
02191             for( sCounter = 0; sCounter < PERSONNEL_PORTRAIT_NUMBER; sCounter++ )
02192             {
02193               MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gPortraitMouseRegions[ sCounter ] );
02194             }
02195 
02196             fCreated = FALSE;
02197       }
02198       return;
02199 }
02200 
02201 
02202 BOOLEAN DisplayPicturesOfCurrentTeam( void )
02203 {
02204       INT32 iCounter = 0;
02205       INT32 iTotalOnTeam = 0;
02206       char sTemp[100];
02207       HVOBJECT hFaceHandle;
02208   VOBJECT_DESC    VObjectDesc;
02209       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
02210       INT32 iId = 0;
02211       INT32 iCnt = 0;
02212       
02213       // will display the 20 small portraits of the current team
02214 
02215       // get number of mercs on team
02216       iTotalOnTeam = GetNumberOfMercsDeadOrAliveOnPlayersTeam( );
02217 
02218 
02219       if( ( iTotalOnTeam == 0)||( fCurrentTeamMode == FALSE ) )
02220       {
02221             // nobody on team, leave
02222             return ( TRUE );
02223       }
02224 
02225       pSoldier = MercPtrs[ iCounter ];
02226 
02227       // start id
02228       iId= gTacticalStatus.Team[ pSoldier->bTeam ].bFirstID;
02229   
02230       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < iTotalOnTeam; iCnt++ )
02231       {
02232 
02233             if( ( MercPtrs[iId + iCnt ] -> bActive == TRUE ) )
02234             {
02235                   // found the next actual guy
02236                   if( ( 50 <  MercPtrs[iId + iCnt ]  -> ubProfile )&&( 57 >   MercPtrs[iId + iCnt ] -> ubProfile ) )
02237                   {
02238                         sprintf( sTemp, "%s%03d.sti", SMALL_FACES_DIR,  gMercProfiles[ MercPtrs[ iId + iCnt ] -> ubProfile  ].ubFaceIndex );    
02239                   }
02240                   else
02241                   {
02242                         if( Menptr[ iId + iCnt ].ubProfile < 100 )
02243                         {
02244                               sprintf(sTemp, "%s%02d.sti", SMALL_FACES_DIR,   Menptr[ iId + iCnt ].ubProfile);
02245                         }
02246                         else
02247                         {
02248                               sprintf(sTemp, "%s%03d.sti", SMALL_FACES_DIR,   Menptr[ iId + iCnt ].ubProfile);
02249                         }
02250                   }
02251       
02252             VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
02253         FilenameForBPP(sTemp, VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
02254             CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiFACE));
02255 
02256             //Blt face to screen to 
02257             GetVideoObject(&hFaceHandle, guiFACE);
02258 
02259             if( Menptr[ iId + iCnt ].bLife <= 0 )
02260             {
02261                   hFaceHandle->pShades[ 0 ]           = Create16BPPPaletteShaded( hFaceHandle->pPaletteEntry, DEAD_MERC_COLOR_RED, DEAD_MERC_COLOR_GREEN, DEAD_MERC_COLOR_BLUE, TRUE );
02262                   
02263                   //set the red pallete to the face
02264                   SetObjectHandleShade( guiFACE, 0 );
02265             }
02266 
02267             
02268             
02269             BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hFaceHandle, 0,( INT16 ) ( SMALL_PORTRAIT_START_X+ ( iCounter % PERSONNEL_PORTRAIT_NUMBER_WIDTH ) * SMALL_PORT_WIDTH ), ( INT16 ) ( SMALL_PORTRAIT_START_Y + ( iCounter / PERSONNEL_PORTRAIT_NUMBER_WIDTH ) * SMALL_PORT_HEIGHT ), VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
02270             
02271             if( Menptr[ iId + iCnt ].bLife <= 0 )
02272             {
02273                   //if the merc is dead, display it
02274                   DrawTextToScreen(AimPopUpText[AIM_MEMBER_DEAD], ( INT16 ) ( SMALL_PORTRAIT_START_X+ ( iCounter % PERSONNEL_PORTRAIT_NUMBER_WIDTH ) * SMALL_PORT_WIDTH ), ( INT16 ) ( SMALL_PORTRAIT_START_Y + ( iCounter / PERSONNEL_PORTRAIT_NUMBER_WIDTH ) * SMALL_PORT_HEIGHT + SMALL_PORT_HEIGHT / 2 ), SMALL_PORTRAIT_WIDTH_NO_BORDERS, FONT10ARIAL, 145, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED );
02275             }
02276 
02277             DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiFACE);
02278             iCounter++;
02279             }
02280       }
02281 
02282       return ( TRUE );
02283 }
02284 
02285 
02286 
02287 void PersonnelPortraitCallback( MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
02288 {
02289       INT32 iPortraitId = 0;
02290       INT32 iOldPortraitId;
02291 
02292       iPortraitId = MSYS_GetRegionUserData(pRegion, 0);
02293       iOldPortraitId = iCurrentPersonSelectedId;
02294 
02295       // callback handler for the minize region that is attatched to the laptop program icon
02296       if(iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP)
02297   {
02298             // get id of portrait
02299 
02300             if( fCurrentTeamMode == TRUE )
02301             {
02302               // valid portrait, set up id
02303                   if( iPortraitId >= GetNumberOfMercsDeadOrAliveOnPlayersTeam( ) )
02304                   {
02305                     // not a valid id, leave
02306                     return;
02307                   }
02308 
02309               iCurrentPersonSelectedId = iPortraitId;
02310                   fReDrawScreenFlag = TRUE;
02311             }
02312             else
02313             {
02314                   if( iPortraitId >= GetNumberOfPastMercsOnPlayersTeam( ) )
02315                   {
02316                         return;
02317                   }
02318                   iCurrentPersonSelectedId = iPortraitId;
02319                   fReDrawScreenFlag = TRUE;
02320                   iCurPortraitId = iPortraitId;
02321             }
02322 
02323             //if the selected merc is valid, and they are a POW, change to the inventory display
02324             if( iCurrentPersonSelectedId != -1 && Menptr[ GetIdOfThisSlot( iCurrentPersonSelectedId ) ].bAssignment == ASSIGNMENT_POW && gubPersonnelInfoState == PERSONNEL_INV_BTN )
02325             {
02326                   gubPersonnelInfoState = PERSONNEL_STAT_BTN;
02327             }
02328 
02329             if( iOldPortraitId != iPortraitId )
02330             {
02331                   uiCurrentInventoryIndex = 0;
02332                   guiSliderPosition = 0;
02333             }
02334       }
02335 
02336       if( iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_UP )
02337       {
02338             if( fCurrentTeamMode == TRUE )
02339             {
02340               // valid portrait, set up id
02341                   if( iPortraitId >= GetNumberOfMercsDeadOrAliveOnPlayersTeam( ) )
02342                   {
02343                     // not a valid id, leave
02344                     return;
02345                   }
02346 
02347                   //if the user is rigt clicking on the same face
02348                   if( iCurrentPersonSelectedId == iPortraitId )
02349                   {
02350                         //increment the info page when the user right clicks
02351                         if( gubPersonnelInfoState < PERSONNEL_NUM_BTN-1 )
02352                               gubPersonnelInfoState++;
02353                         else
02354                               gubPersonnelInfoState = PERSONNEL_STAT_BTN;
02355                   }
02356                   
02357                   iCurrentPersonSelectedId = iPortraitId;
02358                   fReDrawScreenFlag = TRUE;
02359 
02360                   uiCurrentInventoryIndex = 0;
02361                   guiSliderPosition = 0;
02362 
02363                   //if the selected merc is valid, and they are a POW, change to the inventory display
02364                   if( iCurrentPersonSelectedId != -1 && Menptr[ GetIdOfThisSlot( iCurrentPersonSelectedId ) ].bAssignment == ASSIGNMENT_POW && gubPersonnelInfoState == PERSONNEL_INV_BTN)
02365                   {
02366                         gubPersonnelInfoState = PERSONNEL_STAT_BTN;
02367                   }
02368             }
02369       }
02370 }
02371 
02372 
02373 void DisplayFaceOfDisplayedMerc( )
02374 {
02375       // valid person?, display
02376       
02377       if( iCurrentPersonSelectedId != -1 )
02378       {
02379             // highlight it
02380             DisplayHighLightBox( );
02381 
02382             // if showing inventory, leave
02383             
02384             if( fCurrentTeamMode == TRUE )
02385             {
02386                   RenderPersonnelFace(  GetIdOfThisSlot( iCurrentPersonSelectedId ), 0, FALSE, FALSE, FALSE );
02387                   DisplayCharName(  GetIdOfThisSlot( iCurrentPersonSelectedId ), 0 );
02388 
02389 //                if( fShowInventory == TRUE )
02390                   if( gubPersonnelInfoState == PRSNL_INV )
02391                   {
02392                         return;
02393                   }
02394 
02395           RenderPersonnelStats(  GetIdOfThisSlot( iCurrentPersonSelectedId ), 0 );
02396               
02397             }
02398             else
02399             {
02400                   RenderPersonnelFace(  GetIdOfPastMercInSlot( iCurrentPersonSelectedId ), 0, IsPastMercDead( iCurrentPersonSelectedId ), IsPastMercFired( iCurrentPersonSelectedId ), IsPastMercOther( iCurrentPersonSelectedId ) );
02401                   DisplayDepartedCharName(  GetIdOfPastMercInSlot( iCurrentPersonSelectedId ), 0, GetTheStateOfDepartedMerc( GetIdOfPastMercInSlot( iCurrentPersonSelectedId  ) ) );
02402 
02403 //                if( fShowInventory == TRUE )
02404                   if( gubPersonnelInfoState == PRSNL_INV )
02405                   {
02406                         return;
02407                   }
02408 
02409                   DisplayDepartedCharStats( GetIdOfPastMercInSlot( iCurrentPersonSelectedId ), 0, GetTheStateOfDepartedMerc( GetIdOfPastMercInSlot( iCurrentPersonSelectedId  ) ) );
02410 
02411             }
02412             
02413 
02414       }
02415 
02416       return;
02417 }
02418 
02419 void DisplayInventoryForSelectedChar( void )
02420 {
02421 
02422       // display the inventory for this merc
02423 //    if( fShowInventory == FALSE )
02424       if( gubPersonnelInfoState != PRSNL_INV )
02425       {
02426             return;
02427       }
02428 
02429       CreateDestroyPersonnelInventoryScrollButtons( );
02430 
02431       if( fCurrentTeamMode == TRUE )
02432       {
02433             RenderInventoryForCharacter( GetIdOfThisSlot( iCurrentPersonSelectedId ), 0 );
02434       }
02435       else
02436       {
02437             RenderInventoryForCharacter( GetIdOfPastMercInSlot( iCurrentPersonSelectedId ), 0 );
02438       }
02439 
02440       return;
02441 }
02442 
02443 void RenderInventoryForCharacter( INT32 iId, INT32 iSlot )
02444 {
02445       UINT8 ubCounter = 0;
02446       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
02447       INT16 sIndex;
02448       HVOBJECT hHandle;
02449       ETRLEObject *pTrav;
02450       INVTYPE                 *pItem;
02451       INT16                   PosX, PosY, sCenX, sCenY;
02452       UINT32                  usHeight, usWidth;
02453       UINT8 ubItemCount = 0;
02454       UINT8 ubUpToCount = 0;
02455       INT16 sX, sY;
02456       CHAR16 sString[ 128 ];
02457       INT32 cnt = 0;
02458       INT32 iTotalAmmo = 0;
02459 
02460       GetVideoObject(&hHandle, guiPersonnelInventory);
02461   BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hHandle, 0,( INT16 ) ( iScreenWidthOffset + 397 ), ( INT16 ) ( iScreenHeightOffset + 200 ), VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
02462 
02463       if( fCurrentTeamMode == FALSE )
02464       {
02465             return;
02466       }
02467 
02468       // render the bar for the character
02469       RenderSliderBarForPersonnelInventory( );
02470 
02471       pSoldier = &Menptr[ iId ];
02472 
02473       //if this is a robot, dont display any inventory
02474       if( AM_A_ROBOT( pSoldier ) )
02475       {
02476             return;
02477       }
02478       
02479       for( ubCounter = 0; ubCounter < NUM_INV_SLOTS; ubCounter++ )
02480       {
02481             PosX = iScreenWidthOffset + 397 + 3;
02482             PosY = iScreenHeightOffset + 200 + 8 +( ubItemCount * ( 29 ) );
02483 
02484             //if the character is a robot, only display the inv for the hand pos
02485             if( pSoldier->ubProfile == ROBOT && ubCounter != HANDPOS )
02486             {
02487                   continue;
02488             }
02489 
02490             if( pSoldier->inv[ ubCounter ].ubNumberOfObjects )
02491             {
02492                   if( uiCurrentInventoryIndex > ubUpToCount )
02493                   {
02494                         ubUpToCount++;
02495                   }
02496                   else
02497                   {
02498                         sIndex = ( pSoldier->inv[ ubCounter ].usItem );
02499                         pItem = &Item[ sIndex ];
02500                         
02501                         GetVideoObject( &hHandle, GetInterfaceGraphicForItem( pItem ) );
02502                         pTrav = &(hHandle->pETRLEObject[ pItem->ubGraphicNum ] );
02503             
02504                         usHeight                      = (UINT32)pTrav->usHeight;
02505                         usWidth                             = (UINT32)pTrav->usWidth;
02506 
02507                         sCenX = PosX + ( abs( 57 - usWidth ) /  2 ) - pTrav->sOffsetX;
02508                         sCenY = PosY + ( abs( 22 - usHeight ) / 2 ) - pTrav->sOffsetY;
02509 
02510                         // shadow
02511                         if(gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_SHOW_ITEM_SHADOW ]) BltVideoObjectOutlineShadowFromIndex( FRAME_BUFFER, GetInterfaceGraphicForItem( pItem ), pItem->ubGraphicNum, sCenX-2, sCenY+2);
02512                         
02513                         //blt the item
02514                         BltVideoObjectOutlineFromIndex( FRAME_BUFFER, GetInterfaceGraphicForItem( pItem ), pItem->ubGraphicNum, sCenX, sCenY, 0, FALSE );
02515                         
02516                         SetFont( FONT10ARIAL );
02517                         SetFontForeground( FONT_WHITE );
02518                         SetFontBackground( FONT_BLACK );
02519                         SetFontDestBuffer( FRAME_BUFFER, 0,0,SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT, FALSE );
02520                         
02521                         // grab item name
02522                         LoadItemInfo(sIndex, sString, NULL );
02523                         
02524                         // shorten if needed
02525                         if( StringPixLength( sString, FONT10ARIAL) > ( 171 - 75 ) )
02526                         {
02527                               ReduceStringLength( sString, ( 171 - 75 ), FONT10ARIAL );
02528                         }
02529 
02530                         // print name
02531                         mprintf( PosX + 65, PosY + 3, sString );
02532 
02533                         // condition
02534                         if ( Item[pSoldier->inv[ ubCounter ].usItem ].usItemClass & IC_AMMO )
02535                         {
02536                               // Ammo
02537                               iTotalAmmo = 0;
02538                               if( pSoldier->inv[ ubCounter ].ubNumberOfObjects > 1 )
02539                               {
02540                                     for( cnt = 0; cnt < pSoldier->inv[ ubCounter ].ubNumberOfObjects; cnt++ )
02541                                     {
02542                                           // get total ammo
02543                                           iTotalAmmo+= pSoldier->inv[ ubCounter ].ubShotsLeft[cnt];
02544                                     }
02545                               }
02546                               else
02547                               {
02548                                           iTotalAmmo= pSoldier->inv[ ubCounter ].ubShotsLeft[ 0 ];
02549                               } 
02550 
02551                               swprintf( sString, L"%d/%d", iTotalAmmo, ( pSoldier->inv[ ubCounter ].ubNumberOfObjects * Magazine[ Item[pSoldier->inv[ ubCounter ].usItem ].ubClassIndex ].ubMagSize ) );
02552                               FindFontRightCoordinates( ( INT16 )( PosX + 65 ), ( INT16 ) ( PosY + 15 ), ( INT16 ) ( 171 - 75 ), 
02553                               ( INT16 )( GetFontHeight( FONT10ARIAL ) ), sString, FONT10ARIAL, &sX, &sY );
02554                         }
02555                         else
02556                         {
02557                                     swprintf( sString, L"%2d%%%%", pSoldier->inv[ ubCounter ].bStatus[0] );
02558                                     FindFontRightCoordinates( ( INT16 )( PosX + 65 ), ( INT16 ) ( PosY + 15 ), ( INT16 ) ( 171 - 75 ), 
02559                                           ( INT16 )( GetFontHeight( FONT10ARIAL ) ), sString, FONT10ARIAL, &sX, &sY );
02560                                     
02561                                     sX += StringPixLength( L"%", FONT10ARIAL );
02562                         }
02563 
02564                   
02565                         
02566                         mprintf( sX, sY, sString );
02567                         
02568                         if ( Item[pSoldier->inv[ ubCounter ].usItem ].usItemClass & IC_GUN )
02569                         {
02570                               swprintf( sString, L"%s", AmmoCaliber[ Weapon[ Item[  pSoldier->inv[ ubCounter ].usItem ].ubClassIndex ].ubCalibre ]);
02571                               
02572                               // shorten if needed
02573                               if( StringPixLength( sString, FONT10ARIAL) > ( 171 - 75 ) )
02574                               {
02575                                     ReduceStringLength( sString, ( 171 - 75 ), FONT10ARIAL );
02576                               }
02577                               
02578                               // print name
02579                               mprintf( PosX + 65, PosY + 15 , sString );
02580 
02581 
02582                         }
02583                         
02584                         // if more than 1?
02585                         if( pSoldier->inv[ ubCounter ].ubNumberOfObjects > 1 )
02586                         {
02587                               swprintf( sString, L"x%d",  pSoldier->inv[ ubCounter ].ubNumberOfObjects );
02588                               FindFontRightCoordinates( ( INT16 )( PosX ), ( INT16 ) ( PosY + 15 ), ( INT16 ) ( 58 ), 
02589                                     ( INT16 )( GetFontHeight( FONT10ARIAL ) ), sString, FONT10ARIAL, &sX, &sY );
02590                               mprintf( sX, sY, sString );
02591                         }
02592 
02593                         // display info about it
02594 
02595                         ubItemCount++;
02596                   }
02597             }
02598 
02599             if( ubItemCount == NUMBER_OF_INVENTORY_PERSONNEL )
02600             {
02601                   ubCounter = NUM_INV_SLOTS;
02602             }
02603       }
02604       
02605 
02606 
02607       return;
02608 }
02609 
02610 
02611 void InventoryUpButtonCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
02612 {
02613       INT32 iValue = 0;
02614       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier = MercPtrs[ 0 ];
02615       INT32 cnt = 0;
02616       INT32 iId = 0;
02617 
02618       if (!(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_ENABLED))
02619             return;
02620 
02621 
02622       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
02623       {
02624     btn->uiFlags|=(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);   
02625       }
02626       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
02627       {
02628             if( btn->uiFlags & (BUTTON_CLICKED_ON) )
02629             {
02630                   btn->uiFlags &= ~(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
02631 
02632                   if( uiCurrentInventoryIndex == 0 )
02633                   {
02634                         return;
02635                   }
02636                   
02637                   // up one element
02638                   uiCurrentInventoryIndex--;
02639                   fReDrawScreenFlag = TRUE;
02640 
02641                   FindPositionOfPersInvSlider( );
02642             }
02643       }
02644       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_REPEAT )
02645       {
02646             if( uiCurrentInventoryIndex == 0 )
02647             {
02648                   return;
02649             }
02650 
02651             // up one element
02652             uiCurrentInventoryIndex--;
02653             fReDrawScreenFlag = TRUE;
02654             FindPositionOfPersInvSlider( );
02655       }
02656 }
02657 
02658 
02659 void InventoryDownButtonCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
02660 {
02661       INT32 iValue = 0;
02662       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier = MercPtrs[ 0 ];
02663       INT32 cnt = 0;
02664       INT32 iId = 0;
02665 
02666       if (!(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_ENABLED))
02667             return;
02668 
02669 
02670       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_REPEAT )
02671       {
02672             if( ( INT32 )uiCurrentInventoryIndex >= ( INT32 )( GetNumberOfInventoryItemsOnCurrentMerc( ) - NUMBER_OF_INVENTORY_PERSONNEL ) )
02673             {
02674                   return;
02675             }
02676 
02677             // up one element
02678             uiCurrentInventoryIndex++;
02679             fReDrawScreenFlag = TRUE;
02680             FindPositionOfPersInvSlider( );
02681 
02682       }
02683       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
02684       {
02685     btn->uiFlags|=(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);   
02686       }
02687       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
02688       {
02689             if( btn->uiFlags & (BUTTON_CLICKED_ON) )
02690             {
02691                   btn->uiFlags &= ~(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
02692 
02693                   if( ( INT32 )uiCurrentInventoryIndex >= ( INT32 )( GetNumberOfInventoryItemsOnCurrentMerc( ) - NUMBER_OF_INVENTORY_PERSONNEL ) )
02694                   {
02695                         return;
02696                   }
02697                   
02698                   // up one element
02699                   uiCurrentInventoryIndex++;
02700                   fReDrawScreenFlag = TRUE;
02701 
02702                   FindPositionOfPersInvSlider( );
02703 
02704             }
02705       }
02706       
02707 }
02708 
02709 
02710 // decide which buttons can and can't be accessed based on what the current item is
02711 void EnableDisableInventoryScrollButtons( void )
02712 {
02713 //    if( fShowInventory == FALSE )
02714       if( gubPersonnelInfoState != PRSNL_INV )
02715       {
02716             return;
02717       }
02718 
02719       if( uiCurrentInventoryIndex == 0 )
02720       {
02721             ButtonList[ giPersonnelInventoryButtons[ 0 ] ]->uiFlags &= ~( BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
02722             DisableButton( giPersonnelInventoryButtons[ 0 ] );    
02723       }
02724       else
02725       {
02726             EnableButton( giPersonnelInventoryButtons[ 0 ] );
02727       }
02728       
02729       
02730       if( ( INT32 )uiCurrentInventoryIndex >= ( INT32 )( GetNumberOfInventoryItemsOnCurrentMerc( ) - NUMBER_OF_INVENTORY_PERSONNEL ) )
02731       {
02732             ButtonList[ giPersonnelInventoryButtons[ 1 ] ]->uiFlags &= ~( BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
02733             DisableButton( giPersonnelInventoryButtons[ 1 ] );
02734       }
02735       else
02736       {
02737             EnableButton( giPersonnelInventoryButtons[ 1 ] );
02738       }
02739 
02740 
02741       return;
02742 }
02743 
02744 INT32 GetNumberOfInventoryItemsOnCurrentMerc( void )
02745 {
02746       INT32 iId = 0;
02747       UINT8 ubCounter = 0;
02748       UINT8 ubCount = 0;
02749       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
02750 
02751       // in current team mode?..nope...move on
02752       if( fCurrentTeamMode == FALSE )
02753       {
02754             return( 0 );
02755       }
02756 
02757       iId = GetIdOfThisSlot( iCurrentPersonSelectedId );
02758 
02759       pSoldier = &Menptr[ iId ];
02760 
02761       for( ubCounter = 0; ubCounter < NUM_INV_SLOTS; ubCounter++ )
02762       {
02763             if( ( pSoldier->inv[ ubCounter ].ubNumberOfObjects ) && ( pSoldier->inv[ ubCounter ].usItem) )
02764             {
02765                   ubCount++;
02766             }
02767       }
02768 
02769       return( ubCount );
02770 }
02771 
02772 void CreateDestroyPersonnelInventoryScrollButtons( void )
02773 {
02774       static BOOLEAN fCreated = FALSE;
02775 
02776 //    if( ( fShowInventory == TRUE ) && ( fCreated == FALSE ) )
02777       if( ( gubPersonnelInfoState == PRSNL_INV ) && ( fCreated == FALSE ) )
02778       {
02779             // create buttons
02780             giPersonnelInventoryButtonsImages[ 0 ]=  LoadButtonImage( "LAPTOP\\personnel_inventory.sti" ,-1,1,-1,2,-1 );
02781         giPersonnelInventoryButtons[ 0 ] = QuickCreateButton( giPersonnelInventoryButtonsImages[0], iScreenWidthOffset + 176 + 397, iScreenHeightOffset + 2 + 200,            
02782                           BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST - 1,
02783                                                                   BtnGenericMouseMoveButtonCallback, (GUI_CALLBACK)InventoryUpButtonCallback);
02784 
02785             giPersonnelInventoryButtonsImages[ 1 ]=  LoadButtonImage( "LAPTOP\\personnel_inventory.sti" ,-1,3,-1,4,-1 );
02786         giPersonnelInventoryButtons[ 1 ] = QuickCreateButton( giPersonnelInventoryButtonsImages[1], iScreenWidthOffset + 397 + 176, iScreenHeightOffset + 200 + 223,          
02787                           BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST - 1,
02788                                                                   BtnGenericMouseMoveButtonCallback, (GUI_CALLBACK)InventoryDownButtonCallback);
02789 
02790                   // set up cursors for these buttons
02791             SetButtonCursor( giPersonnelInventoryButtons[ 0 ], CURSOR_LAPTOP_SCREEN);
02792         SetButtonCursor( giPersonnelInventoryButtons[ 1 ], CURSOR_LAPTOP_SCREEN);
02793 
02794             MSYS_DefineRegion( &gMouseScrollPersonnelINV, X_OF_PERSONNEL_SCROLL_REGION, Y_OF_PERSONNEL_SCROLL_REGION, X_OF_PERSONNEL_SCROLL_REGION + X_SIZE_OF_PERSONNEL_SCROLL_REGION, Y_OF_PERSONNEL_SCROLL_REGION + Y_SIZE_OF_PERSONNEL_SCROLL_REGION,
02795                   MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST - 3, CURSOR_LAPTOP_SCREEN, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, HandleSliderBarClickCallback );
02796 
02797             fCreated = TRUE;
02798       }
02799 //    else if( ( fCreated == TRUE ) && ( fShowInventory == FALSE ) )
02800       else if( ( fCreated == TRUE ) && ( gubPersonnelInfoState != PERSONNEL_INV_BTN ) )
02801       {
02802             // destroy buttons
02803             RemoveButton(giPersonnelInventoryButtons[0] );
02804         UnloadButtonImage(giPersonnelInventoryButtonsImages[0] );
02805         RemoveButton(giPersonnelInventoryButtons[1] );
02806         UnloadButtonImage(giPersonnelInventoryButtonsImages[1] );
02807 
02808             MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gMouseScrollPersonnelINV );
02809 
02810             fCreated = FALSE;
02811       }
02812 }

02814 void DisplayNumberOnCurrentTeam( void )
02815 {
02816       // display number on team
02817       CHAR16 sString[ 32 ];
02818       INT16 sX = 0, sY = 0;
02819 
02820 
02821       // font stuff
02822       SetFont( FONT10ARIAL );
02823       SetFontBackground( FONT_BLACK );
02824       SetFontForeground( PERS_TEXT_FONT_COLOR );
02825 
02826       if( fCurrentTeamMode == TRUE )
02827       {
02828             swprintf( sString, L"%s ( %d )", pPersonelTeamStrings[ 0 ], GetNumberOfMercsDeadOrAliveOnPlayersTeam( ) );
02829             sX = PERS_CURR_TEAM_X;
02830       }
02831       else
02832       {
02833             swprintf( sString, L"%s", pPersonelTeamStrings[ 0 ] );
02834 
02835             FindFontCenterCoordinates( PERS_CURR_TEAM_X, 0, 65, 0,sString, FONT10ARIAL, &sX, &sY );
02836 
02837       }
02838 
02839       mprintf( sX, PERS_CURR_TEAM_Y, sString );
02840       
02841       // now the cost of the current team, if applicable
02842       DisplayCostOfCurrentTeam( );
02843 
02844       return;
02845 }

02877 
02878 INT32 GetTotalDailyCostOfCurrentTeam( void )
02879 {
02880       // will return the total daily cost of the current team
02881 
02882       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;  
02883       INT32 cnt=0;
02884       INT32 iCounter = 0;
02885       INT32 iCostOfTeam = 0;
02886 
02887 
02888        // first grunt
02889       pSoldier = MercPtrs[0]; 
02890 
02891       // not active?..return cost of zero
02892 
02893       // run through active soldiers
02894       for ( pSoldier = MercPtrs[ 0 ]; cnt <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ OUR_TEAM ].bLastID; cnt++ )
02895       {
02896             pSoldier = MercPtrs[cnt];     
02897 
02898              if( ( pSoldier->bActive) && ( pSoldier->bLife > 0 ) )
02899              {
02900                    
02901                    // valid soldier, get cost
02902                    if( pSoldier->ubWhatKindOfMercAmI == MERC_TYPE__AIM_MERC)
02903                    {
02904                          // daily rate
02905                          if( pSoldier->bTypeOfLastContract == CONTRACT_EXTEND_2_WEEK )
02906                          {
02907                                // 2 week contract
02908                            iCostOfTeam += gMercProfiles[pSoldier->ubProfile].uiBiWeeklySalary / 14;
02909                          }
02910                          else if( pSoldier->bTypeOfLastContract == CONTRACT_EXTEND_1_WEEK )
02911                          {
02912                                // 1 week contract
02913                            iCostOfTeam += gMercProfiles[ pSoldier->ubProfile ].uiWeeklySalary / 7 ;
02914                          }
02915                          else
02916                          {
02917 
02918                                iCostOfTeam += gMercProfiles[ pSoldier->ubProfile ].sSalary;
02919                          }
02920                    }
02921                    else if( pSoldier->ubWhatKindOfMercAmI == MERC_TYPE__MERC)
02922                    {
02923                          // MERC Merc
02924                          iCostOfTeam += gMercProfiles[ pSoldier->ubProfile ].sSalary;
02925                    }
02926                    else
02927                    {
02928                               // no cost
02929                          iCostOfTeam += 0;
02930                    }
02931             }
02932       }
02933       return iCostOfTeam;
02934 }
02935 
02936 INT32 GetLowestDailyCostOfCurrentTeam( void )
02937 {
02938       // will return the lowest daily cost of the current team
02939 
02940       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;  
02941       INT32 cnt=0;
02942       INT32 iCounter = 0;
02943       INT32 iLowest = 999999;
02944 //    INT32 iId =0;
02945       INT32 iCost = 0;
02946 
02947        // first grunt
02948       pSoldier = MercPtrs[0]; 
02949 
02950       // not active?..return cost of zero
02951 
02952       // run through active soldiers
02953       for ( pSoldier = MercPtrs[ 0 ]; cnt <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ OUR_TEAM ].bLastID; cnt++ )
02954       {
02955             pSoldier = MercPtrs[cnt];
02956 
02957             if( ( pSoldier->bActive ) && !( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE ) && ( pSoldier->bLife > 0 ) )
02958             {
02959                    // valid soldier, get cost
02960                    if( pSoldier->ubWhatKindOfMercAmI == MERC_TYPE__AIM_MERC)
02961                    {
02962                          // daily rate
02963                          if( pSoldier->bTypeOfLastContract == CONTRACT_EXTEND_2_WEEK )
02964                          {
02965                                // 2 week contract
02966                            iCost = gMercProfiles[ pSoldier->ubProfile ].uiBiWeeklySalary / 14;
02967                          }
02968                          else if( pSoldier->bTypeOfLastContract == CONTRACT_EXTEND_1_WEEK )
02969                          {
02970                                // 1 week contract
02971                            iCost = gMercProfiles[ pSoldier->ubProfile ].uiWeeklySalary / 7 ;
02972                          }
02973                          else
02974                          {
02975 
02976                                iCost = gMercProfiles[ pSoldier->ubProfile ].sSalary;
02977                          }
02978                    }
02979                    else if( pSoldier->ubWhatKindOfMercAmI == MERC_TYPE__MERC)
02980                    {
02981                          // MERC Merc
02982                          iCost = gMercProfiles[ pSoldier->ubProfile ].sSalary;
02983                    }
02984                    else
02985                    {
02986                               // no cost
02987                          iCost = 0;
02988                    }
02989 
02990                    if( iCost <= iLowest )
02991                    {
02992                          iLowest = iCost;
02993                    }
02994              }
02995              
02996             }
02997 
02998       // if no mercs, send 0
02999       if( iLowest == 999999 )
03000       {
03001             iLowest = 0;
03002       }
03003 
03004 
03005       return iLowest;
03006 }
03007 
03008 
03009 INT32 GetHighestDailyCostOfCurrentTeam( void )
03010 {
03011       // will return the lowest daily cost of the current team
03012 
03013       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;  
03014       INT32 cnt=0;
03015       INT32 iCounter = 0;
03016       INT32 iHighest = 0;
03017 //    INT32 iId =0;
03018       INT32 iCost = 0;
03019 
03020        // first grunt
03021       pSoldier = MercPtrs[0]; 
03022 
03023       // not active?..return cost of zero
03024 
03025       // run through active soldiers
03026       for ( pSoldier = MercPtrs[0]; cnt <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ OUR_TEAM ].bLastID; cnt++)
03027       {
03028             pSoldier = MercPtrs[cnt];
03029 
03030              if( ( pSoldier->bActive) && !( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE ) && ( pSoldier->bLife > 0 ) )
03031              {
03032                    
03033                    // valid soldier, get cost
03034                    if( pSoldier->ubWhatKindOfMercAmI == MERC_TYPE__AIM_MERC)
03035                    {
03036                          // daily rate
03037                          if( pSoldier->bTypeOfLastContract == CONTRACT_EXTEND_2_WEEK )
03038                          {
03039                                // 2 week contract
03040                            iCost = gMercProfiles[ pSoldier->ubProfile ].uiBiWeeklySalary / 14;
03041                          }
03042                          else if( pSoldier->bTypeOfLastContract == CONTRACT_EXTEND_1_WEEK  )
03043                          {
03044                                // 1 week contract
03045                            iCost = gMercProfiles[ pSoldier->ubProfile ].uiWeeklySalary / 7 ;
03046                          }
03047                          else
03048                          {
03049 
03050                                iCost = gMercProfiles[ pSoldier->ubProfile ].sSalary;
03051                          }
03052                    }
03053                    else if( pSoldier->ubWhatKindOfMercAmI == MERC_TYPE__MERC)
03054                    {
03055                          // MERC Merc
03056                          iCost = gMercProfiles[ pSoldier->ubProfile ].sSalary;
03057                    }
03058                    else
03059                    {
03060                               // no cost
03061                          iCost = 0;
03062                    }
03063 
03064                    
03065                    if( iCost >= iHighest )
03066                    {
03067                          iHighest = iCost;
03068                    }
03069              }
03070              
03071             }
03072       return iHighest;
03073 }
