03077 void DisplayCostOfCurrentTeam( void )
03078 {
03079       // display number on team
03080       CHAR16 sString[ 32 ];
03081       INT16 sX, sY;
03082       
03083       
03084       // font stuff
03085       SetFont( FONT10ARIAL );
03086       SetFontBackground( FONT_BLACK );
03087       SetFontForeground( PERS_TEXT_FONT_COLOR );
03088 
03089       if( fCurrentTeamMode == TRUE )
03090       {
03091 
03092             // daily cost
03093             mprintf(  PERS_CURR_TEAM_COST_X, PERS_CURR_TEAM_COST_Y, pPersonelTeamStrings[ 2 ] );
03094 
03095         swprintf( sString, L"%d", GetTotalDailyCostOfCurrentTeam( ) );
03096             InsertCommasForDollarFigure( sString );
03097             InsertDollarSignInToString( sString );
03098 
03099             FindFontRightCoordinates((INT16)(PERS_CURR_TEAM_COST_X),0,PERS_CURR_TEAM_WIDTH,0,sString, PERS_FONT,  &sX, &sY);
03100 
03101             mprintf( sX ,PERS_CURR_TEAM_COST_Y, sString );
03102 
03103             // highest cost
03104             mprintf(  PERS_CURR_TEAM_COST_X, PERS_CURR_TEAM_HIGHEST_Y, pPersonelTeamStrings[ 3 ] );
03105 
03106         swprintf( sString, L"%d", GetHighestDailyCostOfCurrentTeam( ) );
03107             InsertCommasForDollarFigure( sString );
03108             InsertDollarSignInToString( sString );
03109 
03110             FindFontRightCoordinates((INT16)(PERS_CURR_TEAM_COST_X),0,PERS_CURR_TEAM_WIDTH,0,sString, PERS_FONT,  &sX, &sY);
03111 
03112             mprintf( sX ,PERS_CURR_TEAM_HIGHEST_Y, sString );
03113 
03114             // the lowest cost
03115             mprintf(  PERS_CURR_TEAM_COST_X, PERS_CURR_TEAM_LOWEST_Y, pPersonelTeamStrings[ 4 ] );
03116 
03117         swprintf( sString, L"%d", GetLowestDailyCostOfCurrentTeam( ) );
03118             InsertCommasForDollarFigure( sString );
03119             InsertDollarSignInToString( sString );
03120 
03121             FindFontRightCoordinates((INT16)(PERS_CURR_TEAM_COST_X),0,PERS_CURR_TEAM_WIDTH,0,sString, PERS_FONT,  &sX, &sY);
03122 
03123             mprintf( sX ,PERS_CURR_TEAM_LOWEST_Y, sString );
03124 
03125 
03126       }
03127       else
03128       {
03129             // do nothing
03130             return;
03131       }
03132 }
03133 
03134 INT32 GetIdOfDepartedMercWithHighestStat( INT32 iStat )
03135 {
03136       // will return the id value of the merc on the players team with highest in this stat
03137   // -1 means error
03138       INT32 iId = -1;
03139       INT32 iValue =0;
03140       MERCPROFILESTRUCT *pTeamSoldier;
03141       INT32 cnt=0;
03142       INT32 iCounter =0;
03143       INT8 bCurrentList = 0;
03144       INT16 *bCurrentListValue = LaptopSaveInfo.ubDeadCharactersList;
03145       BOOLEAN fNotDone = TRUE;
03146       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
03147       UINT32 uiLoopCounter;
03148 
03149 
03150       // run through active soldiers
03151 //    while( fNotDone )
03152       for( uiLoopCounter=0; fNotDone ; uiLoopCounter++ )
03153       {
03154 /*
03155             // check if we are in fact not done
03156             if( ( bCurrentList == 2 ) && ( *bCurrentListValue == -1 ) )
03157             {
03158                   fNotDone = FALSE;
03159                   continue;
03160             }
03161 */
03162             //if we are at the end of
03163             if( uiLoopCounter == 255 && bCurrentList == 2 )
03164             {
03165                   fNotDone = FALSE;
03166                   continue;
03167             }
03168 
03169             // check if we need to move to the next list
03170 //          if( *bCurrentListValue == -1 )
03171             if( uiLoopCounter == 255 )
03172             {
03173                   if( bCurrentList == 0 )
03174                   {
03175                         bCurrentList = 1;
03176                     bCurrentListValue = LaptopSaveInfo.ubLeftCharactersList;
03177                   }
03178                   else if( bCurrentList == 1 )
03179                   {
03180                         bCurrentList = 2;
03181                         bCurrentListValue = LaptopSaveInfo.ubOtherCharactersList;
03182                   }
03183             
03184                   //reset the loop counter
03185                   uiLoopCounter = 0;
03186             }
03187 
03188             // get the id of the grunt
03189             cnt = *bCurrentListValue;
03190 
03191             // do we need to reset the count?
03192             if( cnt == -1 )
03193             {
03194                   bCurrentListValue++;
03195                   continue;
03196             }
03197 
03198             pTeamSoldier = &( gMercProfiles[ cnt ] );
03199 
03200             switch( iStat )
03201             {
03202                   case 0:
03203                   // health
03204 
03205                         //if the soldier is a pow, dont use the health cause it aint known 
03206                   pSoldier = FindSoldierByProfileID( (UINT8)cnt, FALSE );
03207                   if( pSoldier && pSoldier->bAssignment == ASSIGNMENT_POW )
03208                   {
03209                         continue;
03210                   }
03211 
03212                   if( pTeamSoldier ->  bLife >= iValue )
03213                   {
03214                         iId = cnt;
03215                         iValue = pTeamSoldier -> bLife;
03216                   }
03217                   break;
03218               case 1:
03219               // agility
03220                   if( pTeamSoldier ->  bAgility >= iValue )
03221                   {
03222                         iId = cnt;
03223                         iValue = pTeamSoldier -> bAgility;
03224                   }
03225                   break;
03226                   case 2:
03227                   // dexterity
03228                   if( pTeamSoldier ->  bDexterity >= iValue )
03229                   {
03230                               iId = cnt;
03231                               iValue = pTeamSoldier -> bDexterity;
03232                   }
03233                   break;
03234                   case 3:
03235                   // strength
03236       if(  pTeamSoldier -> bStrength >= iValue )
03237                   {
03238                         iId = cnt;
03239                         iValue = pTeamSoldier -> bStrength;
03240                   }      
03241                   break;
03242                   case 4:
03243                   // leadership
03244       if(  pTeamSoldier -> bLeadership >= iValue )
03245                   {
03246                         iId = cnt;
03247                         iValue = pTeamSoldier -> bLeadership;
03248                   }      
03249                   break;
03250                   case 5:
03251               // wisdom
03252                   if(  pTeamSoldier -> bWisdom >= iValue )
03253                   {
03254                         iId = cnt;
03255                         iValue = pTeamSoldier -> bWisdom;
03256                   }
03257                   break;
03258                   case 6:
03259                   // exper
03260       if( pTeamSoldier -> bExpLevel >= iValue )
03261                   {
03262                         iId = cnt;
03263                         iValue = pTeamSoldier -> bExpLevel;
03264                   }  
03265 
03266                   break;
03267                   case 7:
03268                   //mrkmanship
03269                   if(  pTeamSoldier -> bMarksmanship >= iValue )
03270                   {
03271                               iId = cnt;
03272                               iValue = pTeamSoldier -> bMarksmanship;
03273                   }
03274                          
03275               break;
03276                   case 8:
03277                   // mech
03278                   if(  pTeamSoldier -> bMechanical >= iValue )
03279                   {
03280                         iId = cnt;
03281                         iValue = pTeamSoldier -> bMechanical;
03282                   }
03283               break;
03284                   case 9:
03285                   // exp
03286                   if(pTeamSoldier -> bExplosive >= iValue )
03287                   {
03288                         iId = cnt;
03289                         iValue = pTeamSoldier -> bExplosive;
03290                   }
03291                   break;
03292                   case 10:
03293                   // med
03294                   if(  pTeamSoldier -> bMedical >= iValue )
03295                   {
03296                               iId = cnt;
03297                               iValue = pTeamSoldier -> bMedical;
03298                   }
03299                   break;
03300             }
03301 
03302             bCurrentListValue++;
03303       }     
03304 
03305 
03306       return( iId );
03307 }
03308

03407                   }
03408                   break;
03409                   case 3:
03410                   // strength
03411       if(  pTeamSoldier -> bStrength < iValue )

03456                         iValue = pTeamSoldier -> bMechanical;
03457                   }
03458               break;
03459                   case 9:
03460                   // exp
03461                   if(pTeamSoldier -> bExplosive < iValue )
03462                   {
03463                         iId = cnt;
03464                         iValue = pTeamSoldier -> bExplosive;
03465                   }
03466                   break;
03467                   case 10:
03468                   // med
03469                   if(  pTeamSoldier -> bMedical < iValue )
03470                   {
03471                               iId = cnt;
03472                               iValue = pTeamSoldier -> bMedical;
03473                   }
03474                   break;
03475             }
03476 
03477             bCurrentListValue++;
03478       }     
03479 
03480 
03481       return( iId );
03482 }
03483 
03484 
03485 INT32 GetIdOfMercWithHighestStat( INT32 iStat )
03486 {
03487       // will return the id value of the merc on the players team with highest in this stat
03488   // -1 means error
03489       INT32 iId = -1;
03490       INT32 iValue =0;
03491       SOLDIERTYPE *pTeamSoldier, *pSoldier;     
03492       INT32 cnt=0;
03493 
03494        // first grunt
03495       pSoldier = MercPtrs[0]; 
03496 
03497 
03498       // run through active soldiers
03499       for ( pTeamSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ pSoldier->bTeam ].bLastID; cnt++,pTeamSoldier++)
03500       {
03501              if( ( pTeamSoldier->bActive) && !( pTeamSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE ) && ( pTeamSoldier->bLife > 0 ) && !AM_A_ROBOT( pTeamSoldier ) )
03502              {
03503                    switch( iStat )
03504                    {
03505                          case 0:
03506                      // health
03507                                     if( pTeamSoldier->bAssignment == ASSIGNMENT_POW )
03508                                     {
03509                                           continue;
03510                                     }
03511 
03512                                if( pTeamSoldier ->  bLifeMax >= iValue )
03513                                {
03514                                      iId = cnt;
03515                                      iValue = pTeamSoldier -> bLifeMax;
03516                                }
03517                            break;
03518                          case 1:
03519                                // agility
03520                                if( pTeamSoldier ->  bAgility >= iValue )
03521                                {
03522                                      iId = cnt;
03523                                      iValue = pTeamSoldier -> bAgility;
03524                                }
03525                                break;
03526                          case 2:
03527                               // dexterity
03528                                if( pTeamSoldier ->  bDexterity >= iValue )
03529                                {
03530                                      iId = cnt;
03531                                      iValue = pTeamSoldier -> bDexterity;
03532                                }
03533                               break;
03534                          case 3:
03535                          // strength
03536                    if(  pTeamSoldier -> bStrength >= iValue )
03537                                {
03538                                      iId = cnt;
03539                                      iValue = pTeamSoldier -> bStrength;
03540                                }     
03541                          break;
03542                          case 4:
03543                               // leadership
03544                    if(  pTeamSoldier -> bLeadership >= iValue )
03545                                {
03546                                      iId = cnt;
03547                                       iValue = pTeamSoldier -> bLeadership;
03548                                }     
03549                          break;
03550                          case 5:
03551                               // wisdom
03552                                if(  pTeamSoldier -> bWisdom >= iValue )
03553                                {
03554                                      iId = cnt;
03555                                      iValue = pTeamSoldier -> bWisdom;
03556                                }
03557                          break;
03558                          case 6:
03559                               // exper
03560            if( pTeamSoldier -> bExpLevel >= iValue )
03561                                {
03562                                      iId = cnt;
03563                                      iValue = pTeamSoldier -> bExpLevel;
03564                                }  
03565 
03566                          break;
03567                          case 7:
03568                                //mrkmanship
03569                                if(  pTeamSoldier -> bMarksmanship >= iValue )
03570                                {
03571                                      iId = cnt;
03572                                      iValue = pTeamSoldier -> bMarksmanship;
03573                                }
03574                          
03575                          break;
03576                          case 8:
03577                               // mech
03578                                if(  pTeamSoldier -> bMechanical >= iValue )
03579                                {
03580                                      iId = cnt;
03581                                      iValue = pTeamSoldier -> bMechanical;
03582                                }
03583                          break;
03584                          case 9:
03585                               // exp
03586                                if(pTeamSoldier -> bExplosive >= iValue )
03587                                {
03588                                      iId = cnt;
03589                                      iValue = pTeamSoldier -> bExplosive;
03590                                }
03591                          break;
03592                          case 10:
03593                                // med
03594                                if(  pTeamSoldier -> bMedical >= iValue )
03595                                {
03596                                      iId = cnt;
03597                                      iValue = pTeamSoldier -> bMedical;
03598                                }
03599                          break;
03600                          }
03601              }
03602       }     
03603 
03604 
03605       return( iId );
03606 }

03608 INT32 GetIdOfMercWithLowestStat( INT32 iStat )
03609 {
03610       // will return the id value of the merc on the players team with highest in this stat
03611   // -1 means error
03612       INT32 iId = -1;
03613       INT32 iValue =999999;
03614       SOLDIERTYPE *pTeamSoldier, *pSoldier;     
03615       INT32 cnt=0;
03616 
03617        // first grunt
03618       pSoldier = MercPtrs[0]; 
03619 
03620 
03621       // run through active soldiers
03622       for ( pTeamSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ pSoldier->bTeam ].bLastID; cnt++,pTeamSoldier++)
03623       {
03624              if(( pTeamSoldier->bActive) && !( pTeamSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE ) && ( pTeamSoldier->bLife > 0 ) && !AM_A_ROBOT( pTeamSoldier ) )

03657                                }

03673                                }     
03674                          break;

03698                                }
03699

03704                                {

03707                                }

03732 
03733 
03734 INT32 GetAvgStatOfCurrentTeamStat( INT32 iStat )
03735 {
03736       // will return the id value of the merc on the players team with highest in this stat
03737   // -1 means error
03738       SOLDIERTYPE *pTeamSoldier, *pSoldier;     
03739       INT32 cnt=0;
03740       INT32 iTotalStatValue = 0;
03741       INT8  bNumberOfPows = 0;
03742       UINT8 ubNumberOfMercsInCalculation = 0;
03743 
03744 
03745        // first grunt
03746       pSoldier = MercPtrs[0]; 
03747 
03748       // run through active soldiers
03749       for ( pTeamSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ pSoldier->bTeam ].bLastID; cnt++,pTeamSoldier++)
03750       {
03751              if(( pTeamSoldier->bActive)&&( pTeamSoldier->bLife > 0 ) && !AM_A_ROBOT( pTeamSoldier ) )
03752              {
03753                    switch( iStat )
03754                    {
03755                          case 0:
03756                      // health
03757 
03758                                     //if this is a pow, dont count his stats
03759                                     if( pTeamSoldier->bAssignment == ASSIGNMENT_POW )
03760                                     {
03761                                           bNumberOfPows++;
03762                                           continue;
03763                                     }
03764 
03765                                 iTotalStatValue += pTeamSoldier -> bLifeMax;
03766                                
03767                            break;
03768                          case 1:
03769                                // agility
03770                                iTotalStatValue +=pTeamSoldier -> bAgility;
03771 
03772                                break;
03773                          case 2:
03774                               // dexterity
03775                                iTotalStatValue +=  pTeamSoldier -> bDexterity;
03776 
03777                               break;
03778                          case 3:
03779                          // strength
03780                          iTotalStatValue +=  pTeamSoldier -> bStrength;
03781 
03782                          break;
03783                          case 4:
03784                               // leadership
03785                                iTotalStatValue +=  pTeamSoldier -> bLeadership;
03786 
03787                          break;
03788                          case 5:
03789                               // wisdom
03790                               
03791                                iTotalStatValue += pTeamSoldier -> bWisdom;
03792                          break;
03793                          case 6:
03794                               // exper
03795            
03796                                iTotalStatValue +=  pTeamSoldier -> bExpLevel;
03797 
03798                          break;
03799                          case 7:
03800                                //mrkmanship
03801                                
03802                                iTotalStatValue +=  pTeamSoldier -> bMarksmanship;
03803                          
03804                          break;
03805                          case 8:
03806                               // mech
03807                                
03808                                iTotalStatValue +=  pTeamSoldier -> bMechanical;
03809                          break;
03810                          case 9:
03811                               // exp
03812                                
03813                                iTotalStatValue +=  pTeamSoldier ->bExplosive;
03814                          break;
03815                          case 10:
03816                                // med
03817                                
03818                                iTotalStatValue +=  pTeamSoldier -> bMedical;
03819                          break;
03820                    }
03821 
03822                    ubNumberOfMercsInCalculation++;
03823              }
03824       }     
03825 
03826 
03827       //if the stat is health, and there are only pow's
03828       if( GetNumberOfMercsOnPlayersTeam( ) != 0 && GetNumberOfMercsOnPlayersTeam( ) == bNumberOfPows && iStat == 0 )
03829       {
03830             return( - 1 );
03831       }
03832       else if( ( ubNumberOfMercsInCalculation - bNumberOfPows ) > 0 )
03833       {
03834             return( iTotalStatValue / ( ubNumberOfMercsInCalculation - bNumberOfPows ) );
03835       }
03836       else
03837       {
03838             return( 0 );
03839       }
03840 }
03841 
03842 
03843 INT32 GetAvgStatOfPastTeamStat( INT32 iStat )
03844 {
03845       // will return the id value of the merc on the players team with highest in this stat
03846   // -1 means error
03847       INT32 cnt=0;
03848       INT32 iTotalStatValue = 0;
03849       INT32 iId = -1;
03850       MERCPROFILESTRUCT *pTeamSoldier;
03851       INT32 iCounter =0;
03852       INT8 bCurrentList = 0;
03853       INT16 *bCurrentListValue = LaptopSaveInfo.ubDeadCharactersList;
03854       BOOLEAN fNotDone = TRUE;
03855       UINT32 uiLoopCounter;
03856 
03857       // run through active soldiers
03858       
03859       //while( fNotDone )
03860       for( uiLoopCounter=0; fNotDone ; uiLoopCounter++ )    
03861       {
03862 /*
03863             // check if we are in fact not done
03864             if( ( bCurrentList == 2 ) && ( *bCurrentListValue == -1 ) )
03865             {
03866                   fNotDone = FALSE;
03867                   continue;
03868             }
03869 */
03870 
03871             //if we are at the end of
03872             if( uiLoopCounter == 255 && bCurrentList == 2 )
03873             {
03874                   fNotDone = FALSE;
03875                   continue;
03876             }
03877 
03878             // check if we need to move to the next list
03879 //          if( *bCurrentListValue == -1 )
03880             if( uiLoopCounter == 255 )
03881             {
03882                   if( bCurrentList == 0 )
03883                   {
03884                         bCurrentList = 1;
03885                     bCurrentListValue = LaptopSaveInfo.ubLeftCharactersList;
03886                   }
03887                   else if( bCurrentList == 1 )
03888                   {
03889                         bCurrentList = 2;
03890                         bCurrentListValue = LaptopSaveInfo.ubOtherCharactersList;
03891                   }
03892 
03893                   //reset the loop counter
03894                   uiLoopCounter = 0;
03895             }
03896 
03897             // get the id of the grunt
03898             cnt = *bCurrentListValue;
03899 
03900             // do we need to reset the count?
03901             if( cnt == -1 )
03902             {
03903                   bCurrentListValue++;
03904                   continue;
03905             }
03906 
03907             pTeamSoldier = &( gMercProfiles[ cnt ] );
03908 
03909             switch( iStat )
03910             {
03911                   case 0:
03912                   // health
03913                   
03914                         iTotalStatValue += pTeamSoldier -> bLife;
03915                   
03916                   break;
03917               case 1:
03918               // agility
03919                   
03920                         iTotalStatValue += pTeamSoldier -> bAgility;
03921                   
03922                   break;
03923                   case 2:
03924                   // dexterity
03925                   
03926                               iTotalStatValue += pTeamSoldier -> bDexterity;
03927                   
03928                   break;
03929                   case 3:
03930                   // strength
03931       
03932                         iTotalStatValue += pTeamSoldier -> bStrength;
03933                    
03934                   break;
03935                   case 4:
03936                   // leadership
03937       
03938                         iTotalStatValue += pTeamSoldier -> bLeadership;
03939                          
03940                   break;
03941                   case 5:
03942               // wisdom
03943                   
03944                         iTotalStatValue += pTeamSoldier -> bWisdom;
03945                   
03946                   break;
03947                   case 6:
03948                   // exper
03949      
03950                         iTotalStatValue += pTeamSoldier -> bExpLevel;
03951              
03952 
03953                   break;
03954                   case 7:
03955                   //mrkmanship
03956                   
03957                               iId = cnt;
03958                               iTotalStatValue += pTeamSoldier -> bMarksmanship;
03959                   
03960                          
03961               break;
03962                   case 8:
03963                   // mech
03964                   
03965                         iTotalStatValue += pTeamSoldier -> bMechanical;
03966                   
03967               break;
03968                   case 9:
03969                   // exp
03970                   
03971                         iTotalStatValue += pTeamSoldier -> bExplosive;
03972                   
03973                   break;
03974                   case 10:
03975                   // med
03976                   
03977                         iTotalStatValue += pTeamSoldier -> bMedical;
03978                   break;
03979             }
03980 
03981             bCurrentListValue++;
03982       }     
03983 
03984       if( GetNumberOfPastMercsOnPlayersTeam( ) > 0 )
03985       {
03986         return( iTotalStatValue / GetNumberOfPastMercsOnPlayersTeam( ) );
03987       }
03988       else
03989       {
03990             return( 0 );
03991       }
03992 }
03993 
03994 void DisplayAverageStatValuesForCurrentTeam( void )
03995 {
03996       // will display the average values for stats for the current team
03997       INT16 sX, sY;
03998       INT32 iCounter = 0;
03999       CHAR16 sString[ 32 ];
04000 
04001       // set up font
04002       SetFont( FONT10ARIAL );
04003       SetFontBackground( FONT_BLACK );
04004       SetFontForeground( PERS_TEXT_FONT_COLOR );
04005 
04006       // display header
04007 
04008       // center
04009       FindFontCenterCoordinates( PERS_STAT_AVG_X, 0 ,PERS_STAT_AVG_WIDTH, 0 , pPersonnelCurrentTeamStatsStrings[ 1 ], FONT10ARIAL , &sX, &sY );
04010 
04011       mprintf( sX, PERS_STAT_AVG_Y, pPersonnelCurrentTeamStatsStrings[ 1 ] );
04012       
04013       // nobody on team leave
04014   if( ( GetNumberOfMercsDeadOrAliveOnPlayersTeam( ) == 0 ) && (  fCurrentTeamMode == TRUE ) )
04015       {
04016             return;
04017       }
04018 
04019       // check if in past team and nobody on past team
04020       if( ( GetNumberOfPastMercsOnPlayersTeam( ) == 0 ) && (  fCurrentTeamMode == FALSE ) )
04021       {
04022             return;
04023       }
04024 
04025 
04026       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < 11; iCounter++ )
04027       {
04028 
04029             // even or odd?..color black or yellow?
04030             if( iCounter % 2 == 0 )
04031             {
04032                   SetFontForeground( PERS_TEXT_FONT_ALTERNATE_COLOR );
04033             }
04034             else
04035             {
04036                   SetFontForeground( PERS_TEXT_FONT_COLOR );
04037             }
04038 
04039             if(  fCurrentTeamMode == TRUE )
04040             {
04041                   INT32 iValue = GetAvgStatOfCurrentTeamStat( iCounter );
04042 
04043                   //if there are no values
04044                   if( iValue == -1 )
04045                         swprintf( sString, L"%s", pPOWStrings[ 1 ] );
04046                   else
04047                         swprintf( sString, L"%d", iValue );
04048 
04049             }
04050             else
04051             {
04052                   swprintf( sString, L"%d", GetAvgStatOfPastTeamStat( iCounter ) );
04053             }
04054             // center
04055         FindFontCenterCoordinates( PERS_STAT_AVG_X, 0 ,PERS_STAT_AVG_WIDTH, 0 , sString, FONT10ARIAL , &sX, &sY );
04056 
04057         mprintf( sX, PERS_STAT_AVG_Y + ( iCounter + 1 ) * ( GetFontHeight( FONT10ARIAL ) + 3 ), sString );
04058       }
04059 
04060       return;
04061 }
04062 
04063 void DisplayLowestStatValuesForCurrentTeam( void )
04064 {
04065       // will display the average values for stats for the current team
04066       INT16 sX, sY;
04067       INT32 iCounter = 0;
04068       CHAR16 sString[ 32 ];
04069       INT32 iStat = 0;
04070       INT32 iDepartedId=0;
04071       INT32 iId = 0;
04072 
04073       // set up font
04074       SetFont( FONT10ARIAL );
04075       SetFontBackground( FONT_BLACK );
04076       SetFontForeground( PERS_TEXT_FONT_COLOR );
04077 
04078       // display header
04079 
04080       // center
04081       FindFontCenterCoordinates( PERS_STAT_LOWEST_X, 0 ,PERS_STAT_LOWEST_WIDTH, 0 , pPersonnelCurrentTeamStatsStrings[ 0 ], FONT10ARIAL , &sX, &sY );
04082 
04083       mprintf( sX, PERS_STAT_AVG_Y, pPersonnelCurrentTeamStatsStrings[ 0 ] );
04084 
04085       // nobody on team leave
04086   if( ( GetNumberOfMercsOnPlayersTeam( ) == 0 ) && ( fCurrentTeamMode == TRUE) )
04087       {
04088             return;
04089       }
04090 
04091       if( ( GetNumberOfPastMercsOnPlayersTeam( ) == 0 ) && ( fCurrentTeamMode == FALSE ) )
04092       {
04093             return;
04094       }
04095 
04096       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < 11; iCounter++ )
04097       {
04098             if( fCurrentTeamMode == TRUE )
04099             {
04100                   iId = GetIdOfMercWithLowestStat( iCounter );
04101 //                if( iId == -1 )
04102 //                      continue;
04103             }
04104             else
04105             {
04106                   iDepartedId = GetIdOfDepartedMercWithLowestStat( iCounter );
04107                   if( iDepartedId == -1 )
04108                         continue;
04109             }
04110 
04111                   // even or odd?..color black or yellow?
04112             if( iCounter % 2 == 0 )
04113             {
04114                   SetFontForeground( PERS_TEXT_FONT_ALTERNATE_COLOR );
04115             }
04116             else
04117             {
04118                   SetFontForeground( PERS_TEXT_FONT_COLOR );
04119             }
04120 
04121             if( fCurrentTeamMode == TRUE )
04122             {
04123                   // get name
04124                   if( iId == -1 )
04125                         swprintf( sString, L"%s", pPOWStrings[1] );
04126                   else
04127                         swprintf( sString, L"%s", MercPtrs[ iId ] -> name );
04128             }
04129             else
04130             {
04131                   // get name
04132                   swprintf( sString, L"%s", gMercProfiles[ iDepartedId ].zNickname );
04133             }
04134             // print name
04135             mprintf( PERS_STAT_LOWEST_X, PERS_STAT_AVG_Y + ( iCounter + 1 ) * ( GetFontHeight( FONT10ARIAL ) + 3 ), sString );
04136             
04137             switch( iCounter )
04138             {
04139                          case 0:
04140                                // health
04141                                if( fCurrentTeamMode == TRUE )
04142                                {
04143                                      if( iId == -1 )
04144                                            iStat = -1;
04145                                      else
04146                                           iStat = MercPtrs[ iId ] -> bLifeMax;
04147                                }
04148                                else
04149                                {
04150                                      iStat =  gMercProfiles[ iDepartedId ] . bLife;
04151                                }
04152                                break;
04153                                case 1:
04154                                      // agility
04155                                      if( fCurrentTeamMode == TRUE )
04156                                      {
04157                                                 iStat = MercPtrs[ iId ] -> bAgility;
04158                                      }
04159                                      else
04160                                      {
04161                                                 iStat =  gMercProfiles[ iDepartedId ] . bAgility;
04162                                      }
04163 
04164                                      break;
04165                                case 2:
04166                                     // dexterity
04167                                     if( fCurrentTeamMode == TRUE )
04168                                     {
04169                                           iStat = MercPtrs[ iId ] -> bDexterity;
04170                                     }
04171                                     else
04172                                     {
04173                                           iStat =  gMercProfiles[ iDepartedId ] . bDexterity;
04174                                     }
04175 
04176                                     break;
04177                                case 3:
04178                                // strength
04179                                if( fCurrentTeamMode == TRUE )
04180                                {
04181                                  iStat = MercPtrs[ iId ] -> bStrength;
04182                                }
04183                                else
04184                                {
04185                                           iStat =  gMercProfiles[ iDepartedId ] . bStrength;
04186                                }
04187 
04188                                break;
04189                                case 4:
04190                                     // leadership
04191                                     if( fCurrentTeamMode == TRUE )
04192                                     {
04193                                           iStat = MercPtrs[ iId ] -> bLeadership;
04194                                     }
04195                                     else
04196                                     {
04197                                           iStat =  gMercProfiles[ iDepartedId ] . bLeadership;
04198                                     }
04199                                break;
04200                                case 5:
04201                                     // wisdom
04202                                     if( fCurrentTeamMode == TRUE )
04203                                     {
04204                                       iStat = MercPtrs[ iId ] -> bWisdom;
04205                                     }
04206                                     else
04207                                     {
04208                                           iStat =  gMercProfiles[ iDepartedId ] . bWisdom;
04209                                     }
04210                                break;
04211                                case 6:
04212                                     // exper
04213                                     if( fCurrentTeamMode == TRUE )
04214                                     {
04215                                       iStat = MercPtrs[ iId ] -> bExpLevel;
04216                                     }
04217                                     else
04218                                     {
04219                                           iStat =  gMercProfiles[ iDepartedId ] . bExpLevel;
04220                                     }
04221                                break;
04222                                case 7:
04223                                      //mrkmanship
04224                                     if( fCurrentTeamMode == TRUE )
04225                                     {
04226                                       iStat = MercPtrs[ iId ] -> bMarksmanship;
04227                                     }
04228                                     else
04229                                     {
04230                                           iStat =  gMercProfiles[ iDepartedId ] . bMarksmanship;
04231                                     }
04232                                break;
04233                                case 8:
04234                                     // mech
04235                                     if( fCurrentTeamMode == TRUE )
04236                                     {
04237                                       iStat = MercPtrs[ iId ] -> bMechanical;
04238                                     }
04239                                     else
04240                                     {
04241                                           iStat =  gMercProfiles[ iDepartedId ] . bMechanical;
04242                                     }
04243                                break;
04244                                case 9:
04245                                     // exp
04246                                     if( fCurrentTeamMode == TRUE )
04247                                     {
04248                                           iStat = MercPtrs[ iId ] -> bExplosive;
04249                                     }
04250                                     else
04251                                     {
04252                                           iStat = gMercProfiles[ iDepartedId ] . bExplosive;
04253                                     }
04254                                break;
04255                                case 10:
04256                                      // med
04257                                     if( fCurrentTeamMode == TRUE )
04258                                     {
04259                                       iStat = MercPtrs[ iId ] -> bMedical;
04260                                     }
04261                                     else
04262                                     {
04263                                           iStat =  gMercProfiles[ iDepartedId ] . bMedical;
04264                                     }
04265                                break;
04266                   }
04267 
04268                   if( iStat == -1 )
04269                         swprintf( sString, L"%s", pPOWStrings[1] );
04270                   else
04271                         swprintf( sString, L"%d", iStat );
04272 
04273             // right justify
04274         FindFontRightCoordinates(  PERS_STAT_LOWEST_X, 0 ,PERS_STAT_LOWEST_WIDTH, 0 , sString, FONT10ARIAL , &sX, &sY );
04275 
04276         mprintf( sX, PERS_STAT_AVG_Y + ( iCounter + 1 ) * ( GetFontHeight( FONT10ARIAL ) + 3 ), sString );
04277       }
04278 
04279       return;
04280 }

04282 
04283 void DisplayHighestStatValuesForCurrentTeam( void )
04284 {
04285       // will display the average values for stats for the current team
04286       INT16 sX, sY;
04287       INT32 iCounter = 0;
04288       CHAR16 sString[ 32 ];
04289       INT32 iStat = 0;
04290       INT32 iId=0;
04291 
04292       // set up font
04293       SetFont( FONT10ARIAL );
04294       SetFontBackground( FONT_BLACK );
04295       SetFontForeground( PERS_TEXT_FONT_COLOR );
04296 
04297       // display header
04298 
04299       // center
04300       FindFontCenterCoordinates( PERS_STAT_HIGHEST_X, 0 ,PERS_STAT_LOWEST_WIDTH, 0 , pPersonnelCurrentTeamStatsStrings[ 2 ], FONT10ARIAL , &sX, &sY );
04301 
04302       mprintf( sX, PERS_STAT_AVG_Y, pPersonnelCurrentTeamStatsStrings[ 2 ] );
04303 
04304       // nobody on team leave
04305   if( ( GetNumberOfMercsOnPlayersTeam( ) == 0 ) && ( fCurrentTeamMode == TRUE) )
04306       {
04307             return;
04308       }
04309 
04310       if( ( GetNumberOfPastMercsOnPlayersTeam( ) == 0 ) && ( fCurrentTeamMode == FALSE ) )
04311       {
04312             return;
04313       }
04314 
04315       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < 11; iCounter++ )
04316       {
04317             if( fCurrentTeamMode == TRUE )
04318                   iId = GetIdOfMercWithHighestStat( iCounter );
04319             else
04320                   iId = GetIdOfDepartedMercWithHighestStat( iCounter );
04321 
04322 //          if( iId == -1 )
04323 //                continue;
04324 
04325                   // even or odd?..color black or yellow?
04326             if( iCounter % 2 == 0 )
04327             {
04328                   SetFontForeground( PERS_TEXT_FONT_ALTERNATE_COLOR );
04329             }
04330             else
04331             {
04332                   SetFontForeground( PERS_TEXT_FONT_COLOR );
04333             }
04334 
04335 
04336             if( fCurrentTeamMode == TRUE )
04337             {
04338                   // get name
04339                   if( iId == -1 )
04340                         swprintf( sString, L"%s", pPOWStrings[1] );
04341                   else
04342                         swprintf( sString, L"%s", MercPtrs[ iId ] -> name );
04343             }
04344             else
04345             {
04346                   // get name
04347                   swprintf( sString, L"%s", gMercProfiles[ iId ].zNickname );
04348             }
04349             // print name
04350             mprintf( PERS_STAT_HIGHEST_X, PERS_STAT_AVG_Y + ( iCounter + 1 ) * ( GetFontHeight( FONT10ARIAL ) + 3 ), sString );
04351             
04352             switch( iCounter )
04353             {
04354                          case 0:
04355                                // health
04356                                if( fCurrentTeamMode == TRUE )
04357                                {
04358                                      if( iId == -1 )
04359                                           iStat = -1;
04360                                      else
04361                                           iStat = MercPtrs[ iId ] -> bLifeMax;
04362                                }
04363                                else
04364                                {
04365                                      iStat =  gMercProfiles[ iId ] . bLife;
04366                                }
04367                                break;
04368                                case 1:
04369                                      // agility
04370                                      if( fCurrentTeamMode == TRUE )
04371                                      {
04372                                                 iStat = MercPtrs[ iId ] -> bAgility;
04373                                      }
04374                                      else
04375                                      {
04376                                                 iStat =  gMercProfiles[ iId ] . bAgility;
04377                                      }
04378 
04379                                      break;
04380                                case 2:
04381                                     // dexterity
04382                                     if( fCurrentTeamMode == TRUE )
04383                                     {
04384                                           iStat = MercPtrs[ iId ] -> bDexterity;
04385                                     }
04386                                     else
04387                                     {
04388                                           iStat =  gMercProfiles[ iId ] . bDexterity;
04389                                     }
04390 
04391                                     break;
04392                                case 3:
04393                                // strength
04394                                if( fCurrentTeamMode == TRUE )
04395                                {
04396                                  iStat = MercPtrs[ iId ] -> bStrength;
04397                                }
04398                                else
04399                                {
04400                                           iStat =  gMercProfiles[ iId ] . bStrength;
04401                                }
04402 
04403                                break;
04404                                case 4:
04405                                     // leadership
04406                                     if( fCurrentTeamMode == TRUE )
04407                                     {
04408                                           iStat = MercPtrs[ iId ] -> bLeadership;
04409                                     }
04410                                     else
04411                                     {
04412                                           iStat =  gMercProfiles[ iId ] . bLeadership;
04413                                     }
04414                                break;
04415                                case 5:
04416                                     // wisdom
04417                                     if( fCurrentTeamMode == TRUE )
04418                                     {
04419                                       iStat = MercPtrs[ iId ] -> bWisdom;
04420                                     }
04421                                     else
04422                                     {
04423                                           iStat =  gMercProfiles[ iId ] . bWisdom;
04424                                     }
04425                                break;
04426                                case 6:
04427                                     // exper
04428                                     if( fCurrentTeamMode == TRUE )
04429                                     {
04430                                       iStat = MercPtrs[ iId ] -> bExpLevel;
04431                                     }
04432                                     else
04433                                     {
04434                                           iStat =  gMercProfiles[ iId ] . bExpLevel;
04435                                     }
04436                                break;
04437                                case 7:
04438                                      //mrkmanship
04439                                     if( fCurrentTeamMode == TRUE )
04440                                     {
04441                                       iStat = MercPtrs[ iId ] -> bMarksmanship;
04442                                     }
04443                                     else
04444                                     {
04445                                           iStat =  gMercProfiles[ iId ] . bMarksmanship;
04446                                     }
04447                                break;
04448                                case 8:
04449                                     // mech
04450                                     if( fCurrentTeamMode == TRUE )
04451                                     {
04452                                       iStat = MercPtrs[ iId ] -> bMechanical;
04453                                     }
04454                                     else
04455                                     {
04456                                           iStat =  gMercProfiles[ iId ] . bMechanical;
04457                                     }
04458                                break;
04459                                case 9:
04460                                     // exp
04461                                     if( fCurrentTeamMode == TRUE )
04462                                     {
04463                                           iStat = MercPtrs[ iId ] -> bExplosive;
04464                                     }
04465                                     else
04466                                     {
04467                                           iStat = gMercProfiles[ iId ] . bExplosive;
04468                                     }
04469                                break;
04470                                case 10:
04471                                      // med
04472                                     if( fCurrentTeamMode == TRUE )
04473                                     {
04474                                       iStat = MercPtrs[ iId ] -> bMedical;
04475                                     }
04476                                     else
04477                                     {
04478                                           iStat =  gMercProfiles[ iId ] . bMedical;
04479                                     }
04480                                break;
04481                   }
04482             
04483                   if( iStat == -1 )
04484                         swprintf( sString, L"%s", pPOWStrings[1] );
04485                   else
04486                         swprintf( sString, L"%d", iStat );
04487 
04488             // right justify
04489         FindFontRightCoordinates(  PERS_STAT_HIGHEST_X, 0 ,PERS_STAT_LOWEST_WIDTH, 0 , sString, FONT10ARIAL , &sX, &sY );
04490 
04491         mprintf( sX, PERS_STAT_AVG_Y + ( iCounter + 1 ) * ( GetFontHeight( FONT10ARIAL ) + 3 ), sString );
04492       }
04493 
04494       return;
04495 }

04499 void DisplayPersonnelTeamStats( void )
04500 {
04501       // displays the stat title for each row in the team stat list
04502       INT32 iCounter =0;
04503 
04504 
04505       // set up font
04506       SetFont( FONT10ARIAL );
04507       SetFontBackground( FONT_BLACK );
04508       SetFontForeground( FONT_WHITE );
04509 
04510 
04511       // display titles for each row
04512       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < 11; iCounter++ )
04513       {
04514                   // even or odd?..color black or yellow?
04515             if( iCounter % 2 == 0 )
04516             {
04517                   SetFontForeground( PERS_TEXT_FONT_ALTERNATE_COLOR );
04518             }
04519             else
04520             {
04521                   SetFontForeground( PERS_TEXT_FONT_COLOR );
04522             }
04523 
04524             mprintf( PERS_STAT_LIST_X, PERS_STAT_AVG_Y + ( iCounter + 1 ) * ( GetFontHeight( FONT10ARIAL ) + 3 ), pPersonnelTeamStatsStrings[ iCounter ] );
04525       }
04526 
04527 
04528       return;
04529 }
04530 
04531 
04532 INT32 GetNumberOfPastMercsOnPlayersTeam( void )
04533 {
04534       INT32 iPastNumberOfMercs = 0;
04535       INT32 iCounter = 0;
04536       // will run through the alist of past mercs on the players team and return thier number
04537 
04538       // dead
04539       iPastNumberOfMercs += GetNumberOfDeadOnPastTeam( );
04540       
04541       // left
04542       iPastNumberOfMercs += GetNumberOfLeftOnPastTeam( );
04543 
04544       // other
04545       iPastNumberOfMercs += GetNumberOfOtherOnPastTeam( );
04546 
04547 
04548       return iPastNumberOfMercs;
04549 }

04551 
04552 void InitPastCharactersList( void )
04553 {
04554       // inits the past characters list
04555       memset( &LaptopSaveInfo.ubDeadCharactersList, -1, sizeof( LaptopSaveInfo.ubDeadCharactersList ) );
04556       memset( &LaptopSaveInfo.ubLeftCharactersList, -1, sizeof( LaptopSaveInfo.ubLeftCharactersList ) );
04557       memset( &LaptopSaveInfo.ubOtherCharactersList, -1, sizeof( LaptopSaveInfo.ubOtherCharactersList ) );
04558 
04559       return;
04560 }
04561 
04562 
04563 INT32 GetNumberOfDeadOnPastTeam( void )
04564 {
04565 
04566       INT32 iNumberDead = 0;
04567       INT32 iCounter = 0;
04568 
04569 //    for( iCounter = 0; ( ( iCounter < 256) && ( LaptopSaveInfo.ubDeadCharactersList[ iCounter ] != -1 ) ) ; iCounter ++ )
04570       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < 256 ; iCounter ++ )
04571       {
04572             if( LaptopSaveInfo.ubDeadCharactersList[ iCounter ] != -1 )
04573                   iNumberDead++;
04574       }
04575 
04576 
04577       return( iNumberDead );
04578 
04579 }
04580 
04581 
04582 INT32 GetNumberOfLeftOnPastTeam( void )
04583 {
04584 
04585       INT32 iNumberLeft = 0;
04586       INT32 iCounter = 0;
04587 
04588       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < 256 ; iCounter ++ )
04589       {
04590             if( LaptopSaveInfo.ubLeftCharactersList[ iCounter ] != -1 )
04591                   iNumberLeft++;
04592       }
04593 
04594 
04595       return( iNumberLeft );
04596 
04597 }
04598 
04599 
04600 INT32 GetNumberOfOtherOnPastTeam( void )
04601 {
04602 
04603       INT32 iNumberOther = 0;
04604       INT32 iCounter = 0;
04605 
04606       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < 256 ; iCounter ++ )
04607       {
04608             if( LaptopSaveInfo.ubOtherCharactersList[ iCounter ] != -1 )
04609                   iNumberOther++;
04610       }
04611 
04612 
04613       return( iNumberOther );
04614 
04615 }

04617 
04618 void DisplayStateOfPastTeamMembers( void )
04619 {
04620       INT16 sX, sY;
04621       CHAR16 sString[ 32 ];
04622 
04623 
04624       // font stuff
04625       SetFont( FONT10ARIAL );
04626       SetFontBackground( FONT_BLACK );
04627       SetFontForeground( PERS_TEXT_FONT_COLOR );
04628 
04629 
04630       // diplsya numbers fired, dead and othered
04631       if( fCurrentTeamMode == FALSE )
04632       {
04633 
04634             // dead
04635          mprintf(  PERS_CURR_TEAM_COST_X, PERS_CURR_TEAM_COST_Y, pPersonelTeamStrings[ 5 ] );
04636              swprintf( sString, L"%d", GetNumberOfDeadOnPastTeam( ) );
04637              
04638              FindFontRightCoordinates((INT16)(PERS_CURR_TEAM_COST_X),0,PERS_DEPART_TEAM_WIDTH,0,sString, PERS_FONT,  &sX, &sY);
04639              
04640              mprintf( sX ,PERS_CURR_TEAM_COST_Y, sString );
04641              
04642              // fired
04643              mprintf(  PERS_CURR_TEAM_COST_X, PERS_CURR_TEAM_HIGHEST_Y, pPersonelTeamStrings[ 6 ] );
04644          swprintf( sString, L"%d", GetNumberOfLeftOnPastTeam( ) );
04645              
04646              FindFontRightCoordinates((INT16)(PERS_CURR_TEAM_COST_X),0,PERS_DEPART_TEAM_WIDTH,0,sString, PERS_FONT,  &sX, &sY);
04647              
04648              mprintf( sX ,PERS_CURR_TEAM_HIGHEST_Y, sString );
04649 
04650              // other
04651              mprintf(  PERS_CURR_TEAM_COST_X, PERS_CURR_TEAM_LOWEST_Y, pPersonelTeamStrings[ 7 ] );
04652              swprintf( sString, L"%d", GetNumberOfOtherOnPastTeam( ) );
04653              
04654              FindFontRightCoordinates((INT16)(PERS_CURR_TEAM_COST_X),0,PERS_DEPART_TEAM_WIDTH,0,sString, PERS_FONT,  &sX, &sY);
04655              
04656              mprintf( sX ,PERS_CURR_TEAM_LOWEST_Y, sString );
04657       }
04658       else
04659       {
04660             // do nothing
04661       }
04662       return;
04663 }

04665 
04666 
04667 void CreateDestroyCurrentDepartedMouseRegions( void )
04668 {
04669 
04670       static BOOLEAN fCreated = FALSE;
04671 
04672       // will arbitrate the creation/deletion of mouse regions for current/past team toggles
04673 
04674 
04675       if( ( fCreateRegionsForPastCurrentToggle == TRUE ) && ( fCreated == FALSE ) )
04676       {
04677             // not created, create
04678             MSYS_DefineRegion(&gTogglePastCurrentTeam[ 0 ], PERS_TOGGLE_CUR_DEPART_X, PERS_TOGGLE_CUR_Y, PERS_TOGGLE_CUR_DEPART_X + PERS_TOGGLE_CUR_DEPART_WIDTH, PERS_TOGGLE_CUR_Y + PERS_TOGGLE_CUR_DEPART_HEIGHT,
04679                 MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST - 3 ,CURSOR_LAPTOP_SCREEN, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, PersonnelCurrentTeamCallback);
04680             
04681             MSYS_AddRegion( &gTogglePastCurrentTeam[ 0 ] );
04682 
04683             MSYS_DefineRegion(&gTogglePastCurrentTeam[ 1 ], PERS_TOGGLE_CUR_DEPART_X, PERS_TOGGLE_DEPART_Y , PERS_TOGGLE_CUR_DEPART_X + PERS_TOGGLE_CUR_DEPART_WIDTH, PERS_TOGGLE_DEPART_Y + PERS_TOGGLE_CUR_DEPART_HEIGHT,
04684                 MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST - 3,CURSOR_LAPTOP_SCREEN, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, PersonnelDepartedTeamCallback);
04685 
04686             MSYS_AddRegion( &gTogglePastCurrentTeam[ 1 ] );
04687 
04688             fCreated = TRUE;
04689 
04690       }
04691       else if( ( fCreateRegionsForPastCurrentToggle == FALSE ) && ( fCreated == TRUE ) )
04692       {
04693             // created, get rid of
04694 
04695             MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gTogglePastCurrentTeam[ 0 ] );
04696             MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gTogglePastCurrentTeam[ 1 ] );
04697             fCreated = FALSE;
04698       }
04699 
04700       return;
04701 }
04702 
04703 
04704 
04705 void PersonnelCurrentTeamCallback( MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
04706 {
04707       if(iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP)
04708   {
04709             fCurrentTeamMode = TRUE;
04710 
04711             if( fCurrentTeamMode == TRUE )
04712             {
04713               iCurrentPersonSelectedId = -1;
04714                   
04715                   // how many people do we have?..if you have someone set default to 0
04716                   if( GetNumberOfMercsDeadOrAliveOnPlayersTeam() > 0 )
04717                   {
04718                         // get id of first merc in list
04719 
04720                         iCurrentPersonSelectedId = GetIdOfFirstDisplayedMerc( );
04721                   }
04722             }
04723 
04724             fCurrentTeamMode = TRUE;
04725             fReDrawScreenFlag = TRUE;     
04726       }
04727 
04728 }
04729 
04730 
04731 void PersonnelDepartedTeamCallback( MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
04732 {
04733       if(iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP)
04734   {
04735 
04736             fCurrentTeamMode = FALSE;
04737 
04738             if( fCurrentTeamMode == FALSE )
04739             {
04740               iCurrentPersonSelectedId = -1;
04741 
04742                   // how many departed people?
04743                   if( GetNumberOfPastMercsOnPlayersTeam( ) > 0 )
04744                   {
04745                         iCurrentPersonSelectedId = 0;
04746                   }
04747 
04748                   //Switch the panel on the right to be the stat panel
04749                   gubPersonnelInfoState = PERSONNEL_STAT_BTN;
04750             }
04751 
04752             fReDrawScreenFlag = TRUE;
04753       }
04754 
04755 }
04756 
04757 
04758 
04759 void CreateDestroyButtonsForDepartedTeamList( void )
04760 {
04761       // creates/ destroys the buttons for cdeparted team list
04762       static BOOLEAN fCreated = FALSE;
04763 
04764       if( ( fCurrentTeamMode == FALSE ) && ( fCreated == FALSE ) )
04765       {
04766             // not created. create
04767             giPersonnelButtonImage[ 4 ]=  LoadButtonImage( "LAPTOP\\departuresbuttons.sti" ,-1,0,-1,2,-1 );
04768         giPersonnelButton[ 4 ] = QuickCreateButton( giPersonnelButtonImage[4], PERS_DEPARTED_UP_X, PERS_DEPARTED_UP_Y,        
04769                           BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST - 1,
04770                                                                   BtnGenericMouseMoveButtonCallback, (GUI_CALLBACK)DepartedUpCallBack);
04771             
04772             // right button
04773             giPersonnelButtonImage[ 5 ]=  LoadButtonImage( "LAPTOP\\departuresbuttons.sti" ,-1,1,-1,3,-1 );
04774             giPersonnelButton[ 5 ] = QuickCreateButton( giPersonnelButtonImage[5], PERS_DEPARTED_UP_X, PERS_DEPARTED_DOWN_Y,
04775                                                                   BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST - 1,
04776                                                                   BtnGenericMouseMoveButtonCallback, (GUI_CALLBACK)DepartedDownCallBack);
04777             
04778             // set up cursors for these buttons
04779             SetButtonCursor( giPersonnelButton[ 4 ], CURSOR_LAPTOP_SCREEN);
04780         SetButtonCursor( giPersonnelButton[ 5 ], CURSOR_LAPTOP_SCREEN);
04781 
04782 
04783             fCreated = TRUE;
04784       }
04785       else if( ( fCurrentTeamMode == TRUE ) && ( fCreated == TRUE ) )
04786       {
04787             // created. destroy
04788             RemoveButton(giPersonnelButton[4] );
04789         UnloadButtonImage(giPersonnelButtonImage[4] );
04790         RemoveButton(giPersonnelButton[5] );
04791         UnloadButtonImage(giPersonnelButtonImage[5] );
04792             fCreated = FALSE;
04793             fReDrawScreenFlag = TRUE;
04794       }
04795 }
04796 
04797 
04798 void DepartedUpCallBack(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
04799 {
04800       if (!(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_ENABLED))
04801             return;
04802 
04803       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
04804       {
04805             if(!(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON))
04806             {
04807                   
04808             }
04809     btn->uiFlags|=(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);   
04810       }
04811       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
04812       {
04813             if(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
04814             {
04815               btn->uiFlags&=~(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
04816 
04817               if(  giCurrentUpperLeftPortraitNumber - 20 >= 0 )
04818                   {
04819                     giCurrentUpperLeftPortraitNumber-=20;
04820                     fReDrawScreenFlag = TRUE;
04821                   }
04822             }
04823       }
04824 }
04825 
04826 
04827 void DepartedDownCallBack(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
04828 {
04829       if (!(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_ENABLED))
04830             return;
04831 
04832       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
04833       {
04834             if(!(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON))
04835             {
04836                   
04837             }
04838     btn->uiFlags|=(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);   
04839       }
04840       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
04841       {
04842             if(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
04843             {
04844                   btn->uiFlags&=~(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
04845                   if( ( giCurrentUpperLeftPortraitNumber + 20 ) < ( GetNumberOfDeadOnPastTeam( ) + GetNumberOfLeftOnPastTeam( ) + GetNumberOfOtherOnPastTeam( ) ) )
04846                   {
04847                         giCurrentUpperLeftPortraitNumber+=20;
04848                         fReDrawScreenFlag = TRUE;
04849                   }
04850             }
04851       }
04852 }
04853 
04854 void DisplayPastMercsPortraits( void )
04855 {
04856       // display past mercs portraits, starting at giCurrentUpperLeftPortraitNumber and going up 20 mercs
04857       // start at dead mercs, then fired, then other
04858 
04859       INT32 iCounter = 0;
04860       INT32 iCounterA = 0;
04861       INT32 iStartArray = 0; // 0 = dead list, 1 = fired list, 2 = other list
04862       BOOLEAN fFound = FALSE;
04863 
04864       // not time to display
04865       if( fCurrentTeamMode == TRUE )
04866       {
04867             return;
04868       }
04869 
04870       // go through dead list
04871 //    for( iCounterA = 0; ( ( LaptopSaveInfo.ubDeadCharactersList[ iCounterA ] != -1 ) && ( iCounter < giCurrentUpperLeftPortraitNumber ) ); iCounter++, iCounterA++ );
04872       for( iCounterA = 0; ( iCounter < giCurrentUpperLeftPortraitNumber ); iCounterA++ )
04873       {
04874             if( LaptopSaveInfo.ubDeadCharactersList[ iCounterA ] != -1 )
04875                   iCounter++;
04876       }
04877 
04878       if( iCounter < giCurrentUpperLeftPortraitNumber)
04879       {
04880                   // now the fired list
04881 //                for( iCounterA = 0; ( ( LaptopSaveInfo.ubLeftCharactersList[ iCounterA ] != -1 ) && ( iCounter < giCurrentUpperLeftPortraitNumber ) ); iCounter++, iCounterA++ );
04882                   for( iCounterA = 0; ( ( iCounter < giCurrentUpperLeftPortraitNumber ) ); iCounterA++ )
04883                   {
04884                         if( LaptopSaveInfo.ubLeftCharactersList[ iCounterA ] != -1 )
04885                         {
04886                               iCounter++;
04887                         }
04888                   }
04889                   
04890                   if( iCounter < 20 )
04891                   {
04892                     iStartArray = 0;
04893                   }
04894                   else
04895                   {
04896                         iStartArray = 1;
04897                   }
04898       }
04899       else
04900       {
04901             iStartArray = 0;
04902       }
04903 
04904       if( ( iCounter < giCurrentUpperLeftPortraitNumber ) && ( iStartArray != 0 ) )
04905       {
04906                   // now the fired list
04907 //                for( iCounterA = 0; ( ( LaptopSaveInfo.ubOtherCharactersList[ iCounterA ] != -1 ) && ( iCounter < giCurrentUpperLeftPortraitNumber ) ); iCounter++, iCounterA++ );
04908                   for( iCounterA = 0; ( iCounter < giCurrentUpperLeftPortraitNumber ); iCounterA++ )
04909                   {
04910                         if( LaptopSaveInfo.ubOtherCharactersList[ iCounterA ] != -1 )
04911                               iCounter++;
04912                   }
04913                   
04914                   if( iCounter < 20 )
04915                   {
04916                     iStartArray = 1;
04917                   }
04918                   else
04919                   {
04920                         iStartArray = 2;
04921                   }
04922       }
04923       else if( iStartArray != 0 )
04924       {
04925             iStartArray = 1;
04926       }
04927 
04928       //; we now have the array to start in, the position
04929 
04930       iCounter = 0;
04931 
04932       if( iStartArray == 0 )
04933       {
04934             // run through list and display
04935 //      for( iCounterA ; ( ( iCounter < 20 ) && ( LaptopSaveInfo.ubDeadCharactersList[ iCounterA ] != -1 ) ); iCounter++, iCounterA++ )
04936         for( iCounterA ; iCounter < 20 && iCounterA < 256; iCounterA++ )
04937             {
04938                   // show dead pictures
04939                   if( LaptopSaveInfo.ubDeadCharactersList[ iCounterA ] != -1 )
04940                   {
04941                         DisplayPortraitOfPastMerc( LaptopSaveInfo.ubDeadCharactersList[ iCounterA ], iCounter, TRUE, FALSE, FALSE );
04942                         iCounter++;
04943                   }
04944             }
04945 
04946             // reset counter A for the next array, if applicable
04947             iCounterA = 0;
04948       }
04949       if( iStartArray <= 1 )
04950       {
04951 //          for( iCounterA ; ( ( iCounter < 20 ) && ( LaptopSaveInfo.ubLeftCharactersList[ iCounterA ] != -1 ) ); iCounter++, iCounterA++  )
04952             for( iCounterA ; ( iCounter < 20  && iCounterA < 256 ); iCounterA++  )
04953             {
04954                   // show fired pics
04955                   if( LaptopSaveInfo.ubLeftCharactersList[ iCounterA ] != -1 )
04956                   {
04957                         DisplayPortraitOfPastMerc( LaptopSaveInfo.ubLeftCharactersList[ iCounterA ], iCounter, FALSE, TRUE, FALSE );
04958                         iCounter++;
04959                   }
04960             }
04961             // reset counter A for the next array, if applicable
04962             iCounterA = 0;
04963       }
04964 
04965       if( iStartArray <= 2 )
04966       {
04967 //          for( iCounterA ; ( ( iCounter < 20 ) && ( LaptopSaveInfo.ubOtherCharactersList[ iCounterA ] != -1 ) ) ; iCounter++, iCounterA++ )
04968             for( iCounterA ; ( iCounter < 20  && iCounterA < 256 ); iCounterA++ )
04969             {
04970                   // show other pics
04971                   if( LaptopSaveInfo.ubOtherCharactersList[ iCounterA ] != -1 )
04972                   {
04973                         DisplayPortraitOfPastMerc( LaptopSaveInfo.ubOtherCharactersList[ iCounterA ], iCounter, FALSE, FALSE, TRUE );
04974                         iCounter++;
04975                   }
04976             }
04977             // reset counter A for the next array, if applicable
04978             iCounterA = 0;
04979       }
04980 
04981 
04982 
04983       return;
04984 }
04985 
04986 
04987 INT32 GetIdOfPastMercInSlot( INT32 iSlot )
04988 {
04989 
04990       INT32 iCounter =-1;
04991       INT32 iCounterA =0;
04992       // returns ID of Merc in this slot
04993 
04994       // not time to display
04995       if( fCurrentTeamMode == TRUE )
04996       {
04997             return -1;
04998       }
04999 
05000       if( iSlot > ( ( GetNumberOfDeadOnPastTeam( ) + GetNumberOfLeftOnPastTeam( ) + GetNumberOfOtherOnPastTeam( ) ) - giCurrentUpperLeftPortraitNumber ) )
05001       {
05002             // invalid slot
05003             return iCurrentPersonSelectedId;
05004       }
05005       // go through dead list
05006       for( iCounterA = 0; ( ( iCounter ) < iSlot + giCurrentUpperLeftPortraitNumber);  iCounterA++ )
05007       {
05008             if( LaptopSaveInfo.ubDeadCharactersList[ iCounterA ] != -1 )
05009                   iCounter++;
05010       }
05011 
05012       if( iSlot + giCurrentUpperLeftPortraitNumber == iCounter)
05013       {
05014             return  ( LaptopSaveInfo.ubDeadCharactersList[ iCounterA - 1] );
05015       }
05016 
05017       // now the fired list
05018       iCounterA =0;
05019       for( iCounterA = 0; ( ( ( iCounter  )< iSlot + giCurrentUpperLeftPortraitNumber) ); iCounterA++ )
05020       {
05021             if( LaptopSaveInfo.ubLeftCharactersList[ iCounterA ] != -1 )
05022                   iCounter++;
05023       }
05024             
05025       if( iSlot + giCurrentUpperLeftPortraitNumber == iCounter)
05026       {
05027             return  ( LaptopSaveInfo.ubLeftCharactersList[ iCounterA  - 1 ] );
05028       }
05029             
05030 
05031       // now the fired list
05032       iCounterA =0;
05033       for( iCounterA = 0; ( ( ( iCounter ) < ( iSlot + giCurrentUpperLeftPortraitNumber ) ) ); iCounterA++ )
05034       {
05035             if( LaptopSaveInfo.ubOtherCharactersList[ iCounterA ] != -1 )
05036                   iCounter++;
05037       }
05038 
05039       return( LaptopSaveInfo.ubOtherCharactersList[ iCounterA  - 1] );
05040 
05041 }

05046 
05047 BOOLEAN DisplayPortraitOfPastMerc( INT32 iId , INT32 iCounter, BOOLEAN fDead, BOOLEAN fFired, BOOLEAN fOther )
05048 {
05049 
05050       
05051       char sTemp[100];
05052       HVOBJECT hFaceHandle;
05053   VOBJECT_DESC    VObjectDesc;
05054       
05055 
05056 
05057       if( ( 50 <  iId   )&&( 57 >   iId   ) )
05058       {
05059             sprintf( sTemp, "%s%03d.sti", SMALL_FACES_DIR,   gMercProfiles[ iId ].ubFaceIndex );      
05060       }
05061       else
05062       {
05063             if(  iId  < 100 )
05064             {
05065                    sprintf(sTemp, "%s%02d.sti", SMALL_FACES_DIR, iId );
05066             }
05067             else
05068             {
05069                   sprintf(sTemp, "%s%03d.sti", SMALL_FACES_DIR,    iId  );
05070             }
05071       }
05072 
05073       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
05074       FilenameForBPP(sTemp, VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
05075       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiFACE));
05076 
05077 
05078       //Blt face to screen to 
05079       GetVideoObject(&hFaceHandle, guiFACE);
05080 
05081       if( fDead )
05082       {
05083             hFaceHandle->pShades[ 0 ]           = Create16BPPPaletteShaded( hFaceHandle->pPaletteEntry, DEAD_MERC_COLOR_RED, DEAD_MERC_COLOR_GREEN, DEAD_MERC_COLOR_BLUE, TRUE );
05084                   
05085             //set the red pallete to the face
05086             SetObjectHandleShade( guiFACE, 0 );
05087       }
05088 
05089       BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hFaceHandle, 0,( INT16 ) ( SMALL_PORTRAIT_START_X+ ( iCounter % PERSONNEL_PORTRAIT_NUMBER_WIDTH ) * SMALL_PORT_WIDTH ), ( INT16 ) ( SMALL_PORTRAIT_START_Y + ( iCounter / PERSONNEL_PORTRAIT_NUMBER_WIDTH ) * SMALL_PORT_HEIGHT ), VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
05090 
05091       
05092 /*
05093  text on the Small portrait
05094       if( fDead )
05095       {
05096             //if the merc is dead, display it
05097 //          DrawTextToScreen(pDepartedMercPortraitStrings[0], ( INT16 ) ( SMALL_PORTRAIT_START_X+ ( iCounter % PERSONNEL_PORTRAIT_NUMBER_WIDTH ) * SMALL_PORT_WIDTH ), ( INT16 ) ( SMALL_PORTRAIT_START_Y + ( iCounter / PERSONNEL_PORTRAIT_NUMBER_WIDTH ) * SMALL_PORT_HEIGHT + SMALL_PORT_HEIGHT / 2 ), SMALL_PORTRAIT_WIDTH_NO_BORDERS, FONT10ARIAL, 145, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED     );
05098             DrawTextToScreen( AimPopUpText[ AIM_MEMBER_DEAD ], ( INT16 ) ( SMALL_PORTRAIT_START_X+ ( iCounter % PERSONNEL_PORTRAIT_NUMBER_WIDTH ) * SMALL_PORT_WIDTH ), ( INT16 ) ( SMALL_PORTRAIT_START_Y + ( iCounter / PERSONNEL_PORTRAIT_NUMBER_WIDTH ) * SMALL_PORT_HEIGHT + SMALL_PORT_HEIGHT / 2 ), SMALL_PORTRAIT_WIDTH_NO_BORDERS, FONT10ARIAL, 145, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED    );
05099       }
05100       else if( fFired )
05101       {
05102             DrawTextToScreen(pDepartedMercPortraitStrings[1], ( INT16 ) ( SMALL_PORTRAIT_START_X+ ( iCounter % PERSONNEL_PORTRAIT_NUMBER_WIDTH ) * SMALL_PORT_WIDTH ), ( INT16 ) ( SMALL_PORTRAIT_START_Y + ( iCounter / PERSONNEL_PORTRAIT_NUMBER_WIDTH ) * SMALL_PORT_HEIGHT + SMALL_PORT_HEIGHT / 2 ), SMALL_PORTRAIT_WIDTH_NO_BORDERS, FONT10ARIAL, 145, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED     );
05103       }
05104       else if( fOther )
05105       {
05106             DrawTextToScreen(pDepartedMercPortraitStrings[2], ( INT16 ) ( SMALL_PORTRAIT_START_X+ ( iCounter % PERSONNEL_PORTRAIT_NUMBER_WIDTH ) * SMALL_PORT_WIDTH ), ( INT16 ) ( SMALL_PORTRAIT_START_Y + ( iCounter / PERSONNEL_PORTRAIT_NUMBER_WIDTH ) * SMALL_PORT_HEIGHT + SMALL_PORT_HEIGHT / 2 ), SMALL_PORTRAIT_WIDTH_NO_BORDERS, FONT10ARIAL, 145, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED     );
05107       }
05108 */
05109       
05110       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiFACE);
05111       
05112       return ( TRUE );
05113 }
