05117 
05118 void DisplayDepartedCharStats(INT32 iId, INT32 iSlot, INT32 iState)
05119 {
05120       INT32 iCounter=0;
05121       wchar_t sString[50];
05122       INT16 sX, sY;
05123       UINT32 uiHits = 0;
05124 
05125             // font stuff
05126       SetFont( FONT10ARIAL );
05127       SetFontBackground( FONT_BLACK );
05128       SetFontForeground( PERS_TEXT_FONT_COLOR );
05129 
05130       // display the stats for a char
05131       for(iCounter=0;iCounter <MAX_STATS; iCounter++)
05132       {
05133             switch(iCounter)
05134             {
05135              case 0:
05136                    // health
05137 
05138                    // dead?
05139                    if( iState == 0 )
05140                    {
05141                      swprintf(sString, L"%d/%d",0,gMercProfiles[iId].bLife);
05142                    }
05143                    else
05144                    {
05145                          swprintf(sString, L"%d/%d",gMercProfiles[iId].bLife,gMercProfiles[iId].bLife);
05146                    }
05147        
05148                    mprintf((INT16)(pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter].x+(iSlot*TEXT_BOX_WIDTH)),pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter].y,pPersonnelScreenStrings[iCounter]);            
05149                FindFontRightCoordinates((INT16)(pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter].x+(iSlot*TEXT_BOX_WIDTH)),0,TEXT_BOX_WIDTH-20,0,sString, PERS_FONT,  &sX, &sY);
05150        mprintf(sX,pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter].y,sString);           
05151                    break;
05152              case 1:
05153                    // agility
05154        swprintf(sString, L"%d",gMercProfiles[iId].bAgility);
05155        mprintf((INT16)(pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter].x+(iSlot*TEXT_BOX_WIDTH)),pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter].y,pPersonnelScreenStrings[iCounter]);           
05156                FindFontRightCoordinates((INT16)(pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter].x+(iSlot*TEXT_BOX_WIDTH)),0,TEXT_BOX_WIDTH-20,0,sString, PERS_FONT,  &sX, &sY);
05157        mprintf(sX,pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter].y,sString);           
05158                    break;
05159              case 2:
05160               // dexterity
05161        swprintf(sString, L"%d",gMercProfiles[iId].bDexterity);
05162        mprintf((INT16)(pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter].x+(iSlot*TEXT_BOX_WIDTH)),pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter].y,pPersonnelScreenStrings[iCounter]);          
05163                FindFontRightCoordinates((INT16)(pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter].x+(iSlot*TEXT_BOX_WIDTH)),0,TEXT_BOX_WIDTH-20,0,sString, PERS_FONT,  &sX, &sY);
05164        mprintf(sX,pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter].y,sString);           
05165                   break;
05166              case 3:
05167              // strength
05168        swprintf(sString, L"%d",gMercProfiles[iId].bStrength);
05169        mprintf((INT16)(pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter].x+(iSlot*TEXT_BOX_WIDTH)),pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter].y,pPersonnelScreenStrings[iCounter]);          
05170                FindFontRightCoordinates((INT16)(pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter].x+(iSlot*TEXT_BOX_WIDTH)),0,TEXT_BOX_WIDTH-20,0,sString, PERS_FONT,  &sX, &sY);
05171        mprintf(sX,pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter].y,sString);           
05172              break;
05173              case 4:
05174               // leadership
05175        swprintf(sString, L"%d",gMercProfiles[iId].bLeadership);
05176        mprintf((INT16)(pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter].x+(iSlot*TEXT_BOX_WIDTH)),pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter].y,pPersonnelScreenStrings[iCounter]);          
05177                FindFontRightCoordinates((INT16)(pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter].x+(iSlot*TEXT_BOX_WIDTH)),0,TEXT_BOX_WIDTH-20,0,sString, PERS_FONT,  &sX, &sY);
05178        mprintf(sX,pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter].y,sString);           
05179              break;
05180              case 5:
05181               // wisdom
05182        swprintf(sString, L"%d",gMercProfiles[iId].bWisdom);
05183        mprintf((INT16)(pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter].x+(iSlot*TEXT_BOX_WIDTH)),pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter].y,pPersonnelScreenStrings[iCounter]);          
05184                FindFontRightCoordinates((INT16)(pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter].x+(iSlot*TEXT_BOX_WIDTH)),0,TEXT_BOX_WIDTH-20,0,sString, PERS_FONT,  &sX, &sY);
05185        mprintf(sX,pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter].y,sString);           
05186              break;
05187              case 6:
05188               // exper
05189        swprintf(sString, L"%d",gMercProfiles[iId].bExpLevel);
05190        mprintf((INT16)(pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter].x+(iSlot*TEXT_BOX_WIDTH)),pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter].y,pPersonnelScreenStrings[iCounter]);          
05191                FindFontRightCoordinates((INT16)(pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter].x+(iSlot*TEXT_BOX_WIDTH)),0,TEXT_BOX_WIDTH-20,0,sString, PERS_FONT,  &sX, &sY);
05192        mprintf(sX,pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter].y,sString);           
05193              break;
05194              case 7:
05195                    //mrkmanship
05196        swprintf(sString, L"%d",gMercProfiles[iId].bMarksmanship);
05197        mprintf((INT16)(pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter].x+(iSlot*TEXT_BOX_WIDTH)),pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter].y,pPersonnelScreenStrings[iCounter]);          
05198                FindFontRightCoordinates((INT16)(pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter].x+(iSlot*TEXT_BOX_WIDTH)),0,TEXT_BOX_WIDTH-20,0,sString, PERS_FONT,  &sX, &sY);
05199        mprintf(sX,pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter].y,sString);           
05200              break;
05201      case 8:
05202               // mech
05203        swprintf(sString, L"%d",gMercProfiles[iId].bMechanical);
05204        mprintf((INT16)(pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter].x+(iSlot*TEXT_BOX_WIDTH)),pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter].y,pPersonnelScreenStrings[iCounter]);          
05205                FindFontRightCoordinates((INT16)(pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter].x+(iSlot*TEXT_BOX_WIDTH)),0,TEXT_BOX_WIDTH-20,0,sString, PERS_FONT,  &sX, &sY);
05206        mprintf(sX,pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter].y,sString);           
05207              break;
05208      case 9:
05209               // exp
05210        swprintf(sString, L"%d",gMercProfiles[iId].bExplosive);
05211        mprintf((INT16)(pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter].x+(iSlot*TEXT_BOX_WIDTH)),pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter].y,pPersonnelScreenStrings[iCounter]);          
05212                FindFontRightCoordinates((INT16)(pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter].x+(iSlot*TEXT_BOX_WIDTH)),0,TEXT_BOX_WIDTH-20,0,sString, PERS_FONT,  &sX, &sY);
05213        mprintf(sX,pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter].y,sString);           
05214              break;
05215              case 10:
05216        // med
05217                    mprintf((INT16)(pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter].x+(iSlot*TEXT_BOX_WIDTH)),pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter].y,pPersonnelScreenStrings[iCounter]);          
05218         
05219        swprintf(sString, L"%d",gMercProfiles[iId].bMedical);
05220                    
05221                         
05222                    FindFontRightCoordinates((INT16)(pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter].x+(iSlot*TEXT_BOX_WIDTH)),0,TEXT_BOX_WIDTH-20,0,sString, PERS_FONT,  &sX, &sY);
05223                    mprintf(sX,pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter].y,sString);    
05224              break;
05225 
05226 
05227              case 14:
05228              // kills
05229       mprintf((INT16)(pPersonnelScreenPoints[21].x+(iSlot*TEXT_BOX_WIDTH)),pPersonnelScreenPoints[21].y,pPersonnelScreenStrings[PRSNL_TXT_KILLS]);           
05230                   swprintf(sString, L"%d",gMercProfiles[iId].usKills);
05231       FindFontRightCoordinates((INT16)(pPersonnelScreenPoints[21].x+(iSlot*TEXT_BOX_WIDTH)),0,TEXT_BOX_WIDTH-20,0,sString, PERS_FONT,  &sX, &sY);
05232       mprintf(sX,pPersonnelScreenPoints[21].y,sString);
05233              break;
05234              case 15:
05235                   // assists
05236                   mprintf((INT16)(pPersonnelScreenPoints[22].x+(iSlot*TEXT_BOX_WIDTH)),pPersonnelScreenPoints[22].y,pPersonnelScreenStrings[PRSNL_TXT_ASSISTS]);         
05237                   swprintf(sString, L"%d",gMercProfiles[iId].usAssists);
05238       FindFontRightCoordinates((INT16)(pPersonnelScreenPoints[22].x+(iSlot*TEXT_BOX_WIDTH)),0,TEXT_BOX_WIDTH-20,0,sString, PERS_FONT,  &sX, &sY);
05239       mprintf(sX,pPersonnelScreenPoints[22].y,sString);
05240              break;
05241               case 16:
05242                   // shots/hits
05243                   mprintf((INT16)(pPersonnelScreenPoints[23].x+(iSlot*TEXT_BOX_WIDTH)),pPersonnelScreenPoints[23].y,pPersonnelScreenStrings[PRSNL_TXT_HIT_PERCENTAGE]);        
05244                   uiHits = ( UINT32 )gMercProfiles[iId].usShotsHit;
05245                   uiHits *= 100;
05246                   
05247                   // check we have shot at least once
05248                   if( gMercProfiles[iId].usShotsFired > 0 )
05249                   {
05250                     uiHits /= ( UINT32 )gMercProfiles[iId].usShotsFired;
05251                   }
05252                   else
05253                   {
05254                         // no, set hit % to 0
05255                         uiHits = 0;
05256                   }
05257 
05258                   swprintf(sString, L"%d %%%%",uiHits);
05259       FindFontRightCoordinates((INT16)(pPersonnelScreenPoints[23].x+(iSlot*TEXT_BOX_WIDTH)),0,TEXT_BOX_WIDTH-20,0,sString, PERS_FONT,  &sX, &sY);
05260       sX += StringPixLength( L"%",  PERS_FONT );
05261                   mprintf(sX,pPersonnelScreenPoints[23].y,sString);
05262              break;
05263               case 17:
05264                   // battles
05265                   mprintf((INT16)(pPersonnelScreenPoints[24].x+(iSlot*TEXT_BOX_WIDTH)),pPersonnelScreenPoints[24].y,pPersonnelScreenStrings[PRSNL_TXT_BATTLES]);
05266                   swprintf(sString, L"%d",gMercProfiles[iId].usBattlesFought);
05267       FindFontRightCoordinates((INT16)(pPersonnelScreenPoints[24].x+(iSlot*TEXT_BOX_WIDTH)),0,TEXT_BOX_WIDTH-20,0,sString, PERS_FONT,  &sX, &sY);
05268       mprintf(sX,pPersonnelScreenPoints[24].y,sString);
05269              break;
05270              case 18:
05271                   // wounds
05272                   mprintf((INT16)(pPersonnelScreenPoints[25].x+(iSlot*TEXT_BOX_WIDTH)),pPersonnelScreenPoints[25].y,pPersonnelScreenStrings[PRSNL_TXT_TIMES_WOUNDED]);
05273                   swprintf(sString, L"%d",gMercProfiles[iId].usTimesWounded);
05274       FindFontRightCoordinates((INT16)(pPersonnelScreenPoints[25].x+(iSlot*TEXT_BOX_WIDTH)),0,TEXT_BOX_WIDTH-20,0,sString, PERS_FONT,  &sX, &sY);
05275       mprintf(sX,pPersonnelScreenPoints[25].y,sString);
05276              break;
05277             }
05278       }
05279 
05280       return;
05281 }
05282 
05283 
05284 void EnableDisableDeparturesButtons( void )
05285 {
05286 
05287       // will enable or disable departures buttons based on upperleft picutre index value
05288       if( ( fCurrentTeamMode == TRUE )||( fNewMailFlag == TRUE ) )
05289       {
05290             return;
05291       }
05292 
05293       // disable both buttons
05294       DisableButton( giPersonnelButton[ 4 ] );
05295       DisableButton( giPersonnelButton[ 5 ] );
05296 
05297 
05298       if( giCurrentUpperLeftPortraitNumber != 0 )
05299       {
05300             // enable up button
05301             EnableButton( giPersonnelButton[ 4 ] );
05302       }
05303       if( ( GetNumberOfDeadOnPastTeam( ) + GetNumberOfLeftOnPastTeam( ) + GetNumberOfOtherOnPastTeam( ) ) - giCurrentUpperLeftPortraitNumber  >= 20 )
05304       {
05305             // enable down button
05306             EnableButton( giPersonnelButton[ 5 ] );
05307       }
05308 
05309 
05310       return;
05311 }
05312 
05313 
05314 void DisplayDepartedCharName( INT32 iId, INT32 iSlot, INT32 iState )
05315 {
05316   // get merc's nickName, assignment, and sector location info
05317       INT16 sX, sY;
05318       CHAR16 sString[ 32 ];
05319 
05320   SetFont(CHAR_NAME_FONT);
05321       SetFontForeground(PERS_TEXT_FONT_COLOR);
05322       SetFontBackground(FONT_BLACK);
05323       
05324       if( ( iState == -1 )||( iId == -1 ) )
05325       {
05326             return;
05327       }
05328 
05329       swprintf( sString, L"%s", gMercProfiles[ iId ].zNickname );
05330 
05331             // nick name - assignment
05332       FindFontCenterCoordinates(IMAGE_BOX_X-5,0,IMAGE_BOX_WIDTH + 90 , 0,sString,CHAR_NAME_FONT, &sX, &sY );
05333 
05334       // cehck to se eif we are going to go off the left edge
05335       if( sX < pPersonnelScreenPoints[ 0 ].x )
05336       {
05337             sX = ( INT16 )pPersonnelScreenPoints[ 0 ].x;
05338       }
05339 
05340       mprintf( sX + iSlot * IMAGE_BOX_WIDTH, CHAR_NAME_Y, sString );
05341   
05342 
05343       // state
05344       if( gMercProfiles[ iId ].ubMiscFlags2 & PROFILE_MISC_FLAG2_MARRIED_TO_HICKS )
05345       {
05346             //displaye 'married'
05347             swprintf( sString, L"%s", pPersonnelDepartedStateStrings[ DEPARTED_MARRIED ] );
05348       }
05349       else if(  iState == DEPARTED_DEAD )
05350       {
05351             swprintf( sString, L"%s", pPersonnelDepartedStateStrings[ DEPARTED_DEAD ] );
05352       }
05353 
05354       //if the merc is an AIM merc
05355       else if( iId < BIFF )
05356       {
05357             //if dismissed
05358             if( iState == DEPARTED_FIRED )
05359                   swprintf( sString, L"%s", pPersonnelDepartedStateStrings[ DEPARTED_FIRED ] );
05360             else
05361                   swprintf( sString, L"%s", pPersonnelDepartedStateStrings[ DEPARTED_CONTRACT_EXPIRED ] );
05362       }
05363 
05364       //else if its a MERC merc
05365       else if( iId >= BIFF && iId <= BUBBA )
05366       {
05367             if( iState == DEPARTED_FIRED )
05368                   swprintf( sString, L"%s", pPersonnelDepartedStateStrings[ DEPARTED_FIRED ] );
05369             else
05370                   swprintf( sString, L"%s", pPersonnelDepartedStateStrings[ DEPARTED_QUIT ] );
05371       }
05372       //must be a RPC
05373       else
05374       {
05375             if( iState == DEPARTED_FIRED )
05376                   swprintf( sString, L"%s", pPersonnelDepartedStateStrings[ DEPARTED_FIRED ] );
05377             else
05378                   swprintf( sString, L"%s", pPersonnelDepartedStateStrings[ DEPARTED_QUIT ] );
05379       }
05380 
05381 //    swprintf( sString, L"%s", pPersonnelDepartedStateStrings[ iState ] );
05382 
05383             // nick name - assignment
05384       FindFontCenterCoordinates(IMAGE_BOX_X-5,0,IMAGE_BOX_WIDTH + 90 , 0,sString,CHAR_NAME_FONT, &sX, &sY );
05385 
05386       // cehck to se eif we are going to go off the left edge
05387       if( sX < pPersonnelScreenPoints[ 0 ].x )
05388       {
05389             sX = ( INT16 )pPersonnelScreenPoints[ 0 ].x;
05390       }
05391 
05392       mprintf( sX + iSlot * IMAGE_BOX_WIDTH, CHAR_NAME_Y + 10 , sString );
05393 
05394   
05395   
05396       return;
05397 }
05398 
05399 
05400 INT32 GetTheStateOfDepartedMerc( INT32 iId )
05401 {
05402 
05403       INT32 iCounter =0;
05404       // will runt hrough each list until merc is found, if not a -1 is returned
05405 
05406       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < 256; iCounter++ )
05407       {
05408             if ( LaptopSaveInfo.ubDeadCharactersList[ iCounter ] == iId )
05409             {
05410                   return( DEPARTED_DEAD );
05411             }
05412       }
05413 
05414       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < 256; iCounter++ )
05415       {
05416             if ( LaptopSaveInfo.ubLeftCharactersList[ iCounter ] == iId )
05417             {
05418                   return( DEPARTED_FIRED );
05419             }
05420       }
05421 
05422       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < 256; iCounter++ )
05423       {
05424             if ( LaptopSaveInfo.ubOtherCharactersList[ iCounter ] == iId )
05425             {
05426                   return( DEPARTED_OTHER );
05427             }
05428       }
05429 
05430       return( -1 );
05431 }

05464       }

05474 
05475 
05476       // deleteit
05477       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( uiBox );

05479 
05480       return ( TRUE );

05483 // add to dead list
05484 void AddCharacterToDeadList( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
05485 {
05486       INT32 iCounter = 0;
05487 
05488 
05489       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < 256; iCounter++ )
05490       {
05491             if( LaptopSaveInfo.ubDeadCharactersList[ iCounter ] == -1 )
05492             {
05493                   // valid slot, merc not found yet, inset here
05494                   LaptopSaveInfo.ubDeadCharactersList[ iCounter ] = pSoldier->ubProfile;
05495 
05496                   // leave
05497                   return;
05498             }
05499 
05500             // are they already in the list?
05501             if( LaptopSaveInfo.ubDeadCharactersList[ iCounter ] == pSoldier->ubProfile )
05502             {
05503 
05504                   return;
05505             }
05506       }
05507 }

05560 
05561 
05562 // If you have hired a merc before, then the they left for whatever reason, and now you are hiring them again, 
05563 // we must get rid of them from the departed section in the personnel screen.  ( wouldnt make sense for them 
05564 //to be on your team list, and departed list )
05565 BOOLEAN RemoveNewlyHiredMercFromPersonnelDepartedList( UINT8 ubProfile )
05566 {
05567       INT32 iCounter = 0;
05568 
05569       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < 256; iCounter++ )
05570       {
05571             // are they already in the Dead list?
05572             if( LaptopSaveInfo.ubDeadCharactersList[ iCounter ] == ubProfile )
05573             {
05574                   //Reset the fact that they were once hired
05575                   LaptopSaveInfo.ubDeadCharactersList[ iCounter ] = -1;
05576                   return( TRUE );
05577             }
05578 
05579             // are they already in the other list?
05580             if( LaptopSaveInfo.ubLeftCharactersList[ iCounter ] == ubProfile )
05581             {
05582                   //Reset the fact that they were once hired
05583                   LaptopSaveInfo.ubLeftCharactersList[ iCounter ] = -1;
05584                   return( TRUE );
05585             }
05586 
05587             // are they already in the list?
05588             if( LaptopSaveInfo.ubOtherCharactersList[ iCounter ] == ubProfile )
05589             {
05590                   //Reset the fact that they were once hired
05591                   LaptopSaveInfo.ubOtherCharactersList[ iCounter ] = -1;
05592                   return( TRUE );
05593             }
05594       }
05595 
05596       return( FALSE );
05597 }
05598 
05599 // grab the id of the first merc being displayed 
05600 INT32 GetIdOfFirstDisplayedMerc( )
05601 {
05602       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
05603       INT32 cnt = 0, iCounter = 0;
05604 
05605       // set current soldier
05606       pSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ];
05607 
05608   if( fCurrentTeamMode == TRUE )
05609       {
05610             // run through list of soldiers on players current team
05611             //cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ pSoldier->bTeam ].bFirstID;
05612     for ( pSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ pSoldier->bTeam ].bLastID; cnt++, pSoldier++ )
05613             {     
05614                if( ( pSoldier->bActive )&&( pSoldier->bLife > 0 ) )
05615                    {
05616                          return( 0 );
05617                    }
05618             }
05619             return( -1 );
05620       }
05621       else
05622       {
05623             // run through list of soldier on players old team...the slot id will be translated
05624             return 0;
05625       }
05626 }
05627 
05628 INT32 GetIdOfThisSlot( INT32 iSlot )
05629 {
05630             SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
05631       INT32 cnt = 0;
05632       INT32 iCounter = 0;
05633 
05634       // set current soldier
05635       pSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ];
05636 
05637   if( fCurrentTeamMode == TRUE )
05638       {
05639             // run through list of soldiers on players current team
05640             cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ pSoldier->bTeam ].bFirstID;
05641     for ( pSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ pSoldier->bTeam ].bLastID; cnt++, pSoldier++ )
05642             {     
05643                if( ( pSoldier->bActive )  )
05644                    {
05645                          
05646 
05647                          // same character as slot, return this value
05648                          if( iCounter == iSlot )
05649                          {
05650                                     return( cnt );
05651                          }
05652 
05653                          // found another soldier
05654                          iCounter++;
05655                    }
05656             }
05657       }
05658       else
05659       {
05660             // run through list of soldier on players old team...the slot id will be translated
05661             return iSlot;
05662       }
05663 
05664 
05665       return( 0 );
05666 }

05669 BOOLEAN RenderAtmPanel( void )
05670 {
05671 
05672        VOBJECT_DESC VObjectDesc;
05673        UINT32 uiBox = 0;
05674        HVOBJECT hHandle;
05675 
05676 
05677       // render the ATM panel
05678       if( fShowAtmPanel )
05679       {
05680             VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
05681             FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\AtmButtons.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
05682             CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &uiBox));
05683 
05684             // blit it
05685             GetVideoObject(&hHandle, uiBox);
05686             BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hHandle, 0,( INT16 ) ( ATM_UL_X ), ( INT16 ) ( ATM_UL_Y ), VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
05687 
05688             DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( uiBox );
05689 
05690             // show amount
05691             DisplayATMAmount( );
05692             RenderRectangleForPersonnelTransactionAmount( );
05693 
05694             // create destroy
05695             CreateDestroyStartATMButton( );
05696             CreateDestroyATMButton( );
05697 
05698             // display strings for ATM
05699             DisplayATMStrings( );
05700 
05701             // handle states
05702             HandleStateOfATMButtons( );
05703 
05704             //DisplayAmountOnCurrentMerc( );
05705 
05706       }
05707       else
05708       {
05709             // just show basic panel
05710             // bounding
05711             VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
05712             FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\AtmButtons.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
05713             CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &uiBox));
05714 
05715             GetVideoObject(&hHandle, uiBox);
05716             BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hHandle, 0,( INT16 ) ( ATM_UL_X ), ( INT16 ) ( ATM_UL_Y ), VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
05717 
05718             // blit it
05719             GetVideoObject(&hHandle, uiBox);
05720             BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hHandle, 1,( INT16 ) ( ATM_UL_X + 1 ), ( INT16 ) ( ATM_UL_Y + 18), VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
05721 
05722 
05723             DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( uiBox );
05724 
05725             // display strings for ATM
05726             DisplayATMStrings( );
05727 
05728             //DisplayAmountOnCurrentMerc( );
05729 
05730             // create destroy
05731             CreateDestroyStartATMButton( );
05732             CreateDestroyATMButton( );
05733       }
05734       return( TRUE );
05735 }

05775             giPersonnelATMStartButton[ PERSONNEL_EMPLOYMENT_BTN ] = QuickCreateButton( giPersonnelATMStartButtonImage[ PERSONNEL_EMPLOYMENT_BTN ] , iScreenWidthOffset + 519, iScreenHeightOffset + 110,

05801       {

05812             UnloadButtonImage( giPersonnelATMStartButtonImage[ PERSONNEL_INV_BTN ] );
05813 
05814             fCreated = FALSE;
05815       }
05816 }
05817 
05818 void FindPositionOfPersInvSlider( void )
05819 {
05820       INT32 iValue = 0;
05821       INT32 iNumberOfItems = 0;
05822       INT16 sSizeOfEachSubRegion = 0;
05823       INT16 sYPositionOnBar = 0;
05824       INT16 iCurrentItemValue = 0;
05825 
05826       // find out how many there are
05827       iValue = ( INT32 )( GetNumberOfInventoryItemsOnCurrentMerc( ) );
05828 
05829       // otherwise there are more than one item
05830       iNumberOfItems = iValue - NUMBER_OF_INVENTORY_PERSONNEL;
05831 
05832       if( iValue <= 0 )
05833       {
05834             iValue = 1;
05835       }
05836 
05837       // get the subregion sizes
05838       sSizeOfEachSubRegion = ( INT16 )( ( INT32 )( Y_SIZE_OF_PERSONNEL_SCROLL_REGION - SIZE_OF_PERSONNEL_CURSOR ) / ( INT32 )( iNumberOfItems  ) );
05839 
05840       // get slider position
05841       guiSliderPosition = uiCurrentInventoryIndex * sSizeOfEachSubRegion;
05842 
05843 }
05844 
05845 
05846 void HandleSliderBarClickCallback( MOUSE_REGION *pRegion, INT32 iReason )
05847 {
05848       INT32 iValue = 0;
05849       INT32 iNumberOfItems = 0;
05850       POINT MousePos;
05851       INT16 sSizeOfEachSubRegion = 0;
05852       INT16 sYPositionOnBar = 0;
05853       INT16 iCurrentItemValue = 0;
05854 
05855       if( ( iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN ) || ( iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_REPEAT ) ) 
05856   {
05857             // find out how many there are
05858             iValue = ( INT32 )( GetNumberOfInventoryItemsOnCurrentMerc( ) );
05859 
05860             // make sure there are more than one page 
05861             if( ( INT32 )uiCurrentInventoryIndex >=  iValue - NUMBER_OF_INVENTORY_PERSONNEL + 1 )
05862             {
05863                   return;
05864             }
05865 
05866             // otherwise there are more than one item
05867             iNumberOfItems = iValue - NUMBER_OF_INVENTORY_PERSONNEL;
05868 
05869             // number of items is 0
05870             if( iNumberOfItems == 0 )
05871             {
05872                   return;
05873             }
05874 
05875             // find the x,y on the slider bar
05876         GetCursorPos(&MousePos);
05877 
05878             // get the subregion sizes
05879             sSizeOfEachSubRegion = ( INT16 )( ( INT32 )( Y_SIZE_OF_PERSONNEL_SCROLL_REGION - SIZE_OF_PERSONNEL_CURSOR ) / ( INT32 )( iNumberOfItems  ) );
05880 
05881             // get the cursor placement
05882             sYPositionOnBar = (INT16) MousePos.y - Y_OF_PERSONNEL_SCROLL_REGION;
05883 
05884             if( sSizeOfEachSubRegion == 0 )
05885             {
05886                   return;
05887             }
05888 
05889             // get the actual item position
05890             iCurrentItemValue = sYPositionOnBar / sSizeOfEachSubRegion;
05891 
05892             if( uiCurrentInventoryIndex != iCurrentItemValue )
05893             {
05894                   // get slider position
05895                   guiSliderPosition = iCurrentItemValue * sSizeOfEachSubRegion;
05896 
05897                   // set current inventory value
05898                   uiCurrentInventoryIndex = ( UINT8 )iCurrentItemValue;
05899 
05900                   // force update
05901                   fReDrawScreenFlag = TRUE;
05902             }
05903       }
05904 
05905 }
05906 
05907

05916 
05917 }

05919 void CreateDestroyATMButton( void )
05920 {
05921       /*

05923       CHAR16 sString[ 32 ];
05924 
05925       
05926 
05927       // create/destroy atm start button as needed
05928       INT32 iCounter = 0;

05934             {
05935                   if( iCounter != 9 )
05936                   {
05937                         iNumberPadButtonsImages[ iCounter ]=LoadButtonImage( "LAPTOP\\AtmButtons.sti" ,-1,4,-1,6,-1 );
05938                         swprintf( sString, L"%d", iCounter+1 );
05939                   }
05940                   else
05941                   {
05942                         iNumberPadButtonsImages[ iCounter ]=LoadButtonImage( "LAPTOP\\AtmButtons.sti" ,-1,7,-1,9,-1 );
05943                         swprintf( sString, L"%d", iCounter - 9 );
05944                   }
05945 
05946                   iNumberPadButtons[ iCounter ] = QuickCreateButton( iNumberPadButtonsImages[ iCounter ], ( INT16 )( ATM_BUTTONS_START_X + ( ATM_BUTTON_WIDTH * ( INT16 )( iCounter % 3 )) ), ( INT16 )( ATM_BUTTONS_START_Y + ( INT16 )( ATM_BUTTON_HEIGHT * ( iCounter / 3 ))) ,
05947                                                       BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST - 1,
05948                                                       BtnGenericMouseMoveButtonCallback, (GUI_CALLBACK)ATMNumberButtonCallback );
05949                   
05950                   if( iCounter != 9)
05951                   {
05952                         MSYS_SetBtnUserData(iNumberPadButtons[iCounter],0,iCounter + 1 );
05953                   }
05954                   else
05955                   {
05956                         MSYS_SetBtnUserData(iNumberPadButtons[iCounter],0, 0 );
05957                   }
05958                   SetButtonCursor(iNumberPadButtons[iCounter], CURSOR_LAPTOP_SCREEN);
05959                   SpecifyButtonFont( iNumberPadButtons[iCounter], PERS_FONT );
05960                   SpecifyButtonText( iNumberPadButtons[iCounter], sString );
05961                   SpecifyButtonUpTextColors( iNumberPadButtons[iCounter], FONT_BLACK, FONT_BLACK );
05962 
05963             }
05964 
05965 
05966             // now slap down done, cancel, dep, withdraw
05967             for( iCounter = OK_ATM; iCounter < NUMBER_ATM_BUTTONS ;iCounter++ )
05968             {
05969                   if( iCounter == OK_ATM )
05970                   {
05971                         giPersonnelATMSideButtonImage[ iCounter ]=  LoadButtonImage( "LAPTOP\\AtmButtons.sti" ,-1,7,-1,9,-1 );
05972                   }
05973                   else
05974                   {
05975                         giPersonnelATMSideButtonImage[ iCounter ]=  LoadButtonImage( "LAPTOP\\AtmButtons.sti" ,-1,10,-1,12,-1 );
05976                   }
05977                   
05978                   if( ( iCounter != DEPOSIT_ATM ) && ( iCounter != WIDTHDRAWL_ATM ) )
05979                   {
05980                         giPersonnelATMSideButton[ iCounter ] = QuickCreateButton( giPersonnelATMSideButtonImage[ iCounter ], ( INT16 )( pAtmSideButtonPts[ iCounter ].x ), ( INT16 )( pAtmSideButtonPts[ iCounter ].y ),
05981                                                             BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST - 1,
05982                                                             BtnGenericMouseMoveButtonCallback, (GUI_CALLBACK)ATMOtherButtonCallback );
05983                   }
05984                   else
05985                   {
05986                         giPersonnelATMSideButton[ iCounter ] = QuickCreateButton( giPersonnelATMSideButtonImage[ iCounter ], ( INT16 )( pAtmSideButtonPts[ iCounter ].x ), ( INT16 )( pAtmSideButtonPts[ iCounter ].y ),
05987                                                             BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST - 1,
05988                                                             BtnGenericMouseMoveButtonCallback, (GUI_CALLBACK)ATMOther2ButtonCallback );
05989                   }
05990                   MSYS_SetBtnUserData(giPersonnelATMSideButton[iCounter],0,iCounter );
05991                   SpecifyButtonFont( giPersonnelATMSideButton[iCounter], PERS_FONT );
05992                   SetButtonCursor(giPersonnelATMSideButton[iCounter], CURSOR_LAPTOP_SCREEN);
05993                   SpecifyButtonUpTextColors( giPersonnelATMSideButton[iCounter], FONT_BLACK, FONT_BLACK );
05994                   SpecifyButtonText( giPersonnelATMSideButton[iCounter], gsAtmSideButtonText[ iCounter ] );
05995             }
05996 
05997 
05998             //SetButtonCursor(giPersonnelATMStartButton, CURSOR_LAPTOP_SCREEN);
05999             fCreated = TRUE;
06000       }
06001       else if( ( fCreated == TRUE ) && ( fShowAtmPanel == FALSE ) )
06002       {
06003             // stop showing
06004             //RemoveButton( giPersonnelATMButton );
06005             //UnloadButtonImage( giPersonnelATMButtonImage );
06006       
06007             for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < 10; iCounter++ )
06008             {
06009                   UnloadButtonImage( iNumberPadButtonsImages[ iCounter ] );
06010                   RemoveButton( iNumberPadButtons[ iCounter ] );
06011             }
06012 
06013             for( iCounter = OK_ATM; iCounter < NUMBER_ATM_BUTTONS ;iCounter++ )
06014             {
06015                   RemoveButton( giPersonnelATMSideButton[ iCounter ]  );
06016                   UnloadButtonImage( giPersonnelATMSideButtonImage[ iCounter ] );
06017             }
06018 
06019             fCreated = FALSE;
06020       }
06021 
06022       */
06023 }

06025 
06026 void ATMStartButtonCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
06027 {
06028       if (!(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_ENABLED))
06029             return;
06030 
06031       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
06032       {
06033             if(!(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON))
06034             {
06035                   fReDrawScreenFlag=TRUE;
06036             }
06037     btn->uiFlags|=(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);   
06038       }
06039       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
06040       {
06041             if(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
06042             {
06043                   btn->uiFlags&=~(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
06044                   fReDrawScreenFlag=TRUE;
06045                   fShowAtmPanel = TRUE;
06046                   fShowAtmPanelStartButton = FALSE;
06047                   fATMFlags = 0;
06048 
06049             }
06050       }
06051 }

06061     btn->uiFlags |= (BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
06062             ButtonList[giPersonnelATMStartButton[ PERSONNEL_STAT_BTN ] ]->uiFlags &= ~(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
06063             ButtonList[giPersonnelATMStartButton[ PERSONNEL_EMPLOYMENT_BTN ] ]->uiFlags &= ~(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
06064 //          fShowInventory = TRUE;
06065             gubPersonnelInfoState = PRSNL_INV;
06066       }

06102 void ATMOther2ButtonCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
06103 {
06104       INT32 iValue = 0;
06105       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier = MercPtrs[ 0 ];
06106       INT32 cnt = 0;
06107       INT32 iId = 0;
06108 
06109       if (!(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_ENABLED))
06110             return;
06111 
06112 
06113       iValue = MSYS_GetBtnUserData( btn, 0 );
06114 
06115       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
06116       {
06117             if(!(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON))
06118             {
06119                   fReDrawScreenFlag=TRUE;
06120             }
06121     btn->uiFlags|=(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
06122             
06123             switch( iValue )
06124             {
06125                   case( DEPOSIT_ATM ):
06126                         fATMFlags = 2;
06127                         fReDrawScreenFlag=TRUE;
06128                         ButtonList[ giPersonnelATMSideButton[ WIDTHDRAWL_ATM ] ]->uiFlags&=~(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
06129                   break;
06130                   case( WIDTHDRAWL_ATM ):
06131                         fATMFlags = 3;
06132                         fReDrawScreenFlag=TRUE;
06133                         ButtonList[ giPersonnelATMSideButton[ DEPOSIT_ATM ] ]->uiFlags&=~(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
06134                   break;
06135             }
06136       }
06137 
06138 }
06139 
06140 void ATMOtherButtonCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
06141 {
06142       INT32 iValue = 0;
06143       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier = MercPtrs[ 0 ];
06144       INT32 cnt = 0;
06145       INT32 iId = 0;
06146 
06147       if (!(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_ENABLED))
06148             return;
06149 
06150 
06151       iValue = MSYS_GetBtnUserData( btn, 0 );
06152 
06153       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
06154       {
06155             if(!(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON))
06156             {
06157                   fReDrawScreenFlag=TRUE;
06158             }
06159     btn->uiFlags|=(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);   
06160       }
06161       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
06162       {
06163             if(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
06164             {
06165                   btn->uiFlags&=~(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
06166 
06167                   if( iCurrentPersonSelectedId != -1 )
06168                   {
06169                         if( fCurrentTeamMode == TRUE )
06170                         {
06171                               iId = GetIdOfThisSlot( iCurrentPersonSelectedId );
06172                               cnt = 0;
06173 
06174                               // set soldier
06175                               pSoldier = MercPtrs[ iId ];
06176 
06177 
06178                               switch( iValue )
06179                               {
06180                                     case( OK_ATM ):
06181                                           if( fATMFlags == 0 )
06182                                           {
06183                                                 fATMFlags = 1;
06184                                                 fReDrawScreenFlag=TRUE;
06185                                                 fOneFrameDelayInPersonnel = TRUE;
06186                                           }
06187                                           else if( fATMFlags == 2 )
06188                                           {
06189                                                 // deposit from merc to account
06190                                                 if( GetFundsOnMerc( pSoldier ) >= wcstol( sTransferString, NULL, 10 ) )
06191                                                 {
06192                                                       if( ( wcstol( sTransferString, NULL, 10 ) % 10 ) != 0 )
06193                                                       {
06194                                                             fOldATMFlags = fATMFlags;
06195                                                             fATMFlags = 5;
06196 
06197                                                             iValue = ( wcstol( sTransferString, NULL, 10 ) - ( wcstol( sTransferString, NULL, 10 ) % 10 ) );
06198                                                             swprintf( sTransferString, L"%d", iValue );
06199                                                             fReDrawScreenFlag=TRUE;
06200                                                       }
06201                                                       else
06202                                                       {
06203                                                             // transfer
06204                                                             TransferFundsFromMercToBank( pSoldier, wcstol( sTransferString, NULL, 10 ) );
06205                                                             sTransferString[ 0 ] = 0;
06206                                                             fReDrawScreenFlag=TRUE;
06207                                                       }
06208                                                 }
06209                                                 else
06210                                                 {
06211                                                       fOldATMFlags = fATMFlags;
06212                                                       fATMFlags = 4;
06213                                                       iValue = GetFundsOnMerc( pSoldier );
06214                                                       swprintf( sTransferString, L"%d", iValue );
06215                                                       fReDrawScreenFlag=TRUE;
06216                                                 }
06217                                           }
06218                                           else if( fATMFlags == 3 )
06219                                           {
06220                                                 // deposit from merc to account
06221                                                 if( LaptopSaveInfo.iCurrentBalance >= wcstol( sTransferString, NULL, 10 ) )
06222                                                 {
06223                                                       if( ( wcstol( sTransferString, NULL, 10 ) % 10 ) != 0 )
06224                                                       {
06225                                                             fOldATMFlags = fATMFlags;
06226                                                             fATMFlags = 5;
06227 
06228                                                             iValue = ( wcstol( sTransferString, NULL, 10 ) - ( wcstol( sTransferString, NULL, 10 ) % 10 ) );
06229                                                             swprintf( sTransferString, L"%d", iValue );
06230                                                             fReDrawScreenFlag=TRUE;
06231                                                       }
06232                                                       else
06233                                                       {
06234                                                             // transfer
06235                                                             TransferFundsFromBankToMerc( pSoldier, wcstol( sTransferString, NULL, 10 ) );
06236                                                             sTransferString[ 0 ] = 0;
06237                                                             fReDrawScreenFlag=TRUE;
06238                                                       }
06239                                                 }
06240                                                 else
06241                                                 {
06242                                                       fOldATMFlags = fATMFlags;
06243                                                       fATMFlags = 4;
06244                                                       iValue = LaptopSaveInfo.iCurrentBalance;
06245                                                       swprintf( sTransferString, L"%d", iValue );
06246                                                       fReDrawScreenFlag=TRUE;
06247                                                 }
06248                                           }
06249                                           else if( fATMFlags == 4 )
06250                                           {
06251                                                 fATMFlags = fOldATMFlags;
06252                                                 fReDrawScreenFlag=TRUE;
06253                                           }
06254                                     break;
06255                                     case( DEPOSIT_ATM ):
06256                                           fATMFlags = 2;
06257                                           fReDrawScreenFlag=TRUE;
06258 
06259                                     break;
06260                                     case( WIDTHDRAWL_ATM ):
06261                                           fATMFlags = 3;
06262                                           fReDrawScreenFlag=TRUE;
06263                                     break;
06264                                     case( CANCEL_ATM ):
06265                                           if( sTransferString[ 0 ] != 0 )
06266                                           {
06267                                                 sTransferString[ 0 ] = 0;
06268                                           }
06269                                           else if( fATMFlags != 0 )
06270                                           {
06271                                                 fATMFlags = 0;
06272                                                 ButtonList[ giPersonnelATMSideButton[ WIDTHDRAWL_ATM ] ]->uiFlags&=~(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
06273                                                 ButtonList[ giPersonnelATMSideButton[ DEPOSIT_ATM ] ]->uiFlags&=~(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
06274                                           }
06275                                           else
06276                                           {
06277                                                 fShowAtmPanel = FALSE;
06278                                                 fShowAtmPanelStartButton = TRUE;
06279                                                 
06280                                           }
06281                                           fReDrawScreenFlag=TRUE;
06282                                     break;
06283                                     case( CLEAR_ATM ):
06284                                           sTransferString[ 0 ] = 0;
06285                                           fReDrawScreenFlag=TRUE;
06286                                     break;
06287                               }
06288                         }
06289                   }
06290             }
06291       }
06292 }
06293 
06294 void ATMNumberButtonCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
06295 {
06296 
06297       INT32 iValue = 0;
06298       INT32 iCounter = 0;
06299       CHAR16 sZero[ 2 ] = L"0";
06300 
06301       if (!(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_ENABLED))
06302             return;
06303 
06304       iValue = MSYS_GetBtnUserData( btn, 0 );
06305 
06306       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
06307       {
06308             if(!(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON))
06309             {
06310                   fReDrawScreenFlag=TRUE;
06311             }
06312     btn->uiFlags|=(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);   
06313       }
06314       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
06315       {
06316             if(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
06317             {
06318                   btn->uiFlags&=~(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
06319                   // find position in value string, append character at end
06320                   for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < ( INT32 )wcslen( sTransferString ) ; iCounter++ );
06321                   sTransferString[ iCounter ] = ( sZero[ 0 ] + ( UINT16 )iValue );
06322                   sTransferString[ iCounter + 1 ] = 0;
06323                   fReDrawScreenFlag=TRUE;
06324                   
06325                   // gone too far
06326                   if( StringPixLength( sTransferString, ATM_FONT ) >= ATM_DISPLAY_WIDTH - 10 )
06327                   {
06328                         sTransferString[ iCounter ] = 0;
06329                   }
06330             }
06331       }
06332 }
06333 
06334 void DisplayATMAmount( void )
06335 {
06336 
06337       INT16 sX = 0, sY = 0;
06338       CHAR16 sTempString[ 32 ];
06339       CHAR16 sZero[ 2 ] = L"0";
06340       INT32 iCounter = 0;
06341 
06342       if( fShowAtmPanel == FALSE )
06343       {
06344             return;
06345       }
06346 
06347       wcscpy( sTempString, sTransferString );
06348 
06349       if( ( sTempString[ 0 ] == 48 ) && ( sTempString[ 1 ] != 0 ) )
06350       {
06351             // strip the zero from the beginning
06352             for(iCounter = 1; iCounter < ( INT32 )wcslen( sTempString ); iCounter++ )
06353             {
06354                   sTempString[ iCounter - 1 ] = sTempString[ iCounter ];
06355             }
06356       }
06357 
06358       // insert commas and dollar sign
06359       InsertCommasForDollarFigure( sTempString );
06360       InsertDollarSignInToString( sTempString );
06361              
06362       // set font
06363       SetFont( ATM_FONT );
06364 
06365       // set back and foreground
06366       SetFontForeground( FONT_WHITE );
06367       SetFontBackground( FONT_BLACK );
06368 
06369 
06370       // right justify
06371       FindFontRightCoordinates( ATM_DISPLAY_X, ATM_DISPLAY_Y + 37, ATM_DISPLAY_WIDTH, ATM_DISPLAY_HEIGHT, sTempString, ATM_FONT, &sX, &sY );
06372 
06373       // print string
06374       mprintf( sX, sY, sTempString );
06375 
06376       return;
06377 }
06378 
06379 
06380 void HandleStateOfATMButtons( void )
06381 {
06382       INT32 iCounter = 0;
06383 
06384       // disable buttons based on state
06385       if( ( fATMFlags == 0 ) )
06386       {
06387             for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < 10 ; iCounter++ )
06388             {
06389                   DisableButton( iNumberPadButtons[ iCounter ] );
06390             }
06391 
06392             for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < NUMBER_ATM_BUTTONS; iCounter++ )
06393             {
06394                   if( ( iCounter != DEPOSIT_ATM) && ( iCounter != WIDTHDRAWL_ATM ) && ( iCounter != CANCEL_ATM )  )
06395                   {
06396                         DisableButton( giPersonnelATMSideButton[ iCounter ] );
06397                   }
06398             }
06399       }
06400       else
06401       {
06402             for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < 10; iCounter++ )
06403             {
06404                   EnableButton( iNumberPadButtons[ iCounter ] );
06405             }
06406 
06407             for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < NUMBER_ATM_BUTTONS; iCounter++ )
06408             {
06409                   EnableButton( giPersonnelATMSideButton[ iCounter ] );
06410             }
06411       }
06412 }
06413 
06414 
06415 INT32 GetFundsOnMerc( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
06416 {
06417       INT32 iCurrentAmount = 0;
06418       INT32 iCurrentPocket = 0;
06419       // run through mercs pockets, if any money in them, add to total
06420 
06421       // error check
06422       if( pSoldier == NULL )
06423       {
06424             return 0;
06425       }
06426 
06427       // run through grunts pockets and count all the spare change
06428       for( iCurrentPocket = 0; iCurrentPocket < NUM_INV_SLOTS; iCurrentPocket++ )
06429       {
06430             if ( Item[ pSoldier->inv[ iCurrentPocket ] .usItem ].usItemClass == IC_MONEY )
06431             {
06432                   iCurrentAmount += pSoldier->inv[ iCurrentPocket ].uiMoneyAmount; 
06433             }
06434       }
06435 
06436       return iCurrentAmount;
06437 }
06438 
06439 
06440 BOOLEAN TransferFundsFromMercToBank( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT32 iCurrentBalance )
06441 {
06442       INT32 iCurrentPocket = 0;
06443       INT32 iAmountLeftToTake = iCurrentBalance;
06444       OBJECTTYPE ObjectToRemove;
06445 
06446 
06447       // move this amount of money from the grunt to the bank
06448       // error check
06449       if( pSoldier == NULL )
06450       {
06451             return FALSE;
06452       }
06453 
06454       // run through grunts pockets and count all the spare change
06455       for( iCurrentPocket = 0; iCurrentPocket < NUM_INV_SLOTS; iCurrentPocket++ )
06456       {
06457             if ( Item[ pSoldier->inv[ iCurrentPocket ] .usItem ].usItemClass == IC_MONEY )
06458             {
06459 
06460                   // is there more left to go, or does this pocket finish it off?
06461                   if( pSoldier->inv[ iCurrentPocket ].uiMoneyAmount > ( UINT32 )iAmountLeftToTake )
06462                   {
06463                         pSoldier->inv[ iCurrentPocket ].uiMoneyAmount -= iAmountLeftToTake;
06464                         iAmountLeftToTake = 0;
06465                   }
06466                   else
06467                   {
06468                         iAmountLeftToTake  -= pSoldier->inv[ iCurrentPocket ].uiMoneyAmount;  
06469                         pSoldier->inv[ iCurrentPocket ].uiMoneyAmount = 0;
06470 
06471                         //Remove the item out off the merc
06472                         RemoveObjectFromSlot( pSoldier, (INT8)iCurrentPocket, &ObjectToRemove );
06473                   }
06474             }     
06475       }
06476 
06477       if( iAmountLeftToTake != 0 )
06478       {
06479             // something wrong
06480             AddTransactionToPlayersBook ( TRANSFER_FUNDS_FROM_MERC,     pSoldier->ubProfile, GetWorldTotalMin() , ( iCurrentBalance - iAmountLeftToTake ) );
06481             return ( FALSE );
06482       }
06483       else
06484       {
06485             // everything ok
06486             AddTransactionToPlayersBook ( TRANSFER_FUNDS_FROM_MERC,     pSoldier->ubProfile, GetWorldTotalMin() , ( iCurrentBalance ) );
06487             return ( TRUE );
06488       }
06489 }
06490 
06491 
06492 BOOLEAN TransferFundsFromBankToMerc( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT32 iCurrentBalance )
06493 {
06494       OBJECTTYPE pMoneyObject;
06495 
06496       // move this amount of money from the grunt to the bank
06497       // error check
06498       if( pSoldier == NULL )
06499       {
06500             return FALSE;
06501       }
06502 
06503       // make sure we are giving them some money
06504       if( iCurrentBalance <= 0 )
06505       {
06506             return ( FALSE );
06507       }
06508 
06509       // current balance
06510       if( iCurrentBalance > LaptopSaveInfo.iCurrentBalance )
06511       {
06512             iCurrentBalance = LaptopSaveInfo.iCurrentBalance;
06513       }
06514 
06515 
06516       // set up object
06517       memset( &( pMoneyObject ), 0, sizeof( OBJECTTYPE ) );
06518 
06519       // set up money object
06520       pMoneyObject.usItem = MONEY;
06521       pMoneyObject.ubNumberOfObjects = 1;
06522       pMoneyObject.bMoneyStatus = 100;
06523       pMoneyObject.     bStatus[0] = 100; 
06524       pMoneyObject.uiMoneyAmount = iCurrentBalance;
06525       
06526 
06527       // now auto place money object
06528       if( AutoPlaceObject( pSoldier, &( pMoneyObject ), TRUE ) == TRUE )
06529       {
06530             // now place transaction
06531             AddTransactionToPlayersBook ( TRANSFER_FUNDS_TO_MERC, pSoldier->ubProfile, GetWorldTotalMin() , -( iCurrentBalance ) );
06532       }
06533       else
06534       {
06535             // error, notify player that merc doesn't have the spce for this much cash
06536       }
06537 
06538       return( TRUE );
06539 }
06540 
06541 void DisplayATMStrings( void )
06542 {
06543       // display strings for ATM
06544       switch( fATMFlags )
06545       {
06546             case( 0 ):
06547                   if( fShowAtmPanelStartButton == FALSE )
06548                   {
06549                         DisplayWrappedString(iScreenWidthOffset + 509, ( INT16 )( iScreenHeightOffset + 80 ), 81, 2, ATM_FONT, FONT_WHITE, sATMText[ 3 ], FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED );
06550                   }
06551             break;
06552             case( 2 ):
06553                   if( sTransferString[ 0 ] != 0 )
06554                   {
06555                         DisplayWrappedString(iScreenWidthOffset + 509, iScreenHeightOffset + 80, 81, 2, ATM_FONT, FONT_WHITE, sATMText[ 0 ], FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED );
06556                   }
06557                   else
06558                   {
06559                         DisplayWrappedString(iScreenWidthOffset + 509, iScreenHeightOffset + 80, 81, 2, ATM_FONT, FONT_WHITE, sATMText[ 2 ], FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED );
06560                   }
06561             break;
06562             case( 3 ):
06563                   if( sTransferString[ 0 ] != 0 )
06564                   {
06565                         DisplayWrappedString(iScreenWidthOffset + 509, iScreenHeightOffset + 80, 81, 2, ATM_FONT, FONT_WHITE, sATMText[ 0 ], FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED );
06566                         //DisplayWrappedString(509, ( INT16 )( 80 + GetFontHeight( ATM_FONT ) ), 81, 2, ATM_FONT, FONT_WHITE, sATMText[ 1 ], FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED );
06567                   }
06568                   else
06569                   {
06570                         DisplayWrappedString(iScreenWidthOffset + 509, iScreenHeightOffset + 80, 81, 2, ATM_FONT, FONT_WHITE, sATMText[ 2 ], FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED );
06571                   }
06572             break;
06573             case( 4 ):
06574                   // not enough money
06575                   DisplayWrappedString(iScreenWidthOffset + 509, iScreenHeightOffset + 80, 81, 2, ATM_FONT, FONT_WHITE, sATMText[ 4 ], FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED );
06576             break;
06577             case( 5 ):
06578                   // not enough money
06579                   DisplayWrappedString(iScreenWidthOffset + 509, iScreenHeightOffset + 73, 81, 2, ATM_FONT, FONT_WHITE, sATMText[ 5 ], FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED );
06580             break;
06581 
06582       }
06583 }
06584 
06585 void UpDateStateOfStartButton( void )
06586 {
06587       INT32 iId = 0;
06588 
06589       // start button being shown?
06590       if( fShowAtmPanelStartButton == FALSE )
06591       {
06592             return;
06593       }
06594 
06595 //    if( fShowInventory == TRUE )
06596       if( gubPersonnelInfoState == PRSNL_INV )
06597       {
06598             ButtonList[ giPersonnelATMStartButton[ PERSONNEL_INV_BTN ] ]->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
06599             ButtonList[ giPersonnelATMStartButton[ PERSONNEL_STAT_BTN ] ]->uiFlags &= ~( BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
06600             ButtonList[ giPersonnelATMStartButton[ PERSONNEL_EMPLOYMENT_BTN ] ]->uiFlags &= ~( BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
06601       }
06602       else if( gubPersonnelInfoState == PRSNL_STATS )
06603       {
06604             ButtonList[ giPersonnelATMStartButton[ PERSONNEL_INV_BTN ] ]->uiFlags &= ~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
06605             ButtonList[ giPersonnelATMStartButton[ PERSONNEL_STAT_BTN ] ]->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
06606             ButtonList[ giPersonnelATMStartButton[ PERSONNEL_EMPLOYMENT_BTN ] ]->uiFlags &= ~( BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
06607       }
06608       else
06609       {
06610             ButtonList[ giPersonnelATMStartButton[ PERSONNEL_STAT_BTN ] ]->uiFlags &= ~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
06611             ButtonList[ giPersonnelATMStartButton[ PERSONNEL_INV_BTN ] ]->uiFlags &= ~( BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
06612             ButtonList[ giPersonnelATMStartButton[ PERSONNEL_EMPLOYMENT_BTN ] ]->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
06613       }
06614 
06615       // if in current mercs and the currently selected guy is valid, enable button, else disable it
06616       if( fCurrentTeamMode == TRUE )
06617       {
06618             // is the current guy valid
06619             if( GetNumberOfMercsDeadOrAliveOnPlayersTeam( ) > 0 )
06620             {
06621                   //EnableButton( giPersonnelATMStartButton[ 0 ] );
06622                   EnableButton( giPersonnelATMStartButton[ PERSONNEL_STAT_BTN ] );
06623                   EnableButton( giPersonnelATMStartButton[ PERSONNEL_INV_BTN ] );
06624                   EnableButton( giPersonnelATMStartButton[ PERSONNEL_EMPLOYMENT_BTN ] );
06625 
06626                   iId = GetIdOfThisSlot( iCurrentPersonSelectedId );
06627 
06628                   if( iId != -1 )
06629                   {
06630                         if( Menptr[ iId ].bAssignment == ASSIGNMENT_POW )
06631                         {
06632                               //DisableButton( giPersonnelATMStartButton[ 0 ] );
06633                               DisableButton( giPersonnelATMStartButton[ PERSONNEL_INV_BTN ] );
06634 
06635 //                            if( fShowInventory == TRUE )
06636                               if( gubPersonnelInfoState == PRSNL_INV )
06637                               {
06638 //                                  fShowInventory = FALSE;
06639                                     gubPersonnelInfoState = PRSNL_STATS;
06640 
06641                                     fPausedReDrawScreenFlag = TRUE;
06642                               }
06643 
06644                               if( fATMFlags )
06645                               {
06646                                     fATMFlags = 0;
06647                                     fPausedReDrawScreenFlag = TRUE;
06648                               }
06649                         }
06650                   }
06651 
06652                   
06653             }
06654             else
06655             {
06656                   // not valid, disable
06657                   //DisableButton( giPersonnelATMStartButton[ 0 ] );
06658                   DisableButton( giPersonnelATMStartButton[ PERSONNEL_STAT_BTN ] );
06659                   DisableButton( giPersonnelATMStartButton[ PERSONNEL_INV_BTN ] );
06660                   DisableButton( giPersonnelATMStartButton[ PERSONNEL_EMPLOYMENT_BTN ] );
06661             }
06662 
06663             
06664       }
06665       else
06666       {
06667             // disable button
06668             //DisableButton( giPersonnelATMStartButton[ 0 ] );
06669             EnableButton( giPersonnelATMStartButton[ PERSONNEL_STAT_BTN ] );
06670             DisableButton( giPersonnelATMStartButton[ PERSONNEL_INV_BTN ] );
06671             DisableButton( giPersonnelATMStartButton[ PERSONNEL_EMPLOYMENT_BTN ] );
06672       }
06673 }
06674 
06675 void DisplayAmountOnCurrentMerc( void )
06676 {
06677       // will display the amount that the merc is carrying on him or herself
06678       INT32 iId;
06679       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier = NULL;
06680       INT32 iFunds;
06681       CHAR16 sString[ 64 ];
06682       INT16 sX, sY;
06683 
06684       iId = GetIdOfThisSlot( iCurrentPersonSelectedId );
06685 
06686       if( iId == -1 )
06687       {
06688             pSoldier = NULL;
06689       }
06690       else
06691       {
06692             // set soldier
06693             pSoldier = MercPtrs[ iId ];
06694       }
06695 
06696       iFunds = GetFundsOnMerc( pSoldier ); 
06697 
06698       swprintf( sString, L"%d", iFunds );
06699 
06700       // insert commas and dollar sign
06701       InsertCommasForDollarFigure( sString );
06702       InsertDollarSignInToString( sString );
06703              
06704       // set font
06705       SetFont( ATM_FONT );
06706 
06707       // set back and foreground
06708       SetFontForeground( FONT_WHITE );
06709       SetFontBackground( FONT_BLACK );
06710 
06711       // right justify
06712       FindFontRightCoordinates( ATM_DISPLAY_X, ATM_DISPLAY_Y, ATM_DISPLAY_WIDTH, ATM_DISPLAY_HEIGHT, sString, ATM_FONT, &sX, &sY );
06713 
06714       // print string
06715       mprintf( sX, sY, sString );
06716 
06717       return;
06718 }
06719 
06720 void HandlePersonnelKeyboard( void )
06721 {
06722       INT32 iCounter = 0;
06723       INT32 iValue = 0;
06724       CHAR16 sZero[ 2 ] = L"0";
06725       
06726       InputAtom                           InputEvent;
06727       POINT  MousePos;
06728 
06729       GetCursorPos(&MousePos);
06730 
06731   while (DequeueEvent(&InputEvent) == TRUE)
06732   {
06733             if ( (InputEvent.usEvent == KEY_DOWN ) && (InputEvent.usParam >= '0' ) && ( InputEvent.usParam <= '9') )
06734             {
06735                   if( ( fShowAtmPanel ) && ( fATMFlags != 0 ) )
06736                   {
06737                         iValue = ( INT32 )( InputEvent.usParam - '0' );
06738 
06739                         for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < ( INT32 )wcslen( sTransferString ) ; iCounter++ );
06740                         sTransferString[ iCounter ] = ( sZero[ 0 ] + ( UINT16 )iValue );
06741                         sTransferString[ iCounter + 1 ] = 0;
06742                         fPausedReDrawScreenFlag=TRUE;
06743                   
06744                         // gone too far
06745                         if( StringPixLength( sTransferString, ATM_FONT ) >= ATM_DISPLAY_WIDTH - 10 )
06746                         {
06747                               sTransferString[ iCounter ] = 0;
06748                         }
06749                   }
06750             }
06751 
06752             HandleKeyBoardShortCutsForLapTop( InputEvent.usEvent, InputEvent.usParam, InputEvent.usKeyState );
06753       }
06754 }
06755 
06756 void RenderRectangleForPersonnelTransactionAmount( void )
06757 {
06758       INT32 iLength = 0; 
06759       INT32 iHeight = GetFontHeight( ATM_FONT );
06760       UINT32                                                             uiDestPitchBYTES;
06761       UINT8                                                              *pDestBuf;
06762       CHAR16 sTempString[ 32 ];
06763       CHAR16 sZero[ 2 ] = L"0";
06764       INT32  iCounter = 0;
06765       
06766 
06767       wcscpy( sTempString, sTransferString );
06768 
06769       if( ( sTempString[ 0 ] == 48 ) && ( sTempString[ 1 ] != 0 ) )
06770       {
06771             // strip the zero from the beginning
06772             for(iCounter = 1; iCounter < ( INT32 )wcslen( sTempString ); iCounter++ )
06773             {
06774                   sTempString[ iCounter - 1 ] = sTempString[ iCounter ];
06775             }
06776       }
06777 
06778       // insert commas and dollar sign
06779       InsertCommasForDollarFigure( sTempString );
06780       InsertDollarSignInToString( sTempString );
06781       
06782       // string not worth worrying about?
06783       if( wcslen( sTempString ) < 2 )
06784       {
06785             return;
06786       }
06787 
06788       // grab total length 
06789       iLength = StringPixLength( sTempString, ATM_FONT );
06790 
06791       pDestBuf = LockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER, &uiDestPitchBYTES );               
06792       RestoreClipRegionToFullScreenForRectangle( uiDestPitchBYTES );
06793       RectangleDraw( TRUE, ( ATM_DISPLAY_X + ATM_DISPLAY_WIDTH ) - iLength - 2,  ATM_DISPLAY_Y + 35, ATM_DISPLAY_X + ATM_DISPLAY_WIDTH + 1, ATM_DISPLAY_Y + iHeight + 36, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 255, 255, 255 ) ), pDestBuf );    
06794       UnLockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER );
06795 
06796 }
06797 
06798 void HandleTimedAtmModes( void )
06799 {
06800       static BOOLEAN fOldAtmMode = 0;
06801       static UINT32 uiBaseTime = 0;
06802 
06803       if( fShowAtmPanel == FALSE )
06804       {
06805             return;
06806       }
06807 
06808       // update based on modes
06809       if( fATMFlags != fOldAtmMode )
06810       {
06811             uiBaseTime = GetJA2Clock();
06812             fOldAtmMode = fATMFlags;
06813             fPausedReDrawScreenFlag = TRUE;
06814       }
06815 
06816 
06817       if( ( GetJA2Clock() - uiBaseTime ) > DELAY_PER_MODE_CHANGE_IN_ATM )
06818       {
06819             switch( fATMFlags )
06820             {
06821                   case( 4 ):
06822                   case( 5 ):
06823                         // insufficient funds ended
06824                         fATMFlags = fOldATMFlags;
06825                         fPausedReDrawScreenFlag = TRUE;
06826                   break;
06827             }
06828       }
06829 }
06830 
06831 BOOLEAN IsPastMercDead( INT32 iId )
06832 {
06833       if( GetTheStateOfDepartedMerc( GetIdOfPastMercInSlot( iId ) ) == DEPARTED_DEAD )
06834       {
06835             return( TRUE );
06836             }
06837       else
06838       {
06839             return( FALSE );
06840       }
06841 
06842 }
06843 
06844 
06845 BOOLEAN IsPastMercFired( INT32 iId )
06846 {
06847       if( GetTheStateOfDepartedMerc( GetIdOfPastMercInSlot( iId )  ) == DEPARTED_FIRED )
06848       {
06849             return( TRUE );
06850             }
06851       else
06852       {
06853             return( FALSE );
06854       }
06855 }
06856 
06857 BOOLEAN IsPastMercOther( INT32 iId )
06858 {
06859       if( GetTheStateOfDepartedMerc( GetIdOfPastMercInSlot( iId )  ) == DEPARTED_OTHER )
06860       {
06861             return( TRUE );
06862             }
06863       else
06864       {
06865             return( FALSE );
06866       }
06867 }

06870 
06871 void DisplayEmploymentinformation( INT32 iId, INT32 iSlot )
06872 {
06873       INT32 iCounter=0;
06874       wchar_t sString[50];
06875       wchar_t sStringA[ 50 ];
06876       INT16 sX, sY;
06877       UINT32 uiHits = 0;
06878       
06879       
06880       if( Menptr[iId].uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE )
06881       {
06882             return;
06883       }
06884 
06885       // display the stats for a char
06886       for(iCounter=0;iCounter <MAX_STATS; iCounter++)
06887       {
06888             switch(iCounter)
06889             {
06890 
06891 //           case 12:
06892 
06893             //Remaining Contract:
06894             case 0:
06895             {
06896                   UINT32 uiTimeUnderThisDisplayAsHours = 24*60;
06897                   UINT32 uiMinutesInDay = 24 * 60;
06898 
06899                         if(Menptr[iId].ubWhatKindOfMercAmI == MERC_TYPE__AIM_MERC || Menptr[iId].ubProfile == SLAY )
06900                         {
06901                               INT32 iTimeLeftOnContract = CalcTimeLeftOnMercContract( &Menptr[iId] );
06902 
06903                               //if the merc is in transit
06904                               if( Menptr[iId ].bAssignment == IN_TRANSIT )
06905                               {
06906                                     //and if the ttime left on the cotract is greater then the contract time
06907                                     if( iTimeLeftOnContract > (INT32)( Menptr[iId].iTotalContractLength * uiMinutesInDay ) )
06908                                     {
06909                                           iTimeLeftOnContract = ( Menptr[iId].iTotalContractLength * uiMinutesInDay );
06910                                     }
06911                               }
06912                               // if there is going to be a both days and hours left on the contract
06913                               if( iTimeLeftOnContract / uiMinutesInDay )
06914                               {
06915                                     swprintf(sString, L"%d%s %d%s / %d%s",( iTimeLeftOnContract / uiMinutesInDay ), gpStrategicString[ STR_PB_DAYS_ABBREVIATION ], (iTimeLeftOnContract % uiMinutesInDay)/60, gpStrategicString[ STR_PB_HOURS_ABBREVIATION ], Menptr[iId].iTotalContractLength, gpStrategicString[ STR_PB_DAYS_ABBREVIATION ]);
06916                                     mprintf((INT16)(pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter].x+(iSlot*TEXT_BOX_WIDTH)),pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter].y,pPersonnelScreenStrings[PRSNL_TXT_CURRENT_CONTRACT]);           
06917                               }
06918 
06919                               //else there is under a day left
06920                               else
06921                               {
06922                                     //DEF: removed 2/7/99
06923                                     swprintf(sString, L"%d%s / %d%s", (iTimeLeftOnContract % uiMinutesInDay)/60, gpStrategicString[ STR_PB_HOURS_ABBREVIATION ], Menptr[iId].iTotalContractLength, gpStrategicString[ STR_PB_DAYS_ABBREVIATION ]);
06924                                     mprintf((INT16)(pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter].x+(iSlot*TEXT_BOX_WIDTH)),pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter].y,pPersonnelScreenStrings[PRSNL_TXT_CURRENT_CONTRACT]);           
06925                               }
06926 
06927                         }
06928                         else if( Menptr[iId].ubWhatKindOfMercAmI == MERC_TYPE__MERC)
06929                         {
06930 //                            swprintf(sString, L"%d%s / %d%s",Menptr[iId].iTotalContractLength, gpStrategicString[ STR_PB_DAYS_ABBREVIATION ], ( GetWorldTotalMin( ) -Menptr[iId].iStartContractTime ) / ( 24 * 60 ), gpStrategicString[ STR_PB_DAYS_ABBREVIATION ] );
06931 
06932                               wcscpy( sString, gpStrategicString[ STR_PB_NOTAPPLICABLE_ABBREVIATION ] );
06933                               mprintf((INT16)(pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter].x+(iSlot*TEXT_BOX_WIDTH)),pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter].y,pPersonnelScreenStrings[PRSNL_TXT_CURRENT_CONTRACT]);
06934                         }
06935                         else
06936                         {
06937                               wcscpy( sString, gpStrategicString[ STR_PB_NOTAPPLICABLE_ABBREVIATION ] );
06938                               mprintf((INT16)(pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter].x+(iSlot*TEXT_BOX_WIDTH)),pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter].y,pPersonnelScreenStrings[PRSNL_TXT_CURRENT_CONTRACT]);
06939                         }
06940 
06941                FindFontRightCoordinates((INT16)(pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter].x+(iSlot*TEXT_BOX_WIDTH)+Prsnl_DATA_OffSetX),0,TEXT_BOX_WIDTH-20,0,sString, PERS_FONT,  &sX, &sY);
06942        mprintf(sX,pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter].y,sString);           
06943             }
06944             break;
06945 
06946 //           case 11:
06947 //           case 19:
06948              case 1:
06949 
06950                    // total contract time served
06951                   mprintf((INT16)(pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter].x+(iSlot*TEXT_BOX_WIDTH)),pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter].y,pPersonnelScreenStrings[PRSNL_TXT_TOTAL_SERVICE]);         
06952 
06953                   //./DEF 2/4/99: total service days used to be calced as 'days -1'
06954 
06955                   swprintf(sString, L"%d %s",gMercProfiles[Menptr[iId].ubProfile].usTotalDaysServed, gpStrategicString[ STR_PB_DAYS_ABBREVIATION ] );
06956 
06957       FindFontRightCoordinates((INT16)(pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter].x+(iSlot*TEXT_BOX_WIDTH)+Prsnl_DATA_OffSetX),0,TEXT_BOX_WIDTH-20,0,sString, PERS_FONT,  &sX, &sY);
06958       mprintf(sX,pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter].y,sString);
06959              break;
06960

07089                   if( Menptr[iId].ubWhatKindOfMercAmI == MERC_TYPE__MERC )
07090                   {
07091                         mprintf((INT16)(pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter-1].x+(iSlot*TEXT_BOX_WIDTH)),pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter-1].y,pPersonnelScreenStrings[PRSNL_TXT_UNPAID_AMOUNT]);
07092 
07093                         swprintf( sString, L"%d", gMercProfiles[Menptr[ iId ].ubProfile].sSalary * gMercProfiles[Menptr[ iId ].ubProfile ].iMercMercContractLength );
07094                         InsertCommasForDollarFigure( sString );
07095                         InsertDollarSignInToString( sString );
07096 
07097                         FindFontRightCoordinates((INT16)(pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter-1].x+(iSlot*TEXT_BOX_WIDTH)+Prsnl_DATA_OffSetX),0,TEXT_BOX_WIDTH-20,0,sString, PERS_FONT,  &sX, &sY);
07098                         mprintf(sX,pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter-1].y,sString);
07099                   }
07100                   else
07101                   {
07102                         mprintf((INT16)(pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter-1].x+(iSlot*TEXT_BOX_WIDTH)),pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter-1].y,pPersonnelScreenStrings[PRSNL_TXT_MED_DEPOSIT]);            
07103 
07104                         swprintf(sString, L"%d",gMercProfiles[Menptr[iId].ubProfile].sMedicalDepositAmount);
07105 
07106                         // insert commas and dollar sign
07107                         InsertCommasForDollarFigure( sString );
07108                         InsertDollarSignInToString( sString );
07109 
07110                         FindFontRightCoordinates((INT16)(pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter-1].x+(iSlot*TEXT_BOX_WIDTH)+Prsnl_DATA_OffSetX),0,TEXT_BOX_WIDTH-20,0,sString, PERS_FONT,  &sX, &sY);
07111                         mprintf(sX,pPersonnelScreenPoints[iCounter-1].y,sString);
07112                   }
07113 
07114                          
07115              break;
07116 
07117             }
07118       }
07119 }
07120 
07121 // AIM merc:  Returns the amount of time left on mercs contract
07122 // MERC merc: Returns the amount of time the merc has worked
07123 // IMP merc:      Returns the amount of time the merc has worked
07124 // else:                returns -1
07125 INT32 CalcTimeLeftOnMercContract( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
07126 {
07127       INT32 iTimeLeftOnContract = -1;
07128 
07129       if(pSoldier->ubWhatKindOfMercAmI == MERC_TYPE__AIM_MERC)
07130       {
07131             iTimeLeftOnContract = pSoldier->iEndofContractTime-GetWorldTotalMin();
07132 
07133             if( iTimeLeftOnContract < 0 )
07134                   iTimeLeftOnContract = 0;
07135       }
07136       else if( pSoldier->ubWhatKindOfMercAmI == MERC_TYPE__MERC)
07137       {
07138             iTimeLeftOnContract = gMercProfiles[ pSoldier->ubProfile ].iMercMercContractLength;
07139       }
07140 
07141       else if( pSoldier->ubWhatKindOfMercAmI == MERC_TYPE__PLAYER_CHARACTER )
07142       {
07143             iTimeLeftOnContract = pSoldier->iTotalContractLength;
07144       }
07145 
07146       else
07147       {
07148             iTimeLeftOnContract = -1;
07149       }
07150 
07151       return( iTimeLeftOnContract );
07152 }
